Nathalie? Nathalie!
It's Adrien. Your son... he's... he's Cat Noir.
Cat Noir, my own son?The Miraculous will soon be mine!
Hurry up!
I'll find you, m'lady!! And when I do, you'll give me your Miraculous!
Time to de-evil—!
Looking for my Akuma, m'lady?!There’s a faster way to make this end, you know. You just need to hand over.. YOUR MIRACULOUS!!!!!!!
Never! Lucky Charm!!

An eraser? I'd like to erase the past too, but there's only one way to do that.You know that by merging our Miraculous together, we'd be granted one wish, right? Any wish we wanted. Well, my wish would be to fix everything, so we could be in love again. And have a hamster, too. You’ve always dreamed of having one. We’ll call it—
Time to de-evil—
You're not even listening. You don't understand.
You're done, Hawk Moth! Give us back your Miraculous!
You know what they say. The wave of a moth's wing can set off a CATACLYSM!
I would put that Cataclysm away if I were you... Adrien.
How do you—Mother?
I'm doing it for her, Adrien. For you. For us.
Father?Why? Why? Why?Why...?
We can save your mother using your Miraculous and hers!
No, just stop!
Don't listen to him! You know there'd be a terrible price to pay in exchange!
If she really loved you, she'd let you save your mother!
Stop it! Stop it! STOP IT!!!!!
Cat Blanc, I'm giving you the infinite power of destruction! Together you and I will seize Ladybug's Miraculous and awaken your mother! Obey!
I'm sorry, Ladybug!
Seize her Miraculous, my son!
No Adrien, you have to resist!
How dare you! Not me, Adrien!
I... I DON'T KNOW WHAT TO DO!!!!!
M'lady...
My prince..
Fix this nightmare, Ladybug! Please!
What did you do to them?!
I didn't mean to.Why won't you try and help me fix it?!The simple truth is you don't love me anymore!! So I might as well destroy YOU, ME, OUR MEMORIES... EVERYTHING!!!!!!!!
No, no, no, NO! He's about to trigger the end of the world, Ladybug!!
OKAY! OKAY! I'LL GIVE YOU MY MIRACULOUS, CAT NOIR!
I'm not Cat Noir anymore.I'm Cat Blanc.
You will always be Cat Noir to me.
No more evildoing for you, little Akuma. Time to de-evilise Cat Noir!Gotcha!Bye-bye, little butterfly.
Yes, yes! You did it, Minibug!
Marinette, what happened?What's wrong?
You're still calling me Marinette. You're not supposed to know who I am. It means that if I use my Miraculous Ladybug to fix everything now...
You'll still have this memory of her.
Of course!I'm gonna fix everything, Cat Noir, I promise!
I know.

Bring me back 10 minutes before the moment you came to get me, quick! I don't have much time before I transform back and lose my Lucky Charm.I have to erase my mistake to get things back to normal. This future is a result from something that happened in the past. I must not throw my eraser here and now, I must throw my eraser back then!
Do you know how Cat Noir found out about your secret identity?
I think so. When I went into Adrien's house as Ladybug, he probably saw me. He figured out that Ladybug is Marinette because of the note written on the gift. But I'm not sure what happened next.
He probably told his friend Nino, who told Alya, who wrote about it on the Ladyblog.
Mm.. They would never do that. But Adrien probably told someone, who told someone else, and so on, until it was all over the news! The best-kept secrets are the ones you never share.
Signed, Marinette.What the—
Trust me, it's better this way.Miraculous Ladybug!
WOO-HOO!
Ladybug?
Oh, Adrien Agreste! What a surprise! I brought you a gift from... your fan club in Brazil! There's a postal strike over there but they really wanted it to arrive today for Saint Athanasius Day.
That's my... fifth name.
Wow, they must be serious fans to know that about you! Well, happy Fifth Name's Day!
Uh... thank you.
Ugh, why would anyone send a beret when they could send cheese instead?
Hey, Bunnyx, when you travel through time, do you forget what happened when you're done?
What's seen can't be unseen. I know who you are, Minibug, and a few other things too.
Do you know who Hawk Moth is?
Even if I did, I couldn't tell you. There's a time for everything and time is a fragile thing. That's the reason you picked me, Minibug. I know how to keep a secret.
He wasn't home. His fencing competition probably ended later than expected.
What did you do with the gift?

Oh, I dropped it off at home before coming back here. I was gonna tell you that I've given it to him but the truth is I just couldn't do it! But I promise next time, it'll work. You know what they say, 563rd time's a charm!
Little kitty on a roof, all alone without his lady...
Hey, Bugaboo. So what was that sudden call for?
I did it.
I have no idea what you're talking about, but I'm perfectly fine with it.
キャットブラン/Transcript
Finally.
That villain was so tough. .
Good night, Tikki.
Sleep tight, Marinette.
Rise and shine everyone! Today is Heroes Day. A day when you too can be a hero!
Heroes Day?!I completely forgot to plan my good deed today!
And the fact that you were up all night saving Paris isn't enough of a good deed?
No, Tikki. Because that was a secret and Ladybug's good deed. Heroes Day is when everyday citizens perform a good deed for other people's benefit.Come on, Tikki.
Dad, Mom, it's Heroes' Day today!
Just like every year, sweetie.I've put one of every flavor in there for each of your classmates.
You can't get much better than that in the good deed department.
You guys are my heroes.
Heroes Day... We're already heroes. Come on, let's go back to bed!
Plagg!Do you really have to eat that so early in the morning?
Mhm.
The fencing hall is booked for 6:05 p.m. and the Chinese classroom for 6:35 p.m. just as you wished, and remember that you have to make an appearance in the Agreste Foundation's Heroes Gala.
I'll be there for sure.
If it were to fail Nathalie, I could never forgive myself.

You made a promise to your wife. You've risked so much for the chance to bring her back.Lila has been harboring her rage against Ladybug for months, and today wherever she looks, she'll see the object of her hatred, and as predicted, her anger will reach devastating heights. Your plan is perfect, sir.
And you're sure you want to do this?
I will always be here for you. We will succeed.
Hello, everyone!
Hi Lila!
We can't wait to hear what you've been doing since our last video chat. Tell us about your week in the Kingdom of Achu.
It's absolutely amazing! Prince Ali invited me and my parents to his gorgeous palace.
Excuse me, Lila, but Prince Ali couldn't possibly have invited you because he is in the United States.
I never said he was actually there, Marinette. I just said he invited us, that's all. His parents organized the visit-
She's lying, and I'll expose her for the fake that she is.
Oh no, Marinette, not that again. She's not a liar. You're just jealous of Lila because she tried to hit on Adrien.
Nu-uh. Not. True.
I miss you guys so much. It's so hard being away on this magical trip so far from my friends, and especially on Heroes Day.
Aw!
Lila, what good deed are you planning to do on this special day?
Today I'll be meeting up with Prince Ali to show him an idea I came up with. Marinette? Prince Ali is coming back to Achu today, isn't he?
Yeah, that's right.
What idea is this, Lila?
I'm sure it's amazing!

Oh, it's nothing much! During our world travels, my diplomat parents have helped me convince the leaders of several nations to agree to reduce world pollution.And I'm very optimistic that the prince will jump on board.
That's incredible, Lila! Thank you on behalf of planet Earth.
Well sure. Superheroes like Ladybug might save lives, but they couldn't care less about the environment, so somebody has to come to the rescue.
I'm sure Ladybug would be very impressed by what you're doing.
Thank you for your encouraging words. I'm sorry, but it's late here with the time difference. As you can see behind me, the sun's already going down. I have to leave you now. See you soon!
Thank you so much for calling us, Lila. And good luck with your project.
Bye!
Who was that on the phone?
Mom? You know perfectly well that was my boyfriend, Adrien. He misses me so much he can't stop calling.
And school still hasn't reopened yet?
No. It's too dangerous with all these akumatizations happening.
Ah, there he is now, your school principal.
Do not answer him!He's been akumatized too! Another poor soul that useless Ladybug was unable to save.
Huh?
All these akumatizations are quite concerning. I'll bring it up at our next embassy meeting.Ciao my bella! Your lunch is in the fridge. I'll try not to be home too late.
Grr...
Lila's parents must be caught in a typhoon overseas. I can't get ahold of them. It is now the hour of The Owl! Hoo! Hoo!
Well, it isn't going to be easy living up to Lila's standards but let's not forget that we can all be heroes for this one day. We may not have Prince Ali as a friend but...

We do have imagination. Hoo! Hoo!This year, Ladybug and Cat Noir have been our heroes, protecting us from the terrible Hawk Moth. They've shown us that heroism is beyond comic books and fairy tales. Heroism is real, and it is up to you to show us how Ladybug and Cat Noir brought out the best in all of us. By being everyday heroes.
So what heroic deeds have you all planned? Nino?

I gotta admit, I've never used to do anything for anyone before, but Ladybug and Cat Noir have shown me what being cool is really about.So this year, I'm going to visit the elderly residents at the local retirement home and play them all their favorite songs.
Adrien?
Today I plan to give my fencing classmates a lesson in Chinese and my Chinese classmates a lesson in fencing.
Alya?

Last year, I wrote an article about equiping public buildings with disabled access. But after seeing Ladybug and Cat Noir going that extra mile every single day, I decided that I, too, can do better. So I got the mayor's approval to improve facilties so that handicap kids can actually attend our school.
What about you, Marinette?
Uh...so I, uh, yeah. I have...macarons.
Wow, like every year? You obviously went above and beyond, Dupain-Cheng.
Hey! She did what she could, and that's better than nothing.
Hey, I am doing something. Now that I'm a superhero myself, I'll be signing autographs for anyone who wants one.
Wait! It's not just macarons for us. I'm actually organizing a school-wide macaron tasting.
Yeah. And they'll be more than just macarons, too. They'll be pastries and pies and fruits and cakes for anyone who wants them. I invite everybody to the biggest tasting at the park tonight.
Cake for everyone!
Oh, wow. That's not the same as every year, Marinette.
How 'bout just half, then? 500 macarons, 100 pies, 300 sweet buns, and just 1000 crossiants. That should be enough.

If I didn't have this giant Ladybug cake to finish by tonight, I would gladly rise to the challenge but there's simply no way I can do both. I've committed myself, Marinette. I can't let the mayor down.
And I committed myself way over my head. Now I'm gonna let my whole class down.
It's not too late to tell them the truth. Your friends will understand.
But it won't be very heroic.
Yes, it will. Being brave enough to face one's mistakes is heroic.
You're right.If I get to work right away, I'll have enough time to make the macarons by myself.
Sir, Adrien has a special request. He'd like to go to a picnic tonight.
Fine. The plan is already in motion. Soon Paris will mourn their heroes.
Liar! Traitor! Coward!

In honor of the wonderful Ladybug who has saved my son Adrien and myself, and who relentlessly protects all of us everyday, I have financed this tribute to Ladybug. Because Ladybug is the only true hero unlike her mediocre imitations, such as Volpina.
I hate you, Ladybug!
You were right, Nathalie. It's all going according to plan.
Nooroo, dark wings rise!
Fly away, my little akuma and evilize the one who's been waiting your return for so long.
Volpina!
Hawk Moth!
Your dreams were once a reality until Ladybug turned them into a nightmare. Regain your power of illusion and make this Heroes Day a nightmare for all Parisians.
With great pleasure, Hawk Moth.
Look at all these Parisians! So happy to be parading in honor of their heroes.
Look mommy! Ladybug looks weird.
Come on, sweetie. That's no Ladybug, that's - Ladybug?!
Move out of the way everyone! She's been akumatized!
Hahahaha! Is that fear I smell, kitty? If you're looking for trouble, you've found it!
Ladybug and Cat Noir are fighting each other! This is incredible ladies and gentlemen.
It's over my sweet little kitty! Give me your miraculous!
If Hawk Moth wants a ring, he can make one himself.
It's not nice to deny the request of a friend of a friend.
We'll probably only be friends again until you've been deakumatized.Meanwhile, I've got a nice gift for Hawk Moth. A very cool, Cataclysm!
Cataclysm to you too!
Hahahahahaha! I've WON! HAWK MOTH HAS WON! Fear, people of Paris. There's no one left to protect you.
Is Ladybug a baddie now?
So much sadness. So much disappointment. I can feel the chasm of despair and fear about to open and swallow up every single Parisian. Dear Volpina, you've performed your role well for the time being.
We will meet again very soon.
I'll be waiting, Hawk Moth.
Are you ready, Nathalie?
They've been keeping you from achieving your dream for way too long. I will go to any lengths to end the reign of Ladybug and Cat Noir.
Good.Catalyst. You have always been my most loyal supporter. I give you the ability to boost powers.
Hawk Moth, I give you the power to release as many akumas as you desire. From now on, you are the all-mighty Scarlet Moth.
Fly away my little akumas. Find the Parisians as they despair over Cat Noir and Ladybug's final hour and evilize each and every one of them.!
I've got 32 minutes until the end of lunch break. At a rate of 10 macarons per minute that works out to......one big fail! Ah! Tikki, help me!
Do you want me to go back and fetch some more sugar?
Why don't you just transform me into Ladybug instead? With a bit of luck, my Lucky Charm will give us a giant electric whisk or an oven full of quiches.
I know. It wouldn't be very hero-like of me to use my powers just for my own purposes.
Just tell your friends the truth, Marinette.
But that'll spoil the whole party.
Today's Heroes Day, Marinette. Nothing can spoil the party.
Well, anyone can get carried away from time to time.
Marinette! This is awesome! My father gave me permission to come to your tasting.
I, I, I, huh...?
You didn't make enough pastries for me, is that it?
Oh no! We've got plenty! You're so cute. I mean, uh, it's so cutecool. It's cool that you can make it.
What's going on?
Cat Noir defeated. Ladybug in the clutches of the terrible Hawk Moth. This is Paris' worst nightmare.
Ladybug defeated? Nothing will ever be rock 'n roll again.
We'll have to cancel the concert?
You're right, Clara. There's no sense in celebrating Heroes' Day, either.
Dear viewers, what does make sense is getting ready for the coming of...
...our new lead rock star...
...Scarlet Moth!
It's okay. No need to panic. I know what I have to do.
Mylène! NO!
This is bad!Real bad! Ah!
Don't let fear control you, Juleka!
Remember now, there's a hero in every one of us!
As long as we show we're not scared. Hoot hoot!
I am scared!
That's it! We can't let fear get the better of us!
It worked!
Nora, whatever you do, don't let fear get ahold of you, you got me?
Fear? Little sister, fear is afraid of me!
Yeah!
Too many people have been akumatized. It'd be foolish to try to fight them all. We must go see Master Fu right away.
Tikki, spots on!
Good, Gorizilla. Whatever happens, do not release Adrien. His safety is your number one priority. Now, come my dear akumatized friends.
What are they doing?
Do not let her out of your sight, Vanisher.
She's probably going to recruit other superheroes to help her battle my army. Without knowing it, she's going to lead us to the guardian of the Miraculous.
See that? I barely destroyed anything.
You're a true hero.
Plagg, claws out!
I knew it!No more evil doing for you, little akuma. Time to de-evilize!Gotcha! Bye-bye, little butterfly.
Ladybug?Is this really you?! The real Ladybug?!
Of course.
We all saw you akumatized! You destroyed Cat Noir and you took his Miraculous to Hawk Moth. It was...
An illusion?Volpina!
I'm going to tell the world not to lose hope because the real Ladybug is still going strong.
It is Heroes Day, after all. And I wouldn't miss it for the world.
Vanisher? Why have I lost contact with you? Ladybug must've found you out, but there's no way she'll be able to figure out what I have in store for her next.

I always knew that one day Hawk Moth would realize just how powerful he could be. That day has come, Marinette.Marinette Dupain-Cheng, you must pick an ally you can trust to fight alongside you on this mission. Once the mission is over, you will get the Miraculous back from them and return it to me.
Take them all, Marinette! There need to be as many of us as possible.

No, Tikki. In this case, less is more. I won't have time to explain everything again. I need allies who already know what needs to be done.If I may, Master?So you want the Miraculouses, Hawk Moth?Then that's what you're going to get!
Cat Noir.
No way I was gonna miss this party, m'lady. Especially with all these guests.
How many?
1...2...3... Too many to count. Looks like Hawk Moth made quite an army for himself.
It's just as well. I'm planning to do the same.
M'lady.
I've got a mission for you.
Whoa.
When this is over, I swear I'll take you to the movies.
No, I'll take you to the movies.
Alya. Nino. You guys like action movies, right?
Ladybug? The real Ladybug? But...?
I'm sorry for what I'm about to do. I know I'm revealing your secret identities but I don't have time to find a good excuse to give them to you separately.Rena Rouge and Carapace, I need you both!
You're Rena Rouge?
Of course I am.
And you never told me?
It was supposed to be a secret, right?
Trixx, let's pounce!
So awesome!But aren't you at least a bit surprised that I'm Carapace?
My sweet clueless boy, just transform.
Wayzz, shell on!
Ugh. I was starting to wonder what was taking you so long.What?! Ladybug sent over her second fiddle?
You know what? I'm sure I can find Ladybug a much better Queen Bee.
Okay, okay, we're good. Just give it to me. We've got work to do.
What's the magic word?
Oh, c'mon. Everyone knows that it's buzz on.
Uh uh uh.
Oh. That magic word.Could you give me my Miraculous, Cat Noir? Please.
Sorry, I didn't get that.
Please!
Greetings, my queen.
Pollen, buzz on!
Why don't we fly in there and fight already?
We won't be able to defeat them if don't know what they're planning.
Good luck, Scarlet Moth.
Ladybug, Cat Noir, behold my powerful army and have no doubt that today belongs to Scarlet Moth!
Ha, I told you so! If that fly-weight is talking to them, it means that Ladybug and “Mister Whiskers” is still around, and on the good guys' side.
Yay! Ladybug! Ladybug!
Don't get too cocky Hawk Moth. I'm gonna sting you where it hurts.
It's only like ten villains for everyone of us. Who wants Hawk Moth? How about we play rock, paper , scissors for it.
I got your back.
No, I got your back.
No, I do.
No, I do.
So, what's the heroes' plan m'lady?
Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait!

How'd you pull this off, Alya? You're the best. I can't believe you got everyone to swap seats so I can sit next to Adrien. Then again, it might not be the best idea. It could keep me from paying attention in class, and if I fail it'd be a total disaster because then Adrien and I would never have our own house, the three kids, the hamster named–
Whoa girl, what are you talking about? You're not sitting next to Adrien. Your seat's over there.
At the back? Why? What's going on?
Well since she's got a hearing issue, there's no way she can sit at the back of the class, right? Which means she needed a place up in the front.
So to make it work Ivan sat next to Mylène, Nate sat next to Alix, besides she came up with the idea of moving Nino here, so now we get to spend more time together.
Who is this \she\"?"
Good morning, students. I'm sure you've all heard by now, but Lila's home from her trip to Achu and she's back in school with us again.
Hi, everyone.
Hi, Lila.
Oh, a seat in the front row! You all remembered my hearing issue! You're such sweethearts, all of you.
You have a hearing problem, Lila?
Yes, I suffer from tinnitus, a constant ringing in my left ear. I've had it ever since the sound of an airplane engine burst my eardrum on the runaway when I was saving Jagged Stone's lost kitten.
Isn't Jagged Stone's pet a crocodile?

Now it is, yes. But he had a kitten until he found out he was allergic to it. The best part is, since you're such an excellent student, Adrien, you'll be able to help me catch up with all the schoolwork I missed while I was traveling with my parents. Would you do that for me?
Sure, Lila.
Miss Bustier, why do I have to sit in the back now?
Do you have any trouble hearing or seeing, Marinette?
Uh, I… I…
My eyesight and hearing are good. I'll sit in the back of the class and you two can sit up front. I don't mind.
No!
My return is causing so much trouble, maybe I should have just stayed on the other side of the world. If Marinette has an issue too, then I should be the one to go and sit in the back. It's okay.
I don't actually have any trouble seeing or hearing. I mean…
Good, so there's no problem then. You sit here, Lila, Adrien, you stay where you are and, Marinette, you sit in the back row.

Ah, high school, the arena of teenage angst, where emotions are so intense. A perfect stadium for my dear akumas. Being separated from your friends, becoming isolated:just what devastating anger is made of. Fly away and evilize this angry high school girl.
Open your books to page 23.
Strange, I feel the fury dying down, but the wheels are in motion. It's only a matter of time, be patient now my akuma.
That's for you, Lila!
Thank you. You're so sweet!
Here's your appetizer, Lila!
And I've got your main course!
I'll fetch your dessert!
I'm sorry I can't carry my own tray. It's almost impossible with this sprained wrist.
Sorry.
Lila's totally lying. She made up that whole tinnitus story just so she could sit next to Adrien, and her sprained wrist's completely bogus, too.
I don't get it, Marinette. You barely know Lila. Why all the hate?

Fine, I'll tell you everything.You remember Lila when she first came to school right after the summer break? She was only here for one day and then she left on that 'round-the-world trip. Everyone was captivated by her. Something just felt off to me. So I followed her.
What?
Not only did Ladybug save my life, we've become very close friends.
She lies with every breath.
Wait. You eavesdropped on Lila and Adrien? That's not cool.
A good reporter always verifies her sources. Can you prove she doesn't actually know Ladybug?
Well I–uh… I… I…Okay! You want proof she's lying? Hey Lila! You forgot your napkin!
Ha, ha! See that? It's obvious she doesn't have a sprained wrist.
Uh, ow! Once when I was in India, I witnessed someone getting their eye gouged out by the corner of a napkin. If I hadn't caught it, this napkin could've injured Max. I didn't have a choice. Ow!
Lila, you saved my eye! You sacrificed yourself for me.
Why wouldn't I, Max? Ouch. You're my friend.
We'll take you to the nurse's office.
Are you proud of yourself?
Lila's in even more pain now, all because of you.
No, no, don't blame Marinette. She was just trying to give me a napkin. Right, Marinette?
Marinette? Oh, are you crying?
No, I'm not!
I can sense that you don't like me, but I don't understand why. We barely know each other.
Miss Show-Off here was trying to impress you.

Don't tell me it's because of this new seating arrangement in class!It is! Of course, you're jealous because I'm sitting next to Adrien, because you would've given anything to sit there yourself. You know what? It's really not worth fighting over a boy. You and I could be friends, and who knows, I might even be able to help you with Adrien.

You and I will only be friends the day you stop lying, Lila!I can't prove it, but I know for a fact that you don't have tinnitus, that your wrist is just fine, that you don't know Prince Ali because you've never even stepped foot in Achu, and despite what you got Alya to write on her Ladyblog, Ladybug has never saved your life!
I only tell people what they want to hear.
It's called lying!

There's nothing you can do about it, anyway. People can't resist when they hear what they like to hear. If you don't want to be my friend, fine! But soon you won't have any friends left at all. And trust me, I'll make sure you never get close to Adrien in class or anywhere. You seem a little less dumb than the others, so I'll give you one last chance. You are either with me or against me. You don't have to answer right away. I'll give you 'till the end of class today.
I thought Chloé was evil, but Lila really takes the whole cake! She's like a supervillain who doesn't even need a costume!
You mustn't let her get to you, Marinette.
If I don't manage to expose her lies, she'll ruin my life, Tikki. She'll turn my friends against me, including Adrien!
Yes! I can feel it. The anger's about to emerge!
Marinette, look out!
Aah! An akuma!
Hey, Lila.

Adrien, we'll have to figure when you're gonna help me catch up on all the schoolwork I missed. I also heard you play piano, my uncle's the great pianist Chuch Boroughchuck. He wanted to teach me when I was little, but I had to stop playing because of arthritis. But when my wrist gets better, I'd love for you to give me some lessons.
Lila, I'm perfectly happy being friends with you, and I'll gladly help you catch on your schoolwork, but please don't lie to me like you did last time with Ladybug.
So I'm guessing you're not a descendant of a superhero, either.
She's more like a super liar.
Ladybug's the liar.
I'm not judging you, Lila, but instead of making friends you're going to turn everyone against you. You can tell me if there's something bothering you. I can help. But you need to be honest with me.
Are you trying to be some superhero lecturing me just like Ladybug did? Well thanks, but no thanks. Ugh.
I'm still here if you need help catching up with your schoolwork.
You can resist it, Marinette. Hawk Moth's power only effects people who think there's no solution to their problems, and you always find a solution.
You're right! You won't get me, I'm proud, I'm confident, I'm Marinette!
What's happened? The anger has disappeared. Hmm, but I can feel something new arising.
I can't stand those super goody-two-shoes.Yes, here's my chance!
We can't let this akuma run loose.
Tikki, spots on! Ha!
Come here, akuma.Hawk Moth, I am Lila. I know you want to destroy Ladybug and so do I.
Yes, I remember you.
Give me supervillain powers and I'll give you her and Cat Noir's Miraculous.
With pleasure. I have some new powers for you, Chameleon.
I gotta find another way.
Hey.

Adrien, I wanted to apologize for what just happened. I've thought about it and you're right. I want us to be friends, so I'll never tell another lie again. Will you make peace with me?Whoops, I lied.
Adrien, Adrien!
Nino, I have something to tell you. You don't deserve my friendship or your girlfriend or your cap.
Hey!
You should see your faces, don't miss my performance at the Eiffel Tower. You're gonna love it.
What? Not Adrien.
Hey, thank you Ladybug.
My balloon. Mommy!
Thank you.
Oh no, he's gonna fall.
La, la, la, la, la, la, la, la, la, la, la, la, la, la, la, la, la whoa.This is so easy, as soon as someone needs saving, that stupid Ladybug shows up. La, la, la, la, la, la, la.
Adrien, stop!
Ah, help me. I'm losing my balance, I'm gonna fa–
Yeah, woo-hoo!
My princess charming, you saved my life.
You are not Adrien!
You're right, I'm Chameleon. You're getting better at this, Ladybug. Which is a good thing. It'll make this fight all the more interesting.
I know where your akuma is, Chameleon. Time to de-evil–uh, but the akuma!
If this an enchanted sleep, what can possibly wake him up?Oh no, not an enchanted kiss! Please! Nobody will ever know.
Plagg, what happened? And what are you doing?
Oh, me? Nothing I, uh… your friend Lila put you to sleep with an evil kiss. You should be more careful picking your friends.
Lila must've been re-akumatized. Quick Plagg, claws out!
Quentin! Quentin!
Ladybug, I saw the supervillain running away.
Thanks! Don't stay here, okay? It's dangerous.Come out of there, Chameleon!
My Quentin! You found him, Ladybug.
Found him?
Ladybug, look out!
It's down to the two of us, Ladybug. Cataclysm!
I'm gonna find out who you really are, Chameleon!
I'll find out who you are first, don't you worry.Too bad Cat Noir's power is gonna destroy you.
If you manage to touch me!
Get me his Miraculous, now!
No! I wanna get hers first!
Nowhere to run now, Ladybug.
I don't intend to. T-shirt) A T-shirt?
That's your plan to defeat me, Ladybug? Make me dress like you? On second thought, such horrible fashion might actually do me in.
Failed again.Cataclysm!
Good job Chameleon, become Ladybug, then once you put her to sleep you can simply give me her Miraculous.
Ladybug!
) We should be friends, notanemones .
Wow, you certainly got that supervillain to clam up, m'lady. But we're still not out of the woods yet. Where's the akumatized object?
I think I might have an idea. Waiter?
Ahem.
If you wouldn't mind.
Yes, Ladybug, at your service.Mademoiselle.
Thank you. We're about to find out what you really look like Chameleon.
You'll see, it's an old acquaintance.
No more evildoing for you, little akuma. Time to de-evilize! (captures the akuma with her Miraculous Ladybug!
Don't worry, you look good even without your cap.
Hey!
Lila?
Ladybug?
At least now you can say I saved your life for real. Truce?
Thanks, Ladybug.I'd be honored to call you my friend.
Yeah, I'm happy to hear that. Hey, some advice. You don't have to lie and pretend to be something you're not. People will like you just for being yourself.
You have my word, Ladybug.
Bug out!
Bye!
I sense a talent like no other in this young Lila. I'm sure that her feelings about Ladybug will serve my purposes well in the end. One way or another.
Of course Ladybug saved my life. She never misses an opportunity to rescue her best friends.
Didn't your tinnitus give you vertigo when you went up the Eiffel Tower?
Oh no. Ladybug knows me so well that she brought me an earplug to stick in my right ear.
Right ear?! Did she say right ear?! This morning she said that the ringing was in her left ear! I've got her this time!
Are you going to tell everyone?
'Course I am. Lila is—
A liar. Yes, I know. But do you really think exposing her will make things better? If you humiliate her, she'll just be hurt more. Making a bad guy suffer has never turned them into a good guy.
Ladybug and I are like two peas in a pod.
So we just stand by and let her lie?
As long as you and I both know the truth, does it really matter?
You're right, maybe it's not such a big deal.
Good afternoon, everyone.
Good afternoon, Miss Bustier.
Good for you for taking the high road, Marinette. Hey, it's pretty cool back here.
Lila?
Here.
Adrien? outside, front staircase.
Present.
Max?
Present.
Stay focused now Marinette.
Marinette?
Don't get distracted.
Marinette?
Otherwise you'll flunk school. And then how are you and Adrien—
Marinette?
—gonna get that house, and have three kids and a hamster named—
Marinette, Miss Bustier's called your name three times already.
Oh.
Looks like you have trouble hearing after all, Marinette. Why don't you come sit up here in the front row next to Lila.
Miss Bustier, this is incredible. My tinnitus, I don't feel it anymore. It's gone. it's a miracle. It must be Ladybug's doing, I can sit in the back now.
Excuse me, Miss Bustier, can I go and sit next to Marinette? Nino and I can't stop chatting it up.
You didn't think I'd let my BFF sit all by herself, did you?
Excuse me Miss Bustier, can I move, too, please? I'd like to sit next to Nino again.Sorry Lila, he's my best friend.
Can I have my old seat back, too, please?
Can I go back to where I was?
Me too!
Catch you later, Marinette. Bye.
I see you've made your decision Marinette.From now on, you and I are at war. You will lose your friends and wind up all alone and Adrien will soon be mine.
We'll see about that, Lila, we'll see.
Come on, look at all the nice plushies, don't you want to play with them?
Dolls? I hate dolls. I hate toys. They're for babies.
Yes, but you're too young to play Grim Monster Clash 3.
No I'm not, and I'm not scared of monsters anymore, you know. I'm—
A big kid, yes, I know.Why don't we watch a cartoon instead? I have \Pototty and Potato\" if you want?"
That show's for babies. I'm a big boy.
We could play with your snow globe?
Ew!
Uh…
Hey, what's that?
That? Oh, uh, it's nothing.
Hey, no fair! Come on! What are all those gifts?

Uh, look I can't tell you that these are the gifts I've made for Adrien's next 35 birthdays. Cause you'd tell your brother Nino and he'd tell Adrien and Adrien'd think that I'm totally crazy. Wait, maybe I am.Hm. I can't tell you I'm one of Santa Claus's elves on a secret mission and that I'm looking after one of his boxes of gifts. You wouldn't be interested though because gifts are for babies, right? And you're a big kid.
That's a lie!
What, that you're a big kid?
No, that you're one of Santa Claus's elves!
I can't say anything more.
Hey wait, that means you can give me my Christmas present early! Grobotech Ultimate Destructor! It's easy, it's gotta be the biggest one in the box.
Now wait a minute, I thought toys were for babies.
They are, most of the time. But Grobotech's different.

You don't say. Well, I'm sorry, but Christmas rules are very strict. You don't open gifts early. Santa gives them at Christmas, not at Easter or Halloween. Otherwise you'd might as well have a bunny or a witch delivering your presents.
But, since you know him, you could ask him. Can't just you call him on the phone or send him an email?

Oh no, you never disturb Santa Claus except at Christmas. The rest of the year he's… in the North Pole... d-of the, uh, supervising the production of toys.Besides, your present isn't here anyway. We elves don't watch over gifts for kids we know. One of the elves must have it. Santa's the only one who would know where to find it because he knows who's getting what. He has a list of good children.There is one exception to the Christmas rule.
Really? What is it, what is it?
Santa is allowed to make one exception but only for the best-behaved kid in the whole world.
Who's the best-behaved kid in the whole world?
Hm, maybe Ladybug?
Well, seeing as she saved Paris a gazillion times, that makes sense.
Or a kid for example who cleans up all the mess he's made and plays quietly with toys that are for kids his age?
Marinette, we're back.
Did you guys have fun?
Sure we did. How was the movie?
Awesome. Thanks for watching my bro, Marinette. What's wrong, little dude?
AH! I want it to be Christmas right now!
I have absolutely no idea where that came from.
Okay, I guess we'd better get going. Bye, girl.
See you at school tomorrow.
Yeah, bye Nino, see you soon Chris.
A Christmas elf on a secret mission, seriously, Marinette, don't you think you went too far this time?

I know, Tikki, it was pure ridiculousness. But I couldn't tell him the truth about the gifts. Besides, I simply told Chris a nice little story, which hopefully will teach him some patience.Speaking of patience, I've got an idea of what I can give Adrien for his 50th birthday! Give me a hand?
Um? Mm hm.
Wha- um, snow? Whoa, how long was I asleep?Ah!
It's over Santa Claus, you're surrounded. Surrender and don't put up a fight!
Searching for Santa Claus far and wide!
Searching for Santa Claus far and wide!
There's no way he can run
Get back on the sidewalks! Running in the roadway's against—
Santa Claus? Have you seen Santa Claus?
Okay, it's all just a dream. I'm going back to bed.Ow. Why did you do that, Tikki?
See, you're not dreaming.
Well if I'm not, it means…This does look like a nightmare though.
Tikki, spots on! Ha!
Santa Claus, have you seen Santa Claus?
Santa Claus? But it's not Christmas yet.
Nadja Chamack here, don't be bemused it's just the news.Paris has been literally invaded by giant toys looking for Santa Claus.
Major Teddiski here, Santa Claus. All your toys are belong to us. If you don’t give yourself up real quick, this little city of Paris will go kaboom, lickety split.
What's going on?
Cat Noir, you'll never guess what I just found.
Actually I think I know m'lady. I'm with Santa Claus we've taken refuge in the ice rink.
I'll meet you there.
I can't believe it! Are you really Santa Claus?
No, I'm the Easter Bunny in disguise. You can't see my long ears because of the hat. Of course I'm Santa Claus.
Oh, okay. I need you to know I've been a really good boy.
I smell a wood fire and cinnamon cookies. Santa Claus must be nearby! Soldiers, get in line!
At your command Colonel Woof-Woof.
Follow me this way.s Searching for Santa Claus far and wide! Searching for Santa—
To Luna, Maya, and Thalia. When I tell my daughters I've met you, they're going to freak out!
Santa Claus?I'm so glad you're alright, but what are you doing here, it's not Christmas yet.

I have no idea! I was busy supervising the production of toys for next Christmas with my elves when all of a sudden, bang! I woke up in my sleigh in the Paris sky. Flying catfishes destroyed my sleigh. My reindeer were able to get away, but if it hadn't been for Cat Noir, they would have captured me.
Don't you think this whole thing is kind of strange?
Stranger than fighting a pharaoh's reincarnation or a pigeon overlord empowered by magical butterflies, you mean?
Aha! Gotcha!
Ah!
My sense of smell has sniffed you out, Santa. Follow me and do not show resistance.
Stay back, Santa!
Christmaster demands his gift.
Christmaster?
Christmas gifts must be deserved, and they're only given at Christmas. If you think I'm going to bend the rules, you're barking up the wrong tree.
Now hold on a minute, there's no use in fighting, that's not the Christmas spirit, now is it?
Hm?
Would it be such a big deal if you gave the presents early, just this once?
Listen to the smart man.
And while we're at it, I asked for Super Blades and I could really use them for my upcoming competition.
I kinda like this idea. I asked for—
Stop! That's not the way it works.
Aw, why not?
Christmas rules are very strict. You don't open gifts early. I give them at Christmas, not Easter or Halloween. Otherwise…
…you might as well have a bunny or a witch delivering your presents!
Oh no, what have I done?
But couldn't you…
…make an exception?
Tradition is tradition if we stop respecting it, then it's the end of Christmas.
Aw.
Well, there is one case in which I could make an exception for—
—The best-behaved kid in the whole world.
The one at the top of your list of good children.
Bravo, Ladybug. At last someone who knows the rules of Christmas. But I doubt your Christmaster is the best-behaved kid in the whole world.
In that case, soldiers, attack!
Attack!
Ah!
Why so much hatred?

Ladybug, Cat Noir, protect Santa, I can take care of these toys!Hahahaha, triple axel, and a pike spin into a double toe loop.Not so high and mighty now, are we?Ow! Such sharp teeth for a toy! Get me out of here!
I think I know who the toys' master is. I should have thought of it sooner.
Who is he?
I just have to check first to be sure. May I Santa?That smell of a wood fire and cinnamon cookies. It's so Christmassy.You're up, Santa Cat.
This way! I smell Santa Claus's scent.
Ho ho ho! Merry Christmas everyone.
There he is! I can smell him. He is not far. Follow me!
Ladybug, Cat Noir, oh!
Come on Santa, I know where to find Christmaster.
Chris! Chris! Chris! Ladybug! My little bro Chris, he was in his bedroom and then he disappeared! Uh, Santa Claus?
Ho ho, hello, Nino!
Nino, I think Chris has been akumatized. Did you notice anything different about his room?
His favorite toys have gone missing, too.
Plastic soldiers, a catfish?
Yes! Plus his dinosaur.
So he is the toys' master. But, he could be anywhere, how are we gonna find him?
Please save the little dude, Ladybug.
Lucky Charm!
Stationary?
You make surprise gifts appear? Are competing with me, Ladybug?
Of course! You're right! A surprise gift!Could have my Christmas present right now, Santa? Please?
You know that I can't do that Ladybug.
Except…
For the best-behaved kid in the whole world. But…
It's certainly worth a try.
Unbelievable! Ladybug, you are the best-behaved kid in the whole world.
Well, seeing as she saved Paris a gazillion times, it totally makes sense.
\Dear Santa, I want the same gift as Chris Lahiffe, whatever it is.\" Are you sure about this? You know that this is the only gift you'll get this whole year from me. "
Yes, I know, but I'm doing it to save Paris and Nino's little brother.
Ah, you really do deserve to be at the top of my list. Merry Christmas, Ladybug.
Thank you Santa, now get to safety. I'll take it from here.
By the way Santa, where do I fall on the list?
Uh…
Aw…
Christmaster, I've got your Christmas present. Come and get it if you want it. Huh?Hm!
Wow, awesome! Grobotech Ultimate Destructor!
Mission accomplished Christmaster. We have captured Santa Claus.
He tried to trick us by dressing up as Cat Noir. But he couldn't fool us.
Hee hee.
You were tricked! That's Cat Noir dressed up as Santa Claus, not the other way around! You're such babies!Keep searching!

It doesn't matter, Christmaster, you don't need Santa Claus anymore now that you have your present. I, on the other hand, haven't yet received mine. Take Cat Noir's Miraculous. Then all you have to do is get a hold of Ladybug's magic jewels.
Give your paw, kitty cat, Hawk Moth wants your ring. It's a stupid dumb-dumb Christmas gift, but that's his price.Ladybug?
Christmas presents are delivered on Christmas Eve, and only to the good kids, Christmaster. I hate to say you and Hawk Moth didn't even make Santa's list.

That's where you're wrong, Ladybug. You've just brought me my second gift, which only goes to show what a good Hawk Moth I've been this year. Use the powers I gave you Christmaster and seize their Miraculous.
I have my secret weapons to fight you with. Yourselves!Have fun dumb-dumbs!
Well at least now we know for sure that the akuma is in his snow globe.
And we're gonna have to defeat ourselves!
Lucky charm!
Cataclysm!
Lucky charm!
Cataclysm!
Playtime never ends for these two.
Problem is, my playtime is up. I don't have much time left before I transform back.
Watch out!Then it's time to show them who the real game masters are.
Hahaha my toys are going to destroy you. You guys are such babies!
It's over! In a few seconds now their Miraculous will me mine! Christmas has come early this year!
Lucky charm!
Cataclysm!
What about using my power to destroy these toys?
Lucky charm!
If that's our only choice, but we need to save it to smash the snow globe.
Ho ho ho, paws off, you naughty toys.
Santa Claus!
At your service, Ladybug. There's no way I'm letting anything happen to the best-behaved kid in the world! I'll take care of these two!
The best-behaved kid in the world?
That's me!
Ah! No fair, my toys!
Come on Chris. Give me that snow globe. You've got your Christmas gift.
If you don't want me to take away your present, Christmaster,remember that you're supposed to bring me Ladybug and Cat Noir's Miraculous!
No, stop!Oh, no!
Destroy them, Grobotech Ultimate Destructor!Nobody can beat Grobotech Ultimate Destructor!
I can take it down, nothing can resist my Cataclysm.
I know but I'm gonna need it fully functional, follow my lead. Hey Grobothing, you want my Miraculous, come and get it!Over to you, Cat Noir.
Stop Grobotech!
Cataclysm!
No! Not my toy!
You have a choice, your toy or the snow globe.
No don't do that!
Ho ho ho, listen to Ladybug, kid, you won't regret it.
No!
Thank you Christmaster.
No more evildoing for you, little akuma. Time to de-evilize! Gotcha! Bye bye, little butterfly.

column2: Ladybug, Cat Noir, and Santa Claus
column4: Huh?

column1: Ladybug, Cat Noir, and Santa Claus
column4: Pound it!
Goodbye my friends.
Goodbye Santa Claus.
Goodbye? Why?
Because Santa was brought here by Christmaster's power, so when everything's repaired…
…I'll be gone, 'til next Christmas!
Miraculous Ladybug!
So big kid, feeling better?
Yeah, but, I don't remember much.
Don't worry, everything's fine.
Come on, big boy.
Cat Noir, could you take Chris back home please?
Sure thing.
Goodbye, Ladybug!
You stole my Christmas presents, Ladybug. But my birthday's coming soon, and trust me, I'll make sure it's a day you'll never forget.
Thanks again for looking after the little dude, Marinette.
Have fun!
Sure will! It'll be awesome. We're really good buddies.I know I shouldn't have told you that I was one of Santa's elves. But you were acting like—
A baby, I know. Mommy says lying is wrong. So from now on, we'll always tell each other the truth, okay?
Okay. As long as you stop trying to act all grown up.
You're not an elf, but you still have another secret, right?
Uh, another secret, what-what do you mean, like a secret identity?
No, the secret in that chest!
Hm?
Okay. The truth. There's this guy at school I have a crush on-
Ew! No stop! I hate romantic stuff. Gross!
Oh, I am so in love.I dream about holding his hand, looking at the stars together...
How about inviting him to a movie then?
Right, Tikki. Can you imagine that conversation?
\Hey Adrien, would you like to gah— wuh,glah.\""
Exactly. I can't help it. Every time I see him,I get all clammy and I feel like fainting.
So... basically the only way you could have a normal conversation with him, is if you're blindfolded.
Pretty much.
There is a very simple solution, Marinette, it's called a cell phone. You just need his number.
I know who'll have Adrien's number!
I'm sure you've outdone yourself, Théo.
It was my honor. And I can't wait to meet Ladybug, I hope she'll autograph the photo I used as the inspiration for the statue.
Oh, it's nearly time. Ladybug and Cat Noir should already be here by now.
Look, we all know improv's not your bag,so just stick to this script.
But all the teachers say I don't sound natural when I read.
Then memorize it. It's pretty simple. You can do this. Just don't improvise. Got it?
Forget it! This is never gonna work!
Too late. It's dialing.
Hey, this is Adrien's voicemail. Leave a message.
It's gone to voicemail!
Leave a message! Don't improv!
Uhh, hello. Uh, Adrien's voicemail, uh, this is Marinette, who, uh, has a message for you, of course, cause it's, uh, your phone, so, umm...Callmeseeyoulater,bye!

What? What did you expect me to say? \Hey, hot stuff, this is Marinette, I'd ask you on a date to a movie, but I've got such a crazy crush on you that the only way I can talk to you without foaming out the mouth is over this stupid phone.\" Pretty ridiculous, right?"
If you wish to hear your message again, press 1. If you wish to erase your message, press 2.
Hit 2! Hit 2!
Message saved. Goodbye.
It's not as bad as you think.
Hmm?
Okay, it's bad. But you were gonna have to tell him one of these days, some way or another. Think of it this way: no more secrets!
The voicemail recorded my whole conversation.
Big deal!
I called him \hot stuff\". He cannot be allowed to hear that message, Alya! If he does, I'll die of shame!"
Okay, okay. I got an idea. If Adrien's phone went to voicemail, it means the dude's busy. Which also means you can get to it before he does. Hmm, I wonder where he'd be...
Of course! He's got fencing club after school, that's why he didn't pick up! It ends in exactly twenty-two and a half minutes.
You are seriously insane. You know that, right?
Ahhhhh!
You have 1 new message.
Gotta get a drink of water. I'll be right back.Plagg, you pig!
You have 1 new message.
Move, please, so I can check my voicemail. Hmm, don't recognize this number. Oh no, now we're late! Time to transform, Plagg!
Woo-hoo! Yeah-ha-ha! Ha! Hahaha!Hey, everybody!
They're unveiling Ladybug and Cat Noir's sculptures today! I totally spaced!
Me too.
Uh, you never mentioned going to the unveiling before.
I'm not, I mean, I am! Uh, I mean, I forgot?
Listen. About Adrien's cellphone, what if we go right after?
If we wait after the ceremony, Adrien's fencing training will be over, and he'll have his phone back by then.
Shoot. I gotta cover this event for the Ladyblog... I'm sorry, Marinette!
Don't sweat it. I can manage. I think!
You sure?
Yes, yes. I'm sure.
Cool. Good luck, and stay out of trouble. And don't improv!
Isn't Ladybug supposed to be at the unveiling?
Yes, but Marinette needs to be at the school first.
But it is a ceremony in your honor.
And it's my honor that's at stake right now. I'll be in and out of there in five minutes. We can be at the ceremony in no time!
Excuse me, Cat Noir, but Ladybug's not here.
Don't worry about Ladybug. I'm sure she'll be here any minute. I can handle this situation alone for now. I'm the one in charge anyway, you know.
It's just that, I wanted to ask her to autograph this photo. She's amazing. She's so brave and smart, the way she always saves everyone...
Perhaps the ceremony should commence. It might bring her here faster.
Please, just one minute more, Mayor Bourgeois, she's going to come, I can feel it...
...I'm there!
Oh boy.
Which one's his?
If you call him, you'll make his phone ring.
Nice, Tikki!
It's only proper for Paris to pay homage to those to protect us from evil.Ladybug and Cat Noir!
Can I get some photos for the Ladyblog?
Hurry, they're finishing up!
Here it is!Gah! It's locked!
Ta-dah!
These statues are amazing. One thing's slightly off though— I'm actually taller than Ladybug.

Ladybug didn't show up. I just wanted to express my adoration for her. Let her know that everything I had went into her statue. I'm sure if she took a little time to get to know me, she would see how much we have in common. Our devotion to the things we love.
Hey, don't mean to burst your bubble, but you know, Ladybug and me, we're a thing, you know?
Really?
Yeah, we're like this.
What does Ladybug see in him?
They're coming! Put back the phone!
I haven't erased the message yet!
We're out of time and we really ought to be getting to that ceremony, come on!
Whew! That was rough. Ha ha.
A thing, huh? You don't even take love seriously. Calling it a thing... You don't deserve her! I do!
Disappointed by Ladybug and jealous of Cat Noir. The perfect formula for disaster.Fly away, my little akuma, and evilize him!
Hello, Copycat. I am Hawk Moth. Once you get rid of Cat Noir, you can take his place. And Ladybug will be yours forever.
The very thought of it makes me purr.
Ugh, where is it?
What are you looking at me for? I didn't eat it. I swear!

How do you listen to messages on this—Home?It's Adrien! He's looking for his phone! What if he tracks it?He'll figure out I stole it, I'll be arrested for grand theft, I'll spend the rest of my life in jail, and worse, I'll never get to go to the movies with Adrien!
Oh, Marinette. You really need to get your priorities in order.
I know. Some days it feels impossible to balance being Marinette and being Ladybug.
Hey, this is Adrien's voicemail. Leave a message.
Ugh, it must still be at the gym.
Don't mind me. Just stealing this painting. Go about your business.
Hey!
I gotta get this on camera!
And in some astonishing news, there's been a spectacular theft at the Louvre. Amateur video showed without a shadow of a doubt that the thief is none other than the famous hero, Cat Noir.
This painting is the cat's meow.
Cat's meow?Not only is that person a fake, he's a terrible fake!
Thanks, now for your weather.
Maybe it would help if you took off those silly mittens.
And risk leaving fingerprints? No way.
Problem fixed?
Almost. I haven't erased the message yet, but I'm working on it as we speak.
No way. You palmed his phone?
Yes? No? Uhh... I mean, I was planning to give it back. Actually, where are you? I can use some help.
No can do. I'm waiting for additional deets at the Louvre on the Cat Noir robbery.
What? Somebody robbed Cat Noir?
No, girl. Didn't you hear? Cat Noir came in and stole the Mona Lisa! In broad daylight! Ladybug's gonna turn up for sure, and I do not wanna miss this. Just chill and I'll be over later.
'Kay.Cat Noir is a lot of things, but he's no thief.Time to transform!
Tikki, spots on! Ha!
Whoa! Easy, tigers! You've got the wrong cat! That thief's an impostor. I'm the real Cat Noir!
Let me check out where the robbery took place. I have a knack for finding clues. You know, animal instincts.
Of course. Come with me. Thanks for your help, Cat Noir.
Hey! I'm the real Cat Noir! I'm way slicker than that guy.
Kitty's in the slammer. I repeat, kitty's in the slammer.
Mr. Mayor, this is ridiculous. I'm sure there's a simple explanation.
Kitty's in the slammer, Ladybug.
Don't think you're gonna keep him in there—
Now, now. Leave it to the experts, Ladybug. We've got it under control.
Hmph!
Thanks for the warm hospitality, but I gotta split, so... I'll just say this one more time. You've got the wrong cat!
Cat Noir is getting away!
Well, if he's so innocent, then why is he running away?
Well, if you were wrongly imprisoned, wouldn't you run?
Requesting assistance, I repeat, requesting assistance. We are in pursuit of the suspect...
Cat Noir, what's going on?
You know I'm innocent, don't you, Bugaboo?
Stop playing around and calling me Bugaboo. This is really serious!
I'm gonna find the real culprit and save my tail. I'll get back to—
Wha!
Huh?
Give yourself up, Cat Noir!
Aren't you gonna go after him?
Uhh, I'll leave it to the experts.
Come on, let's get him!
If you want my opinion, I'd say the thief was akumatized.
That much I had figured. See that lollipop stick? The sculptor. How did I not see that jealousy coming a mile away?
Yours or his?
Ha ha, so funny.
Gotcha, Copycat.
Huh? Cat Noir, where are you?
I found his den.
Who?
My Copycat.
I'm not getting you.
If you'd been there this morning, you'd know what I was talking about.
Well? Tell me where you are.
No, this is between me and him. I got myself into this mess, so I'm gonna get myself out.
Uhh, Cat? Cat!
Cat's in the bag?
Cataclysm!
I don't get what Ladybug sees in you. A fool who so easily falls into my trap.
Looking for this? Which one should I pick up? My one or my one?
Ladybug, hurry up. I've caught the impostor at Théo Barbot's workshop.
I'll be there in thirty seconds.
Don't come here, Ladybug! It's a trap!
Too late, Cat. Ladybug's on her way, which was my plan all along.
She won't be duped. She knows me too well.
I know you well too.And from now on, she'll love me, not you!
Love me? ...You're right! She loves me! That's why she'll be able to reveal your true identity!
Copycat, stop this small talk and get me Cat Noir's Miraculous!
