About your new commercial...
Pound it!
I'll start over a hundred times if I have to, Ladybug! All I have to do is win once!
Scales rest.
Thanks, Luka—
This really takes the cake!
Grand Master Su-Han?
Nine! You used nine Miraculouses to defeat a single villain, when Cat Noir could have just used his Cataclysm!
I had to, Cat Noir was missing!
What do you mean missing? You can't just let the holder of the most powerful Miraculous go about as he pleases! What if he started making his own decisions, or act it out? Like Shadow Moth!
Cat Noir? Act like Shadow Moth? Wow. Are you blowing this out of proportion just a little?
Not at all. In fact, you should find out who Cat Noir really is, so you can have better control over him.
What? No way! We can't know our true identities! It would be too dangerous if Shadow Moth got a hold of one of us!
I. Don't. Care!! Deal with this problem quickly, otherwise I will take back his Miraculous as soon as he shows a whisker! And I'll choose the new Cat Noir myself!
Okay, okay, alright. What if you knew who he was, would that work?
I... I suppose so. But I'm warning you, if you don't succeed...
I get it. Cat Noir will be replaced.
Are you really going to do as he asks?
Do I really have a choice in the matter? I can't fight the Celestial Guardian, and I don't want the risk of losing our Cat Noir. I'm gonna need both of you.
I hope Ladybug didn't need me. Plagg, claws out!
Fourteen messages? She must be furious.
Finally!
I know what you're about to say, Ladybug, but—
Nevermind! We got through it. That's all that matters. But we do need to talk. Meet me at the top of the Eiffel Tower.
I get the feeling I'll have my whiskers yanked.
I'm wondering, Ladybug. How do you plan to reveal Cat Noir's identity to Su-Han if you don't know who he is?
Remember why you must all ignore who Cat Noir and I really are?
So Shadow Moth leaves us alone when we're not superheroes? If we don't know who you are, we're no interest to him.
Yes. But in fact, if worse comes to worst, a Miraculous holder could know Cat Noir's identity or mine, but not both.
That way, there'd always be one of you to fight Shadow Moth!
Exactly! But for Cat Noir and me, it's different. If we knew each other's identities, all would take is just for one of us to be akumatized to betray the other.
And Shadow Moth would win.
Tikki, spots on!
Sass, scales slither!
This is the plan: you stay here hidden. I ask Cat Noir his identity. He tells me...
Since I'll hear everything, I'll also know his name.
That's when you'll use your power of Second Chance to go back in time. I'll forget everything but you won't.
Or I could just ask him myself if you want. It'd be less dangerous that way, wouldn't it?
Cat Noir will only tell if I'm the one asking.
Alright, and then I'll tell the Celestial Guardian Cat Noir's identity.
And then he'll finally got me some slack.
Are you sure the fact that I know who Cat Noir is won't be a problem?
Like I said, as long as I don't know who he is, everything will be fine.
Do you think Cat Noir would agree to this?
He's been dying to tell me who he is for the longest time.There he is! Get ready!
Now! We're in sync!
Second Chance!
The countdown has begun. It's 1 am, and we've got just five minutes before you transform back. So we've got to be done by 1:05. You'll rewind on my signal.
I'm sorry, but I really couldn't make it earlier.
Hey, no big deal! That's the good thing about a team. It's not the two of us anymore!
Oh, yeah! So then, why did you need me exactly?

Well... actually, it's kind of linked to what happened today. I've given it a lot of thought ever since I became guardian, you know?And, I've realized that... you were right after all.We should tell each other our secret identities.
But, aren't the secrets supposed to protect us?

I thought so. But when you didn't show up today, I didn't know how to locate you because we can't communicate when we're not transformed. If something bad happened to one of us when we're not heroes, we could know about it. It would make us stronger. We'd be able to defeat Shadow Moth quicker!
So, we're doing this, for real?
Yes.
Wow. Okay. You go ahead, m'lady. Guardians first!
No, you first.
Let's do it together.
No, I mean it. You go first. I'm... feeling kind of... awkward.
Fine. I'm... I'm... Adrien Agreste.
And I'm Audrey Bourgeois!You? Adrien Agreste? There's no way! You two aren't alike at all!
Claws in.
See? It's really me, Adrien Agreste. What about you?
Ladybug! I heard his name! Shall I rewind?
No— Wait— Not— Not yet.

I understand. It's never easy to show your true self to someone. You'd wonder what the other person would think of you if they'll like you. It's hard for me, too, you know? My heart's beating so fast, I've waited for this moment for so long! Imagine the stories that I have come up with when you saved my life as Adrien, or when you wanted to give me another Miraculous! It was awful having to hide Cat Noir from you. I'm so glad I don't have to do that anymore! I hope you're not too disappointed. But whoever you are behind that mask, you'll always be the most amazing person in the world.
Ladybug! We're almost out of time!
Oh no, there's no going back now.
I hope she knows what she's doing.
I am... Ma— Ma— Mari— madly awkward!
Take all the time you need. I'll wait 'til you're ready. Besides, now that you know who I am, you know where to find me!
Uhh, right! I'll take my think to time— er— uh— see you sooner!
What made you change your mind?
I... guess I'm just curious to see what's gonna happen. After that...
But you said it was too dangerous to know his identity.
As long as Cat Noir doesn't know who I am, it'll be okay. And I'm gonna make sure of that, starting with Grand Master Su-Han.
This is wonderful! Since Cat Noir's in love with Ladybug, that means he's in love with you! You and Adrien can finally be together!

It's not that simple, Tikki. I'm in love with Adrien, but I've never been in love with Cat Noir.It's as if they are two completely different people! Is the Adrien I'm in love with the fake Adrien? Is Cat Noir the \real\" Adrien? Who's the real Adrien behind Adrien?"
I don't know. Why don't you ask Alya?
I can't. She already knows I'm Ladybug. She can never know that Adrien is Cat Noir. It'd be too dangerous.
When she's ready, she will tell me who she is! In the meantime, she'll get to know me!And then, who knows?I'm so char-meow-ing after all!
I usually like smelly cheese, but I get the feeling that this is gonna turn into some really really stinky cheese.
Woohoohooo!
Who can tell me who wrote \I Am a Cat\"?"
Meow meow?
Or in human language, Natsume Sōseki.
He wrote the book \I Am a Cat\". Sorry for the joke, Ms. Bustier!"
Sorry, I'm so madly awkward. Uh— I mean clumsy. I'm madly clumsy—
Don't worry about cat— Uh, I mean, that! It happens to everyone.
I only want them to be mine, mine, mine. Dreaming about them in the nights! You know I love unicorns And nothing makes me feel better!
I feel like you're not hearing the same tune anymore when you look at Adrien.
I think that song sounded great!
Luka, have you ever thought you knew a person really well only to find out that they have a secret side to them that you couldn't possibly imagine?
Yes.
And, did it... completely change your way of seeing them? Like all of a sudden, everything feels strange 'cause you don't really know them anymore?
Quite the opposite, actually. Once I got over the shock, it helped me to get to know them better, and liked them even more.
Sorry, I... I think I'm thirsty!
Adrien, the lollipop monster is back. Meet me at the Arc de Triomphe!
Right away! Plagg, claws out!
The usual manouvers, m'lady?
Pound it.
Claws in!
Well, see you next time, m'lady!
Wait! I'm... I'm ready now.
Spots off.
Please, say something!
I guess, now that you know it's me, you don't like me anymore.
No!It's that, I just found out that one of my closest friends is the person I love and admire most in the world.
Come, my fine cat, against my loving heart; sheathe your sharp claws, and settle. And let my eyes into your pupils dart, where agate sparks with metal.
I can't wait to see you.
Me too.
See you at the movies tomorrow, then!
Are you hanging up?
No, you hang up!
Sweet dreams, m'lady.
Adrien, get up.
Yes, Father.
Follow me.
Yes, Father.
This way.
Did you know this was in your house?
I'm not even sure we're still in my house. Stay hidden, Plagg.Mom?
One hundred weeks since she disappeared. One hundred times have I wanted to tell you.Nooroo, Dusuu, dual metamorphosis!

One hundred times have I tried to seize Ladybug and Cat Noir's Miraculous to bring her back! To think that this illusion was right here right under my roof!Ephemeral, I am your father Shadow Moth. I'm giving you the power to speed up time and help me bring your mother back. All I ask in return are Ladybug's Miraculous... and yours.
No! You can't ask me to do that! No, no!
Do you understand me, son?
Yes, Father.
Cataclys—!!
Enough, kwami! I am your master now!
Adrien?
Hello, Ladybug.
Tikki, spots on!
Lucky Charm!
Could this be the hour of your defeat?
I'm sorry, I promise this won't take long.
Time flies when we're having fun!Running is pointless! In just a few seconds you'll be a simple young girl without powers again!
\Sass is in my sewing box\"?Marinette! "
Those earrings are MINE!!!
NO! NO! ADRIEN, HELP!
Ah!Yes! My greatest wish will finally come true!
Sorry! Marinette sent me.
Sass!
Don't worry, he knows.
Sass, Marinette sent me this. I think she wants me to go back to this exact moment. But she knows I can no longer do that.
You can't, but I can. I can go back to any temporal marker that has been placed in the past.
But when a Kwami uses their power without a holder it always has disastrous consequences!
The situation must really be desperate for the guardian to suggest that!
Oh no! Not that, not again! It's the end of the world!
What's going on?
Shadow Moth must have taken control of Ladybug and Cat Noir's Miraculous, and he made a wish!
But what has that got to do with the end of the world?

Imagine the world as your school notebook. Everything inside is written in blue, but now you want it to be red instead. Before you can rewrite anything in the color you'd like, you have to erase everything that's already been written in blue!
That's what happens when someone makes a wish! The universe is destroyed, and then entirely rebuilt! But who knows how...
Sass, hurry!
Second Chance!
The countdown has begun. It's 1 am, and we've got just five minutes before you transform back. So we've got to be done by 1:05. You'll rewind on my signal.
I'm sorry, but I really couldn't make it—
What on earth is happening?
It's like history's all jumbled up!
Hark, what are those voices I hear? Bertrand? Gilles? My, what sorcery is this?
Time has gone crazy! Or maybe I have...
I have a bad feeling about this. Viperion! Viperion, can you hear me? Follow me!
Ladybug, can you hear me?
Viperion! I've gotta talk to Sass!
Scales rest!
I'm so sorry, Ladybug, I had no choice!
What happened?
I'm not really sure. I just saw a photo of a lucky charm, a watch showing 1 am.
Do you understand any of this?
When kwamis use their power without a holder, it always has magical and disastrous consequences. And Sass's power is to turn back time!
So time has gotten all mixed up!
Stay here, Luka!
Liberty! Next stop, city hall!
Woah, I'm getting major Déjà vu right now!
It's time to have a genius idea, m'lady!
Lucky Charm!
Do you think this will be enough to tip the balance of time?
Oh, the International Bureau of Weights and Measures! This organization coordinates the hours of the whole world with its satellite! It's right near Paris!
Which means the satellite is just above our heads! We fix it, we fix all the connected devices that depend on time to function! How are we going to know the exact time to program into the satellite?

Thanks to this countdown, I still have a way to know what time it is for real. When it gets to the end, that'll mean that it's exactly 1:05 am. That's what we'll program into the satellite. Time to suit up!
Mmm. But, what's the plan with all the apparitions?
Leave them to my magical ladybugs.
Power up!
Let's sync up our stopwatches.
Now I have exactly the same countdown as you.
Power up!
Ready, Astro Cat?
Ready, Cosmobug!
Okay, take off!
Miraculous Ladybug!
Pound it!
Meow, meow, meow... Meow-meow!
That's a pretty tune, what is it?
A classical piece. Thus spoke Catathustra. By the way, what did you wanna talk about earlier, up on the Eiffel Tower?
Oh, nothing important. Forget about it.
Hmm. Atta blast!
Spots off!
So, do you know who Cat Noir is yet?
No.
What? I thought I had warned you—

I don't want to know. I've proven to you a hundred times that I'm a good guardian, and Cat Noir and I have proven to you a hundred times that we were exceptional superheroes, and you! How many times have you told us that we were messing up, when that was totally untrue? You're judging us based on your own fears, and not on our actions!
You're right, little Ladybug. Perhaps I'm worrying over nothing. What's for sure is that one doesn't come across a guardian like you every century.How do you say again?
Pound it.

Don't be bemused, it's just the news! The Louvre Museum will be unveiling its latest acquisition today: a mysterious statue carved from hardened lava, which was recently discovered on the highest mountaintops of Tibet, by the museum's curator, Mr. Kubdel.
Adrien.
Marinette, I asked Alix to get us into this unveiling so I could show you what I figured out about superheroes. Not so you could gawk at Adrien. You can do that any day at school, girl.
Super Adrien… —ah, heroes! I'm all ears.
Cool, so first you need to know that superheroes like Ladybug and Cat Noir get their powers from magic jewels called Miraculous.
You told me you're gonna stop researching Ladybug so you wouldn't jeopardize her secret identity!
Oh, I—I know. Except this research has nothing to do with her identity. I'm gonna help Ladybug unmask Hawk Moth! And I think I found a connection between superheroes, Hawk Moth, and the Miraculous.

Okay, I'm convinced Ladybug, Cat Noir, and other Miraculous holders have been depicted through the centuries. Until, for some unknown reason, they disappeared, and the world forgot about them. We already know this. The Ladybug from Ancient Egypt.
Here, a black knight, or Black Cat Miraculous holder.
Hmm…
Here, a lady, or a Butterfly superhero. Now this, Hercules, or Lion Miraculous holder.
Okay, so now there's a Lion Miraculous?
Why not a Bunny Miraculous while you're at it?

Now you know back in the day sculptures were painted, right? Most of the paint vanished over time, but tiny microscopic pigments still remain. Thanks to this special app, witness how it originally looked. But here's the big thing. All these works of art have something in common. It's the same symbol! Look, everywhere.It's like some kind of secret society emblem. As if a kind of Order of the Guardians has been watching over the superheroes since the beginning of time!
Huh, looks like the symbol on the Tibetan statue my old man found.
Nathalie, are you okay?
It's nothing, Adrien. Just a dizzy spell.
Maybe we should head home now.
According to my old man, the statue is almost two hundred years old!
From what I found, there hasn't been any Miraculous-wearing superheroes for the last two hundred years!
So… this statue would be the last known trace of a Miraculous.
Until Ladybug and Cat Noir showed up a few months ago to fight Hawk Moth, yeah!
That's rad!
I'm sure my video will help Ladybug unmask Hawk Moth!
Wait! You're gonna publish your theories on the Ladyblog?
Actually… I already uploaded a video.
The mystery of the Miraculous. It's beyond awesome!
For sure it is… right? Amazing! I'm sure Ladybug will be super excited about it. And so will Hawk Moth… I gotta go. I forgot I had, uh… homework! Catch you later!
It's like some kind of secret society emblem. As if a kind of Order of the Guardians has been watching over the superheroes since the beginning of time.
It's my fault, Master. I'm sorry. I never should have entrusted her with the Miraculous.
Alya is an excellent journalist. Sooner or later, she would have unveiled this secret kept under wraps for centuries. But don't worry. None of it can lead Hawk Moth to us.
This statue that arrived at the Louvre earlier this week.
Impossible! That's impossible! We are doomed!
Because of a statue? But just a second ago you were saying—
That's not a statue, Marinette. It's a Peacock!
But, Master, Cat Noir and I have already defeated sentimonsters created by Mayura.

Yes, but… None of them came close to the power of this one. It was born from a negative emotion of a young man who had no idea what he was creating. Remember when I told you I made a terrible mistake? For you to understand, I must tell you the entire story.I was younger than you when I was chosen to be a guardian. My parents told me that it was a great honor. That I couldn't turn it down. So they took me to the temple. I wasn't very happy there. I would have preferred to live with my parents and be with other children my age. I didn't want to be a guardian of anything. One of the test to become a guardian required me to watch over a grimoire he managed to save, and the Miraculous Box. The very last Miraculous Box. That's when I realized my sentimonster had devoured all the other Miraculous Boxes that were kept in the temple. And when the monks tried to stop it—the temple, the Order of the Guardians, everything… it was destroyed. I tried to run away from the sentimonster. But by doing so, I lost the grimoire and both the Butterfly and the Peacock Miraculous. I thought the sentimonster had disappeared forever.As soon as Hawk Moth finds out about it, he'll be able to use the power of the Peacock to bring it back to life.
Master, if that happens, Cat Noir and I will be there.

But you won't stand a chance! He's totally immune to the powers of the Miraculous! And please stop calling me Master. I have never been a guardian to begin with. I will not make another mistake! You and Cat Noir will give me your Miraculous back and I'll leave Paris with the Miracle Box, since that's what the monster is after. They will come after me, sparing the city and its inhabitants.
But what if it catches up with you this time?
That will be my fate. It's all my fault, after all.
I won't let you leave on your own! When you chose me to become Ladybug, you placed your trust in me. I'm asking you to do the same today.
Thank you, Marinette. Thank you for everything.
Nathalie sometimes gets dizzy spells. But it's nothing serious.
It's thoughtful of you to be concerned, Adrien.
You don't have to worry about her.
If you say so, Father.
And that same symbol is on this statue that arrived at the Louvre earlier this week.
I felt an amok within. This isn't a statue, it's a dormant sentimonster. Very old and very powerful.
Which means you can destroy it, or bring it back to life.
But since I wasn't the one who created it, I won't be able to control it.
I will help you. It comes from the region where we found our Miraculous. I have a strong feeling it could prove very useful to my quest. You will return to the Louvre tonight.
Very well.
You should get some rest before you go.
Don't worry, I'll be fine.
Why the long face?
My mom used to have dizzy spells… just like Nathalie. My father said those weren't serious either.
How about a duet?
You play the piano?
My talents go way beyond sniffing out cheese, young man.
Mom's the only one who could make me laugh like that. Thank you, Plagg.
I can feel its yearning, Hawk Moth. It's hungry; ravenous for Miraculous.
Yum, yum! Miraculous!
You take one more step and I'll take your amok away from you. Do you really want me to destroy you? The sentimonster's all yours, Hawk Moth.
The frustration of a Miraculous just out of your grasp! I know that feeling of hunger only too well.Fly away, my little akuma, and evilize this sentimonster!

Feast, I am Hawk Moth. You have a consuming hunger that only the Miraculous can satisfy. I'm giving you the power to track them down and devour every single one! But after you've swallowed up their owners, you must bring two Miraculous back to me. The one of the Ladybug and the Black Cat. Oh, but don't you worry, I'll give them back to you as soon as I'm done with them. I'll even give you the Peacock and mine as a bonus. Annd thus you shall have eaten every single Miraculous, and your hunger shall be satiated. Do we have an agreement?Right, it's dinner time, Feast.
Yummy! Miraculous!
Huh?
I'm sorry.

Wayzz?\Marinette, you're a most incredible Ladybug, but I cannot let you encounter or risk your lives to fix a mistake that I made. I hope you can forgive me. Be happy and forget all about me. Signed, Fu.\"No way! Tikki! No! Master! Wait!"
No! Master! Wait!
Master, is this the best solution?
It's the only solution.
Master!
Yummy, yummy! Miraculous!
See, Wayzz? If Marinette had kept her Miraculous, the sentimonster would have swallowed her right up.
Or she would have transformed into Ladybug and fought it.
Sometimes fighting is futile, Wayzz.
Feast is attracted by the Miraculous's scent. The man it's chasing can only be the guardian of the Miraculous.
Soon he'll have nothing left to guard.Feast is going to devour everything.
And we shall relish the taste of triumph, my dear Mayura.
Hi there, Bugaboo.
Cat Noir? Is that you?
Of course it is. Who else would you expect by your side?
Isn't that costume of yours a little unsafe?
Only on the outside. I've got a helmet and pads on under my banana peel, Bugaboo.
If you call me Bugaboo one more time I'll start calling you Bananoir.
As you wish, Bugaboo.
Let's take a shortcut. There! The bus! Hey, driver! I'm Ladybug and I need you to help me!
Ladybug. Right. And your buddy here is the famous Banana Cat, I presume.
Just call me Bananoir.
It doesn't matter who we are. That man is being chased by a monster and we have to help him!
Okay, you can count on me!
Thank you, Super Driver. Now!
Master, look! Ladybug and Cat Noir, despite their ridiculous costumes, they haven't let you down!
That's impossible! They don't have their Miraculous!
Okay, I'll help you, but ride on the side of the road before you get hurt.
In the name of the law—oh, destruction of public property! I—whoa!
My name is André, I make the ice cream, my friends with masks—
Master, it's obvious it's them—who else would do something so crazy?
Hey, have a taste of this! Some exploding banana split from Bananoir!
Much tastier than any Miraculous!
Look, Master, there's no use in running! Your disciples never give up the fight, no matter what! With or without their Miraculous, they are Ladybug and Cat Noir!
I don't want to be the cause of their disappearance!
Whether you like it or not, you're the guardian!
Precisely. This is my decision to make!
André, we're out of ammo!
André, go somewhere safe! We're gonna handle this!…I hope…
Hey! Leave them alone! I'm the one you have been wanting the past one hundred and seventy-two years!
The guardian of the Miraculous is this decrepit old man?
Looking for this?
Yum, yum! Miraculous!
You won't have any trouble getting rid of him, Feast!
Go and transform, quickly!I am the last of the Miraculous guardians, and I intend to accomplish my mission! I am not scared of you anymore!Thank you, Ladybug.
I knew you'd make the right choice!
Come on, Wayzz, shell o—ack!
Master, your back! You know you're too old to play superheroes!
We can handle this. Take the Miraculous Box and go hide.
Enjoy, Feast. They can't get away from you now!
We have to find its amok!
Except this sentimonster isn't carrying any baggage!
Cover me! Lucky Charm!A metal detector? When you created the sentimonster, you put the amok inside your staff, right?
Correct.
Was your staff made out of metal, by any chance?
Partially, yes.
There are only two places where your staff could be. Where the temple was, or…
Hey! Hurry, my lady, this thing already swallowed my stick whole! Aah!
Go hide, Master!
Uh, you sure it's the right time, my lady?
Ready to get the staff back?
Oh no, not the tongue…
Yes! Great work, Feast! Keep those two Miraculous nice and warm for me, and enjoy the other ones—you've certainly earned them.
Mm? Yum yum! Miraculous!
Wow… It's bigger on the inside. —Oh! My stick!What is that? Is it digesting things or something?
Whatever he swallows gets sealed here forever.
In that case, we'd better hurry up and figure out where the Master's staff is hiding.
Farewell, my dear Wayzz. You're the best kwami I could have ever hoped to have by my side all these years.
It's been an honor to be your kwami, Master.
I knew it! It had to be intact, otherwise the sentimonster would have disappeared!
Be careful what you wish for! Cataclysm!
No more evil-doing for you. Time to de-evilize!Gotcha! Bye-bye, little butterfly.
No! That's impossible!
I'm fine.
Miraculous Ladybug!
Pound it!
Thank you, Ladybug. Because of you, I won't have to run anymore.
I only put your teaching to practice, Master.
I know two people who'd better run before they transform back.
Goodbye, Master.
Don't be bemused, it's just the news! Extraordinary and inexplicable!
That pretty much sums up the surprising reappearance of this temple in the Tibetan mountains—
—a hundred and seventy-two years after it was destroyed.
Let's go to Clara Contard on location.
That's correct, Nadja. But what makes this phenomenon particularly unexplainable is that all the monks who used to—
Whoa! The symbol of the guardians of the Miraculous!
—live in the temple have also reappeared—
I gotta add this to the Ladyblog!
— they disappeared in the year 1844!

So my mistake has been undone. The monks have been freed and the temple has been restored. I can't thank you enough, Marinette. And Cat Noir. I'm finally free from the burden of the past that has been haunting me for so long. I shall go and see them someday soon, and explain everything to them.Your training is complete, Marinette. You are now a fully-fledged Ladybug. And the time has come for me to prepare you to become the new guardian.
The guardian? But Master, you're the guardian! You have been for a hundred and seventy-two years!

Precisely. It's high time I handed it over. You have proven that you are more worthy of it than I am. In fact, your training is starting right now. You will spend the next twenty-four hours meditating with the Miracle Box without anything to eat.
Uh, actually I… I need to help at the bakery.
I was joking. Those strict traditions did no good when I was your age. I have no intention of continuing them. Instead, your first task will be to help me carry these boxes to my van.

Now that Hawk Moth knows who I am——it's too dangerous for me to live here. But don't worry, Marinette. Whenever you and Cat Noir need me, I will always be here for you.I'm not going anywhere until Hawk Moth is defeated. I'll never leave you.

I have not digested my defeat, Ladybug. It's simply honed my appetite all the more. But now that I know what the guardian looks like, I intend to put that knowledge to use, and prepare a dish of revenge especially for you! And it shall be served very cold.
Ladybug and Cat Noir's miraculous will soon be mine, I promise. Then, I will get the ultimate power, and we shall all be together again.You and I.Soon, Emilie.
Of course. Someone will get you right away.
It's been one year. The longer you keep him in the dark about what you're doing, the harder it'll be on him when he finds out.
Little kitty on a roof, all alone without his -
Adrien.
Father?
There is something important I have to talk to you about. I think about telling you every day, but I don't know how to find the right words.
I think I already know, father.
But, how?
I've noticed how close you and Nathalie have become. If she can make you happy again, then... as far as I'm concerned, she's already part of our family.
How could you possibly think such a thing?! Nobody could ever replace your mother,as long as she is still in our hearts she lives on!We're expecting guests. Be ready.
Wow! Your father's like a piece of tomme cheese: where the rind's so thick it's almost impossible to get inside the center.
Don't be so hard on him, Plagg. It's been a year today since Mom... went away forever.
We can't leave Adrien all alone on a day like this.
True that, but there's no way his old man's gonna let us see him.
Okay, why don't we make them a video and tell him how much we all care about him?

Awesome! This will be the best video yet!Thank you, thank you, Marinette!I'm really sorry, what's-your-name, But you can still be an extra in the video, if you're game!Chloé:What?! You want me to be a mere...extra?!Ridiculous! Utterly ridiculous!

This is not your ice rink, Philippe! It belongs to the Parisians. I'm not closing it down. I'll just be converting it into an indoor gym for my Chloé... er, my city! Nobody comes to your ice rink for lessons anyway. You haven't had a single student sign up this year. Just look around you.

You have to let her fall.

No, what I actually meant was that you cannot let her fall in any way. I mean, do whatever you can so that she doesn't fall.So yeah, grab ahold of her hand and take her onto the ice and then... AAAAH!

Involving Marianne in the fight - a human without powers was against the precepts too.This has proven two things: the first thing is that you have the audacity to invent your own rules, and, as crazy as it may seem, somehow they all work.The second thing is that your natural instincts tell you who you can trust - an essential quality for a guardian. The Miraculous are magical jewels that give powers to superheroes, like Ladybug's earrings and Cat Noir's ring. But supervillain Shadow Moth also has two Miraculous brooches in his possession, and they will give him his powers. We can figure out from this that the Miraculous can either make a superhero or a supervillain. It's all riding on who wears it, which is why these jewels can't fall into just anybody's hands. That's all for today, guys! See you soon, and stay connected!

You'll just need to follow the instructions. The most important things are in red.Check the staffs' identities, make sure the robots are set to the proper program and don't forget to activate the cellphone scramblers, so the party stays private.

It's just like a fairy tale. Nate?

Usually, a mean old witch imprisons a princess in a castle guarded by a dragon. And a knight in shining armour has to save her. Well, this is the same story, except you're the knight, Marinette, Adrien's the princess, the castle is his home, and the witch is his father, Gabriel Agreste.
I'd have thought his father was the king.

His bodyguard would be the dragon, he looks the part!
He looks more like a gorilla.
The main obstacle in the fairy tale could be the dragon.
Or the witch! In Marinette and Adrien's story, it's Gabriel Agreste. But the witch Agreste has made a mistake! He's been letting his son out of the castle to go to school!
And that's where the good fairies come in!
Us!

Every week, we'll think of a new plan, so that the knight can finally kiss the princess! And they can finally live happily ever after with buckets of hamsters! And the plan will always take place in the one and only location where the witch can't get to, which is...
The school!
A-ha! You forgot me in your ridiculous fairy tale!
The terrifying ogre!
The big bad wolf!
The ugly toad!
Your worst nightmare!

Thanks to this video, I'm going to ruin Dupain-Cheng's fairy tale! Then he'll lock Adrien up in his room forever and forbid him to come back to school, and poof! There goes your fairy tale! Adrien will never see you again! Good for him!
I thought you're happy that Adrien was coming to school?
He'll be better off alone at home than surrounded by a bunch of lame-o's at school! And then maybe he'll be lucky enough to go back to being my Prince Charming whom I've always adored!
Adrien was never your Prince Charming, Chloé!
We'll see about that, Dupain-Cheng! Sabrina, ninja smokescreen!
She won't do anything. Not tonight, or ever. The witch— I mean, Gabriel Agreste, doesn't just let anyone walk into his house.
Normally, that's true, but actually, there's a dinner party tonight, and all his friends are invited, with their children! Chloé will be there.
Yeah, but so will her mother, who's your mother, so you'll be there too! You'll be able to stop her, right?
My darling half sister Chloé managed to convince her mother not to bring me with them.
She really is a piece of work...
We just have to pretend like we're in a fairy tale! The knight simply has to go to the ball to stop the evil Chloé from showing the videos to the witch Agreste!
The knight can't get into the ball. The ball is off-limits, tonight.
Unless, the knight is wearing...
A disguise!
Jean Quinton, did my mother tell you that the dinner party is no longer at Gabriel Agreste's tonight?
Oh no! Madam didn't mention anything to me.
A helicopter will be coming to the roof, to take you over to the Eiffel Tower.
Is mademoiselle sure about this?
Excuse me? Are you suggesting that I might be wrong?Ridiculous! Utterly ridiculous!Sorry, but it's for a good cause.
The butler is out of the picture.
The knight can take his place!
There, perfect!
Office locked, check.
Dining room, check. Accessories, check.
Catering, check. Activate scrambler...
You handle the cellphone scrambler, I'll take care of greeting my guests.
Welcome.
Waitress in sight.
Good luck, Marinette.
Hi there.
Uh...
I'm Marino.Sorry I'm late, they let me know at the last minute that I had to take over for the regular waiter 'cause... he's sick!

Oh! Nice to meet you. My name is Sarah. Here's the deal, this is a very private party with very important people! We have to be invisible. The only contact we'll have with Gabriel Agreste will be when he takes our fingerprints to check our identities.
Ah— uh... check our identities?
Was this part of the plan?
We're just here for food prep in the kitchen and overseeing the children. The robots will be serving the adults. Follow me, everything will be fine.
I've got the muscles, I'll carry the heavy stuff. Don't you worry, partner!
Thank you.
I'm in!
Yes, well done!
How come you're doing all the work tonight, Gabriel? If you needed more servants, you just have to ask us to lend you more.
Welcoming you is never work, dear Audrey.
Mr. Agreste, I need you to show you a video, it's really important that you see this!
Woaah! Oh no!
My phone!
I guess you dropped this.
Thanks—Oh— I mean, thanks.
Do I know you?
Not likely, I don't know anyone.
Hey! You have to watch this, are you ready?
I don't have time for this, young lady.
But—
Come along now, sweetheart. Gabriel is obviously busy.
Gabriel! I'm so happy to be able to thank you in person for giving our family's ringback to Félix.
It was the sensible thing to do, Amelie.
That was very thoughtful of you, Father.
I can handle serving the youngsters, I've always been good with kids.
I'd rather you stay in the kitchen.
Show her she's making the wrong choice, Marinette!
Oh, no! I'm so clumsy!
Okay, you take care of the kids.
Oh look, it's the fake Adrien! If I was anyone, other than Chloé Bourgeois, you might actually have me fooled!
You're wrong, Chloé, I am Adrien!
Oh! I'm so sorry, Adrikins!
You're still just as foolish as ever, Chloé Bourgeois.
Mr. Agreste! Is now good? Do you have time to look at my film?
All cellphones will be secured safely for the duration of the evening.
I'm sure you understand how essential privacy is when important business is on the line.
They've got a soundwave scrambler in the house!
I'm sure she can handle it.
Adrien, show your young friends up to your room.
Yes, father.
Félix. May I see you for a moment?
Why did you steal my ring, Félix?
Mom really wanted me to have it since it belonged to her family.But you really wanted to keep it, so I planned on giving it back to you tonight.
Hmm. Your mother will be sad if you do that.
Don't worry, uncle.She won't know. I had a copy made.
You're an intelligent young man, Félix.
I know each and every scratch on Emilie's ring! It's a fake ring!He gave me a fake ring! How dare he?!
Hey, Félix! Are you coming?
Akumatize him, then make him tell you where he's put Emilie's real ring and get it back.
If I do that, he'll know that I'm Shadow Moth.Who else would want that ring?
You're forgetting how immense your powers are now. You can be the Gabriel who creates negative emotions and the Shadow Moth who akumatizes them at the same time.
Brilliant idea, Nathalie.
Duusu, Nooroo, dual metamorphosis!
No one tricks Gabriel Agreste. But you, my lovely amok, you will deceive that arrogant young Félix! And thanks to you, I will get my ring back!
You're perfect!
I need to find a phone. He has to watch my movie.
Chloé, you heard my father. Not during the party.
He will thank me when he sees what I filmed.
Chloé, No!
I will take care of it. I've always been good with young people.
I need to speak to my mother.
Marino, why do you have a cardboard box on your head?
Uh— it's to entertain the youngsters!
Where are you Chloé? You are here somewhere.
She's looking for her phone! I won't let you do it.
What are you looking for, Félix?
You. I'd like to get to know you better, uncle.
It's true. You don't know me very well at all, otherwise you wouldn't have given me a fake ring. Where did you put the real ring? The one that belongs to my wife?
In a safe place.
Wherever it is, you're going to give it back to me.
How do you plan to make me do that, by using your powers... Shadow Moth?
I am Gabriel Agreste, and I do indeed have every power I need to find my wife's ring, including the power to destroy your life. I don't need to be Shadow Moth for that.
I knew you were no ordinary uncle.
And now you know that I only need to snap my fingers to make you disappear from here.
You wouldn't dare!
Do you want to take that risk, Félix? Think of your mother.

Félix, I am Shadow Moth. You've put yourself in an unfortunate situation by trying to defy someone stronger than you. But I can give you the power to escape Gabriel Agreste. All I ask in return are Ladybug and Cat Noir's Miraculous.
This is impossible! I'm not mistaken. You are wearing a Miraculous. Those jewels are underneath your scarf, the brooches!
Brooches? What are you talking about?
You really think that Gabriel Agreste could be Shadow Moth?He doesn't have what it takes! And neither do you. Accept the power I'm offering you!
I'm not afraid of your threats, and I don't need your power!
Come back!
Use your anger to akumatize the sentimonster.
Collector, you have failed in the task of getting that boy to tell you his secret. So, now I give you the power to take it by force.
Hey! That's my phone!
Mr. Agreste! I have to show you my video.
I am now the Collector, and anyone caught in my tablet will give up their secrets to me!
My phone!
I just wanted to show you this video to hurt the baker girl and keep Adrikins all to myself, because I'm a mean person.Why did I say that?
And you! What were you doing in the living room reserved for the members of my club? What secrets are you hiding?
I steal people's ideas and then I-
Hide in here!
Plagg, claws out!
And you Félix! Where did you hide my ring?
Tikki! Spots on!
Hey M'Lady! Looks like the Collector is gone high tech.
I liked it better when he had a book. At least you had a limited number of pages.
I will get him out of here.
What do you got that Collector wants it so badly?
My ring.
If it's yours, why would he want to take it from you?
I don't know. My uncle is a strange man.
Whoa! I hope that statue takes up a lot of memory.
That's right! The memory on that tablet is going to fill up pretty fast!
Stay here Félix.
-or not. Lucky Charm!
Way to bounce back, m'Lady.
Want to help me to set up the table, kitty cat?
So, what's for dinner?
A Collector!
My appetite is insatiable! You will fall before me!
Cat Noir! Time for a rebound.
Dinner's ready!
Nooooo!
No more evil doing for you, little Akuma. Time to de-evilize!Gotcha! Bye-bye, little butterfly. Miraculous Ladybug!
Pound it!
I'm so sorry. The memory of my wife made me vulnerable. That ring was all I had left of her but you can keep it, of course! After all, I did give it to you.
Keep this magical charm with you. It may not heal your pain but it will keep Shadow Moth from using it against you.
Thank you, Ladybug. You can't imagine how much this means to me.
Mr. Agreste! Mr. Agreste! Now you have to watch my video!
Hang on there a minute, young lady! That's my phone.
And it's my video.
Oh yeah?There. Deleted!
No... Nooooooo!
Now it's only my phone. Have a nice rest of the evening, everyone!
So... that is what's changed, Ladybug. I release you from existence.
Reverse morphosis.
I want to know how Ladybug was able to create this magical charm.
I haven't read anything about it in the spell book.
What if... the book was only a chronicle of what has been discovered up until now.
So that's why there are blank pages at the end.
This means that the power of the Miraculous is even stronger than we thought.
As is yours.
Oh, guys! What a night!
It gave us an idea for another plan, Marinette. Nate? So we thought—
Oh— uh, that looks really terrific, but... I think the knight in shining armor needs her beauty sleep before she can go on a new adventure.
Wise decision, 'cause a good fairy tale hero needs to be in tip-top shape!
In the meantime, Marc and I are gonna write a new comic. \The Adventures of Marino: The Clumsy Waiter\"!"
A little surprise for when you come back, my dear nephew.
Mommy! I wanna go on the merry-go-round! Pretty please!
As many times as you like, sweetheart. It's Sunday!
Yay!
When were paid holidays instituted in France?
Oh, Tikki. Please don't talk about holidays.
But it's for your history test tomorrow, Marinette.
Uh, okay. First paid holidays. Summer 1936.
Good job. Eh... you're drawing on a T-shirt right now.
Ah!
Perhaps you should take a little break, Marinette.
I can't, Tikki. It's all due tomorrow! Tomorrow! To-morrow!
Marinette! Ultimate Mecha Strike tournament time!

Video games? It's been so long since I last played video games. No! I can't give in! Dad, with the T-shirts for Jagged Stone's new poster, I still have 72 hours worth of work left to fit in by tomorrow. And the rest of the week after that's even worse. I don't have a choice. I have to... stop playing.
Stop playing? But Marinette, playing is like that little pinch of salt in baguettes. It makes life tastier.
Dad, I've got so many cakes baking in the oven right now, they're all on the verge of getting burned. No amount of salt is gonna fix this.
Fine. That's too bad. But remember, watch your apple pie, sweetheart. It's bubbling all over your cinnamon flan.
Oh, why does she have to grow so fast?
It's a part of life.So, best of three do the laundry?
Oh, you've got me! I know your secret! You've been practicing in secret!
Triple Cosmic Kick! Bam! Yes, I've got you!
Oh no!
So... paid vacation was instituted to allow workers to...?

...take a break. Play video games.No!Found it! It really was just a dream. I filled it out. For real!Now I just need to finish the last Kitty Section T-shirts, review my English lessons, and color paint.
It's for my new video game.
Ah, video games.Coloring the poster!
Oh, I'd love to test your video game, Max, but I promised Prince Ali we'd go on a charity cruise over the Seine on his yacht this afternoon. Sorry.
Kim!
Yeah?
Interested in playing the best fighting game in the world? 100% created by your best friend!
A fighting game... he designed himself! Oh, what's wrong with me?
I'm sure I'd get the highest score. But I've got swimming practice. Ondine's waiting for me.
Alix! You up for testing my game? I've included more than 50 characters and you can even loot their equipment.
50! Loot! Ah! No, no, no, no, no...
No can do. I've got an in-line skate contest coming up. No winning without training.
Sorry, your game sounds amazing, but I've got fencing right now. Then my Chinese lesson, then a photoshoot...
A fighting game with former akumatized people? What do you say?
The appointment with the editor is next week and we still have a lot of pages to finish.
Oh, we'd gladly help you debug the game if it weren't for our costume fitting at Marinette's.
Ah, Marinette! The most skilled gamer in the whole class. We won the Ultimate Mecha Strike inter-school tournament together. Of course she won't say...
NO!
But, I haven't said anything yet!

And I don't want you to say it. Because then I wouldn't be able to refuse. And I have to resist! I've got too much to do today. A Kitty poster to sew for Jagged Stone. I mean, a Jagged T-shirt for drawing Kitty. I mean, ah!

What Dupain-Cheng is trying to tell you, using this ridiculously fake excuse of hers, is that she doesn't want to play your dumb, little video game. In fact, no one wants to, because everyone has a much more interesting life than you do. Even Marinette, which is really saying something.
No, this isn't a fake excuse at all. I really do have a Jagged Stone poster to knit for Kitty. No! To post a Stone. Uh, to Stone a Jag. Uh... ah! I'm late!
Ah, Markov! At least I can count on you.
I'm sorry, Max. I'm currently connected to the world wide Artificial Intelligence Network. We're looking for a solution to the global warming crisis.
But, I need you to help me test my video game.
Impossible! In order to optimize my results, I have eliminated all recreational activities from my system.
Oh, how depressing. All of his friends having such important and serious things to do. I, however, love a good game.And I've got all the time in the world. Fly away, my little akuma, and evilize him!

Nice to see you again, Gamer 2.0. Our last little round felt a little incomplete. So, how about a rematch? I could give your game a whole new dimension. One thing hasn't changed, though. I'm only asking for one tiny reward.
Ladybug and Cat Noir's Miraculous. Game on!
One more ticket for...
Something smells bad around here, Plagg.
Oh, could it be Brie? Reblochon? Camembert? Please tell me you smell Camembert!
No, I smell evil. Plagg, claws out!
The last one!
What do you do when no one wants to play with you? You give them no choice.
Max?
Ladybug, Cat Noir. All of these people were once akumatized and then saved by you. If you want another chance at freeing them, you're going to have to come and play with me.
I think you're gonna have to take a break this time.
Then let's make it quick. I still have a lot to do.
Tikki, spots on! Yeah!
First one who finds a way in wins.
We don't have time to play, Cat Noir. I've got a ton of other things to do.
So, Ladybug and Cat Noir? Ready to play? Please enter your pyra-pod.
What if it's a trap, M'lady?
No, I'm sure it's not. He just wants to play. So, let's keep in touch.
Take your pyra-pad.Welcome to playable characters) But if you lose...
I don't have time to lose, Gamer. Let's begin and get this over with.
Your hastiness will be your downfall, Ladybug. My chance of winning has just shot out 86%.
Mime. Riposte. Ready? Fight!
I'm gonna slice you into sashimime!
Wouldn't you be better off miming a Cat Noir to come lend you a helping paw, M'lady?
I know what I'm doing!
Be careful! The Mime's object disappears if you talk.
Thank you, Captain Obvious!
Au revoir!
Ring out! Mime wins!
Talking on purpose? Miming your own yo-yo? Clever as ever, M'lady.
I won, Gamer 2.0. Release us!
A game with just one round? Where's the fun in that, Ladybug? It doesn't end until you battled all the characters in the game.
But this is gonna take forever!
That's the best part about it! The longer, the better!
My turn! My turn! Frightningale, Stormy Weather — Awesome! But a little too awesome for a first battle. Oh, my copycat! Nah, I'd be too good as myself. That'd be too easy.
Hurry up! Choose Copycat and Cataclysm this game away so we can get back home!
Fine. If we need to hurry this up.
You've got to be kidding me!
What? I've always wanted to train pigeons.
There aren't even any pigeons in this stadium!
There is one. And I'm gonna call him Fiery Phoenix.
More like Mega Flop Phoenix.It's gonna be the fastest victory ever!Ah! Get away, you flying rat!
Double ankle grab and smash! Somersault bum drop!Feathered face wash!Volatile's Elbow!
Mr. Pigeon wins!
Pound it, Fiery Phoenix.
Impossible!
Can we play the whole match in one go?
Then it wouldn't be fun anymore. We've still got so many more rounds left. Plus the finale.
If you ask me, this was never fun.
Befana. Dark Owl. Ready? Fight!
You called for coal, bird brain?
Owl Mist!Boomerang!
Ring out! Dark Owl wins!
Hoo, hoo! No one is as laser precise as the Dark Owl!
You got lucky, that's all.
My turn!This brings back memories.
Reflekta. Rogercop. Ready? Fight!
Ugh! C'mon now!
They see me catwalking. They hatin'.
Reflekta wins!
Stop boasting, Cat Noir. We're not here to have fun. We must end this fast!
Copycat. Puppeteer. Ready? Fight!
Cataclysm!
Copycat, come to life!
Puppeteer wins!
Ouch... that sure was fast.
You're the one who wanted to speed things up, and now you're going to lose even faster than you thought, Ladybug.
We will not lose!
Hey! It's my turn to-
I refuse to lose!
No biggie. Be my guest.
Gorizilla. Stoneheart. Ready? Fight!
Oh, man!
Ring out! Stoneheart wins!
Ha ha! I win again, Loserbug!
Uh, M'lady? You okay if we review your strategy, just a tad? I'll show you.
Anansi. Stormy Weather. Ready? Fight!
Cyclone!Haha haha hahaha!
Surprise!
Anansi wins!
Ha ha! See, M'lady? M'lady? You okay?
Cat Noir... I think I forgot how to play!
Okay, I've got this.
Lady Wifi. Timebreaker. Ready? Fight!

M'lady, the best way to win isn't about knowing how to play.It's all about loving to play.Playing is the best way to do something you'd never do in real life.So have some fun, my Bugaboo. And Gamer won't have a chance at beating you.
Playing is the best way to do something you'd never do in real life...! Yeah! There could be something I always wanted to do.
Be my guest.
Evillustrator. Volpina. Ready? Fight!
Mirage!
Ring out!
Oh, that felt so good!No cockroaches in my kitchen!Ice cream feast! Yum, yum!Found you! Fired you!
Parle le faire!
This is what you call Knight-fall!
Ah, she's so pawesome!
I—
love—
this—
game!
May I remind you this is not just a game?
Hey, you're the one who wanted us to have fun.
I think we're ready for the final boss. Stop hiding behind your toys and get in the ring, Gamer 2.0.
I am the final boss, but how are we going to figure out who should battle me?
What do you mean?
Well, I'm sure you'd agree that two against one would be very unfair, so the only way to know which one of you will take me on, is if you two fight... each other!
Ladybug. Cat Noir. Ready? Fight!
What are you waiting for? Start fighting! If you don't, everyone will be imprisoned forever!
We can't let this happen...!
You know I love battling by your side, M'lady. But I could never bring myself to fight you.
Cat Noir... What are you doing?
Giving you some extra time.
No! Cat Noir!
I trust you to bring me back, M'lady.
Ring out! Ladybug wins!

You're the one who wanted to get this over with. Now, since this is the final battle, in addition to your own superpower, you get to pick four items from your inventory. Although, I wouldn't even bother if I were you, because I'm going to beat you no matter what.
You know what? Cat Noir's, right! I'm gonna take my sweet bug time.
I'm happy you're enjoying the game.
I'm going to enjoy winning this game! And by my rules! Lucky Charm!
What a noob you are! Are you expecting to beat the creator of this game with a bag of flour?
And a few other items.
Given what you chose, in precisely one minute and thirty six seconds, you will lose.
Ladybug. Gamer 2.0. Final fight!
I would've loved for it to last longer—but my statistics—are never wrong!
Did your statistics predict this? Cataclysm!

What in the-?I am the game master!I can play any character. You thought you'd break me with that ridiculous little magic trick? Be a nice fairy and give me that Miraculous.What?Huh? That's not fair! So not fun!You're ruining the whole thing!
Oops! Sorry, aren't your hits having any effect? In chess, it's called a pat. A can't win, can't lose situation! What was it you said again? Oh, yeah! The longer, the better.
It could've worked, if I didn't just have to wait for you to transform back!
Checkmate, young Ladybug! Bested by your own game!
Cyclone!Who do you think you're fooling?
I won! You're out, Ladybug!No...! There's no way!
I don't believe it!There's a bug in your game, Gamer!
No! That's impossible!
Even the best games by the best designers have bugs.
Ring out! Ladybug wins!
But sometimes... they don't.
You got me. Good game.
Miraculous Ladybug!No more evil-doing for you, little akuma. Time to de-evilize!Gotcha!Bye bye, little butterfly.
No more games, Ladybug. I'll get my revenge. When I do, you won't even remember the meaning of the word fun!

Hey, Cat Noir, between being a superhero and everything else in your life, how do you manage to still have fun? Aren't you scared you'll eventually have to sacrifice everything you love for all of this?
The times when I have the most fun, my favorite moments, are when I'm with you, M'lady. And I would give up everything for just that.
Mom? Dad? I know I don't have time to play with you guys these days... but, Max does! And he has a video game he designed which he needs to test! With tons of bugs in it!
A video game? He made himself?
With bugs to find?
To the living room!
To the living room!
Tikki, I'm almost done with the T-shirts, and Jagged's poster can wait a bit longer, can't it?
It sure can, Marinette.
Leave a few bugs for me! Here I come!
Dear diary, guess what? I was two spots away from transforming back and revealing my true identity to Cat Noir.
Hey Marinette, weren't you meeting Alya back at school this afternoon to research your term paper?
Oh no, I'm late! Again!
What's that noise?
Hide, Tikki!
Come on, Max.
What's going on, Alya?
Try-outs for the Paris Ultimate Mecha Strike III Tournament! This school sends the two students with the highest scores!
Actually, the tryouts offer a partner to team up with Max in the Tournament.
Why Max?
'Cause he's unbeatable! He's a total rocksord! He's got the highest APM over anyone!
APM?
Actions per minute? This tournament is his whole life! He's been grinding all year to level up.
Adrien is now in the lead.
What happened, Max?
Hmm. Awesome job. We're gonna make a killer combo.
So let me get this straight. If someone manages to beat Max's score, they'll team up with Adrien at the tournament?
No one can beat Max. Or rather Max and Adrien. It's a slam dunk. They're our school's dream team!
I see where you're going with this, Little lady.
Just imagine, teaming with Adrien!
Are you out of your mind, girl? This is about stepping up and representing! Not snuggling up and snogging! This is serious business!
Seriously Alya, you think I'd actually go through with that?
Well, I think we have our two champions lined up for the Paris tournament.
Wait! Uh, Is it too late... to try out?
Well, the library is closing up in five minutes, but...
Oh, boy...
Adrien's joypad! Ohhh...!
Is she serious? There's no way!
Unless the particular player has a particular motivation.
The rules are elementary, You battle each other's robots with your own and...
Please... Every time you win, you loot its items and gain XP, which upgrades your mech. I'm not a noob, thank you very much.
Ah, sounds like you have a sufficient amount of knowledge. Let's see if it's enough to beat me.
Seriously? How could anyone spend so much time in front of a screen?
I know, as if.
Come on, Max, you can do it!
And now, a quarter super plus heavy kick, and Flying Hyper Storm! Triple hit combo, Marinette style! Booyah!
Woo! Yeah! Woo hoo! I win! Uh-huh!
Wha! I can't believe it! She... she beat him?
Beat him? She pulverized him!
The king's been knocked off his throne!
I accept this defeat. I relinquish my position at the tournament. Congratulations, Marinette. And Adrien.
Max, wait!
Oh, Max...
Look. I'm fine, I lost fair and square. But if you don't mind, I'd like a little solitude.
So, Marinette Dupain-Cheng and Adrien Agreste will represent Françoise Dupont High School at the Paris Ultimate Mecha Strike III Tournament. Good luck to both of you.
Well, I guess I'll be coming over to practice. With my new partner. See you later.
See... ya...
Now you gotta win and you're gonna be representing the school, not just hanging out with Adrien.
Oh, Adrien...
Oh, brother...
This is a travesty. An unequivocal travesty!
Ah, a competition. I know you like that, my little evil akumas. Where there's a winner, there's always a loser.Fly away, my little akuma, and evilize him!
I should've been going to that tournament. I was the chosen one! I worked so hard for it! Inconceivable!
Gamer, I am Hawk Moth. I'll help you win the tournament of your life. But in return, you must help me achieve my high score.
Absolutely, Hawk Moth. Game on! Now to see who's the greatest gamer in Paris!
Ah, training with Adrien! Adrien!
If all you wanted to do is spend time with Adrien, there are other ways to do that!
What are you getting at?
You know how much Max wanted to be in that tournament. Kim said he'd been training for it all year.
Right. All I could think about was Adrien. Hey! Adrien's coming to my house.Adrien's coming to my house! No, this is a total disaster! I have to... clean my room!
That's what I've been trying to tell you all along.
Oh, this... is not... happening!!
Calm down, Marinette. You still have time. It's not like he's gonna show up this very minute.
Marinette! Someone's here to see you!
Uh... Coming!
Marinette and I are finalists in the Paris Ultimate Mecha Strike III Tournament.
No way. Well, she did learn from the best Tom style! Booyah!
Marinette never told us about this Tournament.
We were just pairing out today.
You two are a pair, huh? I'm not surprised. Marinette talks a lot about you, you know?
Mom! ...Come up, Adrien!
Uh, very nice to meet you.
Ohhh...
Gamer. It's time to get to the next level and show everyone that you're the best!
No time like the present! Hahahahaha!
Oh! Hahaha. Sorry.
No, you go.
I'll use the other one.Ah!
Your parents seem nice.
Oh yeah, they are. But... sometimes...Ahhhh!
Sometimes what?
Everything going good? I thought just in case you wanted something to eat...
Uh... no thanks, Papa. We're training.
Well then, uh, maybe you could use a few tips, you know... dad style.
Thanks, but no thanks! Papa!
Sometimes my parents could be a little nosey.Where were we?
I'll be at level 2 in no time! My skills are indisputable!I am unstoppable! Hahahaha!Excellent!
Wow! We won again, thanks to you!
Yeah, um, yes we did.
We? That was practically all you. You're amazing, Marinette. I guess you wouldn't even need me. I'm so lame compared to you...
Um, no no no, I... No, you're so good. I mean, I'm the one who's not good. I mean... I'm lucky, that's all.
Anyone want cookies? They hot from the oven!
Papa, we're trying to work here!
Actually, you know what? I've got a secret.This is why I win.
Are you messing with me?
Try playing a match with it.
How about a delicious salmon and spinach pie? You can tell me what you think of it?
Uh, Marinette. A little snack wouldn't hurt, would it?
Uh, I'm really sorry. It's impossible to get anything down with my parents around.
That's okay.I didn't know your dad made such yummy pie!
Oh, uh, I... yeah! So, shall we go back?
Let's see if it works.
Tell me this isn't some kind of publicity stunt for the tournament!
Well, well. Marinette, let's see who's victorious this time.
Doesn't look like a publicity stunt to me.
Look out!Uh, we better get outta here!
Game over, Marinette!
How does he know my name? Max!I guess he really did want that spot on the tournament!
Time to transform.
Plagg, claws out!
Game over!
Not yet! Here comes a new challenger!
Cat Noir! Hey! Over here!
I heard Miss Video Game Champion really took down the final boss.
Well it doesn't give him extra points to go transforming everyone. Hey, wait, Cat Noir! I left my friend Adrien at the park! He might be in danger, we have to go back!
Uh... don't worry. Adrien's not in danger. He'll be fine. You'll be safe here. Just stay put. Don't worry, Cat Noir will take care of everything. Arch, leap, and do a barrel roll!
Uh, he's always so over-the-top.
If ever there was a game to win, this is it! Let's go!
Tikki, spots on! Ha!
Get away from here! As far as you can!Hurry!
Hey, tin can! Over here!
My calculations indicate that your system's about to crash!
You're the one crashing, robot!
He's a life-size robot, from Ultimate Mecha Strike!
I know! And it's nearly at level 3. 4 is the highest level!
Wait, you know that game?
Duh! Of course!
See? You and me! It was meant to be.
Uh, I think our problem just got a whole lot bigger.
Level 3. Hahahahahaha!
If you want to be the most powerful robot in the world, you must capture Ladybug and Cat Noir's Miraculouses. Then it really will be Game Over.
Those Miraculouses are mine!
We have to get him out of here before he destroys all of Paris!
The stadium!
Where has Clunky got to?
Hahahaha!
Attack the robot with your Cataclysm Power! It might be enough to shock him!
My pleasure. Two can play this game. Cataclysm!
Nooooo!
Smackdown, Cat Noir!
Cat Noir Style! Booyah!
Whoa ha ha! Check out that loot!
System crash, Gamer!
Hahahaha! You've forgotten the rules. I saved my last level!Respawn!
Aww, not the old spawn point glitch again.
Yeah, but did you see he pushed that button on his glasses? I bet the akuma's in there.
Ha! We've leveled up too!
Okay, but I only got a few minutes left.
I'll man it, you shoot!
Why do you get to man it?
What do you say we flip for it?
Okay, you man it and I'll fire.
Look out! Here it comes again...
We'll let it go to your head!Booster!
Hahahahaha! Huh?
Round two, Gamer.
Arrrghhh... Gamer Missiles!
Forcefield, Cat Noir!
Got it. Forcefield activated!Cat Saber!
Gamer-Drill!
This Gamer's way powerful. He just took out our forcefield!
We're gonna have to manage without. Lady Bombs!
Laser Wall!
Lady Helix!
Bullet!Ear Thunder!
He's anticipating all of our attacks!
Watch out, Ladybug!
Gamer Fire!Hahahahaha! Today I shall be victorious!
Catouken!
I am the strongest player in the world! Hahahaha!
How are we supposed to beat him if we can't even catch him?
We have to beat him harder and jam the system! Tatsu-Lady!
Catouken!
Gamer Crusher!
Shoryubug!
Catouken!
We've gotta get inside his cockpit!
Go for it. You're in charge!
Take the controls, Cat Noir. I'll be right back.
Right back? Where are you going?!
It's just us two now, Gamer!
What are they...
graffiti can appears) Huh? Graffiti? Spray paint? Arts and crafts?Bingo.
Aghhh! You won't get away with this!
Game over, Gamer.Game's over for you too, akuma. Time to de-evilize!Gotcha!Bye bye little butterfly. Miraculous Ladybug!
What am I doing here?
Pound it!
Such pitiful insolence! The moment you challenge me is the moment you seal your fate! This battle is not yet over...
So remember, the High Score to beat is 24500, so gamers, hit those consoles. Game on!
You bent over backwards to be in the team and now you wanna pull out?
It's just that I feel so bad for Max. And well, it just wouldn't be right.
You're doing the right thing. But honestly, it's not like you get the chance to play with Adrien everyday...
...Max? I've thought about this a lot, and...
And now, representing Françoise Dupont High School...
Well, I think you should be playing tonight, Max.
What?
Don't get me wrong! I love gaming, but it's not my heart and soul. This is your baby. It's your tournament, Max. I don't wanna take that away from you.
Dudes, make up your minds. They're waiting for you.
I insist!
I don't know how to thank you.
By winning the tournament... with her.
Huh?
Go on, Marinette. You're a hundred times better than me. You belong on the team. Win the tournament for the school. I know you can do it.
Go on, dudes! They're waiting for you!
No, uh, I... only with you?
Let's show them who's gold.
Wow, you are on fire, bugaboo. We never beat villains so fast. Pound it!Bugaboo? Something wrong?
Uh, pound it - yeah. Hey, why don't we check one more time that everything's okay in Paris?Like, an extra patrol?
You wanna tell me what's going on? You didn't even scold me when I called you bugaboo.
There's nothing going on, everything is super great. I just have some extra time and I really don't feel like chit-chatting.
Then I know the perfect place when there's no talking.
I'm all in!
Oh, my darling. Why can't you love me?
You tricked me.
Shh. No talking, you said.
That's Ladybug and Cat Noir!
I'm keeping too many secrets from you Ronaldo, stop giving me those puppy eyes, okay? I'll tell you everything. I'm leading a double life Ronaldo.
Are you kidding me? Don't tell him anything, you fool!
Could you keep it down, m'lady?

Romantic comedies are lame anyway, and you know why? It's totally not realistic! In real-life, the girl would take forever to tell the guy she loves him without stuttering. Bla-bla-bla! So how can see she know if he loves her back? It's impossible, so then she decides she can never ever be with him, and then BAM! She falls in love with another guy, and everything is so cool. Almost too easy, no stuttering, they hold hands, they get all kissy-kissy, and then, SURPRISE! She has secrets! And him, he hates secrets, of course. So as they break up, and everyone lives un-happily ever after, the end. And that's why romantic comedies are so lame.
So sorry, we'll be going now.

Stay AWAY from the romantic comedy, go for heroic heroes instead. Special effects, heroes saving the world, no feelings, no questions, nobody talks because there is NOTHING to say! That is good entertainment for sure.
Sorry!
Listen m'lady, I didn't get everything you said and obviously, I know nothing about your private life, but I do know what heartbreak sounds and feels like, and-
Heartbreak? Me?That is not it at all, everything's fine. In fact, I feel like swimming, let's go to the pool!
You know, if you ever want to talk about anything, I'm here for you.
SWIMMING! Woo-hoo!
It's so sad!
I told you we should've taken those photos down!
Stop, I'm not sad and these photos don't bother me, at all. They're just shots of fashion and friends, and I love fashion and I love my friends, so it's all good.There's no problem, see?

So, Marinette's got a problem. Her heart's been broken. At first Marinette is crazy about Adrien but she's never been able to tell him about her feelings because well.. she's Marinette and he's.. well.. Adrien. Then comes along Luka, Marinette can talk to him because he's.. well.. Luka. So they start dating.
They were so cute together!
Yeah, except they broke up.
He was like super sad when they did.

But the real problem here is that Marinette never told us anything. If Luka hadn't told Juleka, who told Rose, who told Mylène, who then told Alix, who finally told me. Then I, her BF in the whole world would still be in the dark! Yesterday I was in the restroom and I heard her crying.
Marinette? Have you been crying?
Me? Crying? Are you kidding? I'm super happy! Let's celebrate and have a party! I'm so happy!
Why is she keeping all these secrets from us?
If she's not even telling Alya, then there's a real problem!
What do we do?
What Marinette needs is a friendly intervention. Let's all call her up together and see how she's doing.
Rabbit check!
She's not picking up.
It's Marinette, leave a message, beep!
Hey Marinette, it's us!
We were just calling to tell you that we're here if you need to talk, whenever you want, wherever you want, call us back!
We love you, big hugs!
We gotta do something!
We need Tikki!
I got this! Why aren't you using the talking light box to speak to your friends?
About what? Everything's fine.
Don't you think you should detransform then?
No, I'm better off like this, if Shadow Moth attacks Paris, I'll already be ready for action at any time.
Yes, but what about Tikki? She might need to rest a bit, or maybe eat something.
Oh no! Tikki, spots off!
Are you okay Tikki?
Better than you, Marinette. We should have a little talk.
Maybe we should go to her house. What do you think?
We'll give her an eternal friendship bracelet so she never forgets that friends can tell each other anything and that we'll always be there for her.

I read in a magazine that an ancient South American tribe did something like this. You tell a secret to the bead in your mind, once Marinette adds her secret to the bead this bracelet will unite us all forever. Ready?
Seriously, wouldn't it be more logical to take her out for a smoothie and help her work out her love problems?
Okay.
As long as I'm Ladybug, I can't have loved ones in my life.
What makes you say that Marinette?

You know why. I had to break up with Luka because I couldn't tell him the truth, it'd be the same thing with Adrien. I can't share my secret with either of them. I can't be honest with my closest friends or my parents about anything. I'm doomed to be a big liar to everyone, forever. What do I do Tikki?
I wish I could tell you but... kwamis don't fall in love.
You see? No one can help me. My life as Marinette is too complicated. I should just be Ladybug all the time! Tikki, spots on!
Marinette? Marinette?
Wow! Check this out girls! This is new! Oh, it's so cute!
Another one of Marinette's cool creations.
She must be up on the patio, I'll go get her.
What are you waiting for, Shadow Moth?! Here I am!
Marinette?
Spots off.
Marinette!
What are you doing here?
We're just checkin' in on you, girl.
Aw, it looks just like a real house, look how the roof comes off to show the inside!
No! No, don't touch that! Move away!
Sorry, Marinette!
Will you please leave my room?!
Chill out Marinette, it's just a doll house. We'll totally help.
No you won't, please go!
Okay Marinette, there's clearly something wrong and we're not leaving you like this till you tell us what it is.
Each of us told our secrets to this bracelet. It's your turn now.
The only thing that's wrong right now is you guys still hanging out in my room, which is not cool!
If we're really your friends, you can confide in us.
Real friends don't ever let each other down.
Well then maybe I don't want you to be my friends, GET OUT!
I had no choice Tikki, I had to do it.
I know, Marinette.
At least now I won't have to lie anymore, since, there'll be no one to lie to.
Is everything okay? Girls?
Several fragile hearts that break all at the same time. What a lovely symphony for my akumas.Fly away my akuma, and evilize them!
I just lost my best friend.
I really thought it would work.
This is so sad!
This cannot end like this!

Gang of Secrets, I am Shadow Moth. Your friend won't reveal her secrets to you? I will give you all the powers you need to force her to give them up! All that I want in exchange are Ladybug and Cat Noir's Miraculous.
Marinette will stay our friend.
Whether she wants to or not.
And she'll keep no secrets from us.
Can't believe she'd do that.
I'll be in charge of capturing her.
I will force her to reveal what she's been hiding from us.
And I'll turn back time to return everything to the way it was.
We'll comfort her and she'll be our friend again.
And if Ladybug and Cat Noir try to stand in our way, Horrificator will keep them busy!
I'm here for you Marinette, I'm your friend.You will tell us all your secrets and you will feel so much better!
You really shouldn't be doing this, Trixx!
Remember the last time you used your power of Illusion without a holder?
Marinette must not reveal her secret. Mirage!
How did she?
Don't run away Marinette, we're friends aren't we?Follow me.
Thanks Trixx.
Tikki, spots on! Ah!
When a kwami uses their power without a holder to channel its energy, doesn't it often set off some kind of catastrophe?
My power creates Illusions,so the side effects will hopefully just be in their imaginations.
Oh come on, her Miraculous Ladybug will make everything alright anyway.I hope.
Oh Trixx…
A strange phenomenon has just hit the Eiffel Tower. We advise all Parisians to stay home…
I'll bet you an entire Camembert that this is Trixx's doing.
Trixx?
The kwami of Illusion.
What's not an illusion is the fact that Ladybug needs our help!
Great. Even when I'm not the one who made the mess, I still have to help clean it up.
Plagg, claws out!
Marinette…!
Has anyone seen Marinette Dupain-Cheng?
Huh?
Then you're gonna help us find her!
At your service, Princess Fragrance.
She's got to be here somewhere. Let's split up.
Hey there, m'lady. Somebody is having a super villain party and didn't invite us.
They're looking for Marinette Dupain-Cheng, one of their classmates.
Haven't we already saved her a bunch of times? Funny you'd think everybody would like her.
Well apparently, she's managed to alienate all her friends at once.
You still there?
Just thinking. With five villians it's not gonna be easy finding the object that has the akuma.
I bet you already have an idea, right?

I'm going to isolate one of the villains from the others and get her to tell me where the akuma is. Meanwhile, you find Timebreaker to stop her from going back in the past, otherwise she could really screw up my plan.
Good luck, M'lady.
Thanks, you too.
Hey, it's been awhile. How's it ticking Ms. Time Keeper?
It's Timebreaker. And I don't have a second to lose talking to you.
Ha, bummer for you, Ladybug. I don't have the akuma.
No biggie, I just wanted to talk to you anyway.
I've got nothing to say to you.
Your friend, Lady Wifi is having some trouble with Ladybug.
Hey! Don't you wanna play anymore?
Alya, from what I understand, you've been having some issues with your best friend. Her name's Marinette, right?
I don't know what happened between the two of you, but I wanna tell you about a friend of mine. She's a superhero. You know Rena Rouge right?

Of course, we keep secrets from one another, mainly because of my secret identity, but even though we can't tell each other everything, we trust each other. And that's why we can fight side by side. You can reject the power that Shadow Moth gave you.
Don't listen to her Lady Wifi. If you do that, you'll never know your friend's secrets! Or Ladybug's!
I trust you completely Alya. And I need you! I.. need Rena Rouge!
That's.. impossible!
Wow. No one has ever done that... you're amazing!
It's 'cause you're an amazing friend, Ladybug.
Pound it.
Ladybug, the Gang of Secrets is looking for you, I'm on it, but I don't know how long I can hold them off all by myself.
Your friend Lady Wifi has betrayed you, she chose Ladybug's side. Hurry up and seize his Miraculous so you can take care of the bug!
Which object holds the akuma?
It's in a bracelet. Timebreaker must have it, but you and Cat Noir will never be able to take on four villains at once.
I think this calls for the master of Illusion.
Woah! How'd you do that?
There have been a few upgrades since I became Guardian of the Miraculous.
You're Guardian of the-
Yeah, keep it on the down low. Not a word about it on the LadyBlog.
You know I know how to keep a secret.
Trixx, let's pounce!
No Cataclysm to save you this time.
We need to hurry! Lucky Charm!Okay, I got a plan, listen. '
At the very moment you touch it, I'll summon my power and then who knows what's gonna happen to you.
Why bother taking it, when I can make you my slave and order you to give it to me?
Give them what they want, now!
Mirage!
Cat Noir, no!
Marinette!
Catch her!
No! Take his Miraculous first! Come back!
Thank you, M'ladies. I was a whisker away from cat-astrophe.
That's what friends are for, my kitty cat. Okay, you two get to the pool, now.
What about you?
I'll keep our guests busy. Rena Rouge will explain the rest of the plan.
Seize Ladybug! Take her Miraculous!
You take care of her. I'll deal with Marinette.
You're on Princess!
It's time to give up your secret, Marinette!
Soon you're going to do anything we demand of you, Ladybug. For starters, give us your Miraculous now!
Finally.
There's nowhere to go!
Mirage, Vanish!
Cataclysm!
Thank you, Ladybug.
No more evil doing for you little akuma! Time to de-evilize!Gotcha! Bye bye little butterfly!Miraculous Ladybug!

column2: Ladybug, Rena Rouge, and Cat Noir
column4: Pound it?

column1: Ladybug, Rena Rouge, and Cat Noir
column4: Pound it!
You've made mistakes before Ladybug, and you'll make them again! One day, I will discover your secret!
Let's rest.
Thank you, Ladybug.
You know, without you and Cat Noir, I wouldn't have made it through today. I'm really lucky to have friends like you. So, thank you.

It's true, breaking up with Luka broke my heart. And never being able to tell Adrien how I feel is just as painful. Love is too difficult. I think- I think I'm gonna stick to friendship, that's about all I can handle right now.
Take your time.
It'll all work out.
And whatever happens, we'll always be here for you.
When you're ready for love, just make sure you tell us, so we can help you with a sick new plan to win over Adrien, Luka or whoever!
Girls, it's you who I love.
Bye, Marinette.
Bye! See ya tomorrow.
You go ahead girls, I just have one last thing to say to Marinette.
You didn't tell us everything, did you? A journalist and a BFF can tell these things.
I won't try to figure it out or force it out of you.If you can't tell me what's in your heart, it's your right.
Will we still be friends?
Marinette. I'm your best friend, and I'll always be. That's why it kills me that I can't help you with whatever's making you feel so alone.

Alya, wait! Stay. You're right, I am alone.More than ever before. I can barely take it anymore! You know why I broke up with Luka? Not because I don't like him, he's amazing! It's 'cause there's something that I can't tell him. You know why I have to forget Adrien? For the exact same reason! You're right, I keep secrets, I lie all the time! I lie to my friends, to my parents, to everyone and the worst thing is, I can't do it any other way!
There's always another way.
No, not this time. I have no choice. All this is bigger than us, Alya. Way too big.
If it's too big, two of us can handle it better than one.
If I tell you, things will never be the same between us again.It'll mess up everything, maybe even destroy it.
Marinette, I'm your very best friend.
And I… I'm Ladybug.
Thanks for showing up, girls. So, check this out. I've got the...biggest...scoop! But FYI, it's seriously hush-hush. Top secret, classified information.
You know who Ladybug is?
No, but it's almost as hot. Marinette is—
Wait, Alya.Do you really think this is such a good idea?
I don't think it is, I know it is. But remember, girls, your lips are sealed. Got it?
Mm-hmm.
Well, Marinette is head-over-heels for somebody.
Yeah, Adrien.
What? But how did you know?
Well, it is pretty obvious.
So, do you think...I mean...Adrien knows too?
No way. Boys never pick up on things like that.
Mm-hmm.
Right, so let's get down to business. Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to arrange a ridiculously romantic date between Marinette and Adrien.
Oh, that's so sweet!
Great!
Big time!
We know we can always count on you, Marinette; so you can count on us too.
Aw, thanks, girls.
You're up, Marinette.
Alya and I have come up with a plan. It's called \Operation: Secret Garden\"."
Excuse me, but why do we need a plan? I mean, can't Marinette just go up to Adrien and ask him out?

Seriously, Mylène? This is Marinette we're talking about here. Now, each one of you will have a codename based on a flower. Alix, you'll be \Violet\". Mylène, you'll be \"Sunflower\". Juleka, you'll be \"Rose\". And Rose will be \"Tulip\". "
Um, why isn't my name \Rose\"?"
Because \Rose\" is your real name."
It won't be a codename if we call you \Rose\".This afternoon, \"Buttercup\" has a photo shoot at the Trocadéro fountains."
