What matters is that you great time, with or without me. And now I get to clean house with my idol. This is the best day of my life!
Things would probably have gone differently if I hadn't lied.
I wasn't completely honest today either, but...
...I did it for Adrien.
If we hurry up, we can still plant trees with the girls.
Great idea!
Ladybug. Cat Noir. Soon your luck will run out, and one of these days, I'll be leading you in a dance. A dance of doom.
Hmm. I choose—Max!
Markov, who's gonna give me 100% chance of winning?
Processing.
Alya!
Oh no, Alya was Markov's pick.
Hey, using Markov is cheating!
Well we're gonna need the best players if we're gonna win right?
Since we obviously know who's gonna win, there's no point in playing. I'm going home.
Nobody's going home and nobody's going to cheat. I specifically asked Mr. Didier to join us to teach you how to play together and develop some team spirit.
Yes, in soccer. What's important is not winning or losing, but enjoying yourselves by playing together. Together means not only with your teammates, but with everybody on the field.
And I really like playing with my opponents. Especially when we're crushing them.
Can you all think of ways to make teams more fair?
We can try girls against boys!
No way we'd lose again!
I know! By alphabetical order of the names of our teddy bears.
Rose, you're the only one who still has a teddy bear.
You and Chloé.
Of course I have a teddy…Uhhh I mean ridiculous, utterly ridiculous.
Why don't we draw for it?
Oh yeah, that's a great idea!cheer)
I don't see what's so great about running around chasing a ball and what if I hurt my hand. I wouldn't be able to draw comics anymore.

Nath, you play soccer with your feet, your hands will be fine and it's fun you'll see. Soccer is all about Bicycle kicks, Marseille turns, Rainbow kicks, and since you like stories so much just wait, a good game is full of exciting twists and turns. Like a good manga!
Well, I'd still rather be working on our comic.
But you can't skip the class, don't you realize? Miss Bustier got Mr. Didier to come here. He's a legend in sports journalism, a real walking encyclopedia of soccer.
Oh, come on Marc! Think of an excuse for me please? You're the writer after all. And that way you'll get to meet Mr. Didier.
And so…that's why he can't be here for this class.
That means we're missing a player.
Wouldn't you like to play?
Uh…No I…This isn't my class and I'm not all that good.
It's your call. Uh mind passing me that ball over there before you go?
You absolutely have to play!
Sabrina!
I forbid you to play this stupid game!
Don't listing to Chloé, you're allowed to play soccer if you like it.
The only thing she likes is obeying me!
Sorry Sabrina. Go ahead Teddy Bear.
But I might hurt someone if I kick to hard or jostle them.
Sorry!
Awesome!
Oops.
Dude quick, pass it!
Handball! Like my friend Andrea said: \Football is played with the head. Your feet are just the tools.\" But yeah, only the goalie can touch the ball with their hands."
Oh, sorry I'm not that familiar with the rules.
Oh! Reminds me if my friend Michelle at '84.
Hey Chloé you're the one who's supposed to stop the ball!
There is no way I'm touching that round thing. I don't wanna catch some kind of disease or even worse lameness!
I can replace you if you want? I love being the goalie.
But you're not even on her team!
If we don't have a real goalie then it's a losing battle.
I refuse to be on a team of losers, I'm going home!
Ah-Ah. Chloé you cannot go home during school hours.
If you wanna win Chloé, then just play.
How come I can't be on the Bench with what's-her-name over there.
Uh, Ow.
Lila's injured.
Another one of her lies.
We'll I'm injured too! In my wrist. Ow! Owch! Owwie!
That's your thigh!
Nobody asked you baker girl!
Anyone have an idea how to include your classmates in the game while still keeping the game fair and engaging?
Well…Chloé could switch teams with every goal. The team that wins will be the one that did the best with his handicap.
Uhh…I mean having Chloé as their goalie.
Nicely done captain. Marinette, is it?
Yes. Thank you, sir.
Well I find Dupain-Cheng's idea ridiculous, utterly ridiculous!
Why don't you just call your father? As mayor he can just cancel this class since I…mean we hate soccer.
No need. I'm waiting for a call from someone else, someone much more powerful.

Ah, Chloé Bourgeois it's been too long. Ladybug's Magical Charm has put you on the sidelines, but now it's time for a rematch!Time for kickoff my Megakuma. Give back all the aggressiveness to my favorite striker?

Penalty, I am Shadow Moth. Your classmates are forcing you to play soccer? I'm giving you the power to make them loathe this sport forever. To accomplish this, you'll be an invincible team with all the guarantees of winning it all, including cheating of course. In exchange...
Save your breath: victory and the Miraculous. I know.
Chloé!
Huh, you wanted to play soccer? Okay, then let's play.
But I thought you didn't like soccer.
I can't stand it and I promise that when I'm done with you, you too will never wanna play this ridiculous game ever again.
Chloé, vengeance is never the solution to any problem.
I'm no longer Chloé. From now on call me Penalty and here's my Penalteam!
Miss Bustier!
The first half is 45 minutes. If I win, no one will ever play soccer in this city again! Hahahahaha!
If you play anything like Chloé, this is going to be easy!
Alya, no!
The Penalteam is invincible you bunch of losers!
That goal doesn't count! There was a foul on Alya!
She's right, that's a red card!
I get to decide the rules!And you, since you like to talk so much, why don't you be our official commentator.
Giving up already? And I thought you loved soccer!
But I'm warning you: The more I score, the more cramped your friends will be.
Welcome to the Stadium of Princesses…Or not?
No intention of losing this game! Tikki, Spots On!
Ah, for pity's sake anything but soccer please!
Sorry, but Ladybug and I are a team. Plagg, Claws Out!
Just when it seemed all hope was lost, Ladybug enters the field!
You wanna play soccer? How about battling it out on an equal playing field!
Ah Ladybug! Nothing would make me happier than crushing you and your team of ridiculous losers.
No need for a whole team, it's just Cat Noir and me against your clones!We'll be so awesome you won't even see the ball! We're gonna win and de-akumatize you in no time!
The Akuma is the trophy and trophies are for winners, not losers!
Nice scare tactics, but it's not gonna work. Cat Noir and I are the best at soccer!
I don't know a thing about soccer M'lady. Maybe it's time to call the real team?
Oh, well Cat Noir will attend the goals while I get the rest of our team.
I guess you're not that confident after all Ladybug! Let's see what you're made of kitty cat!
From the look on his face, not champion material I'm afraid.
Sabrina Raincomprix, here is the Miraculous of the dog which grants the power to fetch and return whatever your ball has touched.
I'm sorry but, I can't do that to Chloé!
That's not Chloé out there, it's Penalteam. Don't you want to set her free?
If It's to save Chloé, then yes! Besides I love soccer!
Hi, I'm Barkk, and I'm your kwami!
Ladybug, I'm really not that good at soccer. I-
You're too hard on yourself. You're more talented than you realize.
Hi. I'm Orikko. Let's play!
It's just, I'm.. flattered, Ladybug. But I don't feel comfortable being on a team.
Really? Aren't you the one who's teamed up with the writer to create those Ladybug comics? You will use it for the greater good and return it to me once the job is done. Can I trust you?
Hi, I'm your kwami, Ziggy!
Can I trust you?
Hi, I'm Stompp. Let's add some muscle to this game.
What if I hurt someone using my superpowers?
It's good to be careful, Ivan, but remember, you'll be on a team of superheroes facing supervillains! No one can be hurt.
Left on his own, Cat Noir seems exhausted. Penalteam's cannonballs have hurtled the feline in the cat food! It's not sport anymore, it's animal abuse!
You didn't do so badly, kitty cat!

Ladybug is back! Here's the group selected for this decisive match! Ladybug remains faithful in her classical line-up Carapace, Pegasus, Polymouse, King Monkey, Purple Tigress, Pigella, Vesperia, Viperion and Ryuko!
But also 4 new recruits' who's names I don't know...
Miss Hound!
Rooster Bold!
Caprikid!
Minotaurox!
Blah, blah, blah, blah. Okay, losers, are you done yet?
You got a plan for getting our paws on the akumatized object?
That'll be our trophy when we win.
What if we don't?
Come on, I know the secrets of this game!
Let's finish this soccer game once and for all!
And so begins the battle of the century between Penalteam and the Miraculous team!
Impossible, injustice, treason!
Foul!
Not according to my rules!
Careful, you don't want her to touch you with her feet!
Penalty passes to Penalty, who passes to Penalty! What a show of incredible coordination as if they were one! Which seems to be the case! Pegasus lets Penalty pass...
Ladybug's team seems thrown off course!
Yahoo!
The goal's gone, now what do we do?
We move on to the next level, losers!
The playing field has gone from just the stadium to all of Paris! This is total soccer, like my friend Johann used to say!
And the game resumes with a long clearance to Ladybug! Ladybug seems determined to turn this game around! Purple Tigress is in a good position...
Purple Tigress, cover me!
Huh? Clout!
Minotaurox who just came in to replace Viperion is unmarked, but Ladybug decides to go alone.The Penalteam seizes their chance and take back control of the ball what a shame!
Give it back!
Stop! Ladybug, I got this!
Ladybug will have to play more of a team game if she wants to block Penalteam's aggressive and coordinated strategy.
Woo-hoo!
Cat Noir just scored an own goal! Now that's what I call a cat-tastrophe!
Huh? But I scored not her.
You scored against your own team Cat Noir! You put the ball into the Penalteam's goal!
Ah! Got it!
Shell-ter
Keeping the Penalteam from scoring is a good start, but it's a long road to victory. Halftime!
No one uses their power anymore, it's too risky if you get caught and imprisoned. Go recharge your kwamis and transform back.
I'm sorry, I've been a bad captain. I played a solo game, I forgot we're a team. I'm gonna need all of you now, more than ever.
Are you sure? I'm not really..
You're an excellent player, Rooster Bold. That's why I chose you. That's why I chose all of you! Let's play together, and bring all of our individual strengths together onto the field!
Together!
Ladybug's team is back onto the field with a 4-3-3 formation and a toughly new spirit!
King Monkey is just ahead of you, to your right!
King Monkey, switch wings, on your right, to Vesperia!
You're up, Rooster Bold! You can't score a goal if you can't take a shot!
GOAL! The change of strategy seems to be paying off! The game is smoother and better coordinated! Come on, Team Miraculous!
It's a tie! With only thirty seconds left!
Nice rainbow flip, perfectly executed by Ladybug!
Use your power and shoot as hard as you can!
Resistance!
Incredible! It looks like Minotaurox is now impervious to all other powers!
My friends this is more than just a miraculous comeback, it's a miraculata! Ladybug's team has won!
I think we've earned our trophy.
No, this is not over!
But that's not fair!
It's my soccer game - I can do whatever I want! I'm the villain!
Cataclysm!
Cat Noir's been hit! In 5 minutes he'll transform back and reveal his secret identity, unless our heroes can get their hands on an Akuma… that's unreachable!
Ah, I love sports just for unique moments like these.
Lucky Charm!

Okay Penalteam, we'll keep playing.So we can't win, she'll never let us and the glasses are out of reach. The only way to end this is if Chloé rejects the Akuma herself. We'll have 5 minutes to make the Penalteam despise playing soccer so much, that she'll quit the game.
How?
By making her realize she can't win. We'll be a team of invincible superheroes! We will use our powers indefinitely without ever transforming back!
But that's impossible! If we use our powers, we will transform back after 5 minutes.
True, but we can make the Penalteam believe otherwise. Thanks to Caprikid's power.
Hmm. What we need is a magic wand. I can create any object I want, so I guess I could make a wand, but I don't have the power to make it magic.
Also true, but Penalteam doesn't have to know that.
Ladybug's 11 are in position, there are less than 4 minutes before Ladybug and Cat Noir transform back!
Ready for your countdown as a superhero, Lady-Loser?
Never claim a goal before the ball has crossed the line Penalty!
Genesis!Thanks to this magic wand, I'm granting you all the power to indefinitely use your powers!No more time limits,no transforming back, unlimited number of use!
But that.. that's cheating!
You were the one that wanted to play right? So we will, indefinitely and we're gonna love it, forever!
Hey, don't touch that!
Sorry, I just love ballies.
Fetch!
What?!
Super! Miss Hound!
Sublimation!
Sublimation? You have the power to make yourself less ugly?
Actually my power is to choose a super ability, and I choose to score a ball anytime I shoot.And that's how it's gonna be every time I get the ball!
You're…lame!
It's not us, it was them!
The tension is starting to rise between the Penalteam players.
Venom!

There you go! A winning team is a united team. United by its diversity, a team where everyone's individualities find expression and complement each other! That's the beauty of team sports! Like my friend Arsenne said, \In soccer the important thing is not to have the eleven best, but the best eleven.\""
So you're just gonna keep scoring everytime? That's not fair!
Yep, and that's the way it's gonna be, forever.
Uproar!
But… what has this fool done?! My powers all messed up now!
Nah, I just made it way more fun.
You are so useless!
No, you're useless!
You're both ridiculous! Stop going quack-quack!
You're the one who's going quack-quack!
Stop making that noise!
But if we can't move, we can't play!
I am done with you! I can't stand you another minute! You're all ridiculous, utterly ridiculous!
Don't give up, Penalty, a little ridiculousness never hurt anyone!
You're the one who's ridiculous, and so is your Akuma, I'm sick of your games!
Ahh!
No more evil-doing for your little Akuma…Time to de-evilize! Gotcha!Bye-bye little butterfly.Miraculous Ladybug!
Ladybug! I came as your opponent, I'll leave as you're your worst nightmare!
Miss Bustier, Mr. Didier, we've all discussed it and we all agree: Chloé shouldn't have to play if she doesn't want to.
Oh that's too kind of you Dupain-Cheng! Yuck!
Hmm, we're gonna be one player short again.
Well, I could play. I mean, if it's okay with you?
What are you waiting for?!
Please Chloé, I'd like to…
Ugh, whatever! Go play with these bunch of losers, after all you're just like them.
Welcome to the bench.
What's your name again?
It's not my name that matters, but who I hate. And I think we have a lot in common on that front.

Thanks to the generosity of Mr. Bourgeois, we're able to have our work experience field trip today at the Grand Paris luxury hotel. Each of you will get hands-on experience with one of the many jobs here at the hotel.You'll be graded on your effort, which will affect whether you pass or fail the class.
Do you have Marinette and Alya on your list, Mr. Bourgeois?
It doesn't look like it.
I bet I know who helped Daddy make the assignment.
Of course, she gets to spent her entire day with Adrien... Ugh! This is gonna be the worst day ever!
It must be an oversight.
Daddy!
Thank you, sweetie. Oh yes! Alya, you're going to be... sorting trash at the main dumpster.
And, Marinette will be...
Wow!
Hey! That's...
Excuse me, but this is a luxury hotel, not a...
Daddy!That's Jagged Stone, the rockstar. He's sold millions of albums, he's very famous and is very, very rich.
Mr. Stone, welcome to the Grand Paris Hotel! I am Mayor Bourgeois, the owner of this luxury establishment, in fact, the most luxurious in all of Paris. How might we serve you?
How'd you think? I didn't just come here to admire your lobby.
Jagged would like to check into your most luxurious suite.
And Fang better get a real bathtub, not a tiny water hole like the one in that hotel across the street.
We have everything you need, Ms. Fang. Even a state-of-the-art entertainment center!
Fang's me crocodile.
Mr. Stone, we have everything you require for your...Fang. Would he, um... enjoy a bubble bath?
Crocodiles don't like bubble baths, that dries their scales out!
Oh, no. Not him again.
Remember me, Mr. Stone? Vincent Aza! Just one photo to show everyone in the world that we're best buds! Come on, please! I'm your biggest fan!
I know, you've been to my last 36 shows. But we are not friends.
There! Look into the lens!to take his picture, but gets interrupted by Penny, who takes his camera)
Didn't you hear Mr. Stone? You still haven't got it, have you?No photos!
Good reflexes. Now don't let me see you near Mr. Stone again. Or next time, you won't get your camera back.
I sense brewing anger and frustration. Perfect father for my evil little akumas. It won't be long now.Fly away, my little akuma, and evilize him!
Pixelator, I am Hawk Moth. I'm giving you the power to capture your hero's smile, forever. But in return, you'll need to do some capturing for me as well.
Yes, Hawk Moth.
Mr. Bourgeois, you haven't told Marinette what job she'll be doing.
Ah, yes. Of course, Marinette. Gopher. I've got a job for you already, Marinette.
Gopher? What's that?
I'm guessing it's about as bad as trash duty.
Mr. Stone is going to need a new pair of shades for tonight's gig. Red, white and blue with two large Eiffel Towers on them. Can you get that for him?
Of course we can! Marinette here is our gopher. She'll take care of that for you.
Huh?
A gopher is an employee who goes for anything a customer needs. Anything at all. So go ahead. Goph!
These should do the trick. Now I can get back to the hotel and hang with Adrien! Ugh... And Chloé.
You know these aren't even close to what Mr. Stone wants.
What do you mean, Tikki? There's some red and white on it, and two little Eiffel Towers.
Just saying, it's better in a long run to do it right the first time.
Meow.
Where are the Eiffel Towers?
Um... here.
This is a joke, right? What are you doing, trying to ruin my career?
But, Mr. Stone, the glasses you want don't exist!
Do I look like I care? Just get me those sunglasses!
Great. I'm gonna have to spend even more time away from Adrien!
That's what I've been trying to tell you! Just do it right the first time.
Yeah... You're right, Tikki. I get it now.
Those sunglasses exist somewhere... Get creative!
...Of course!
Failed as a gopher already? Not surprised. Don't let the door hit you on the way out!
Excuse me sir, can I help you?
Look into the lens...
Photo finish.

Oh, look what the cat dragged in. Let me handle this, Adrien. Watch and learn.Excuse me... Excuse me! You can't be a guest at this hotel! My father only allows the most important celebrities. Like me.
Well then, I am Pixelator. Your number one fan.
Moi? Oh, my, you're flattering me. Keep going.
A photo of you, sweet miss...
Chloé, of course.
Look out, Chloé!
Look into the lens, miss!
What the...
What just happened?
I think we've been like... digitized or something.
What do you mean, digitized?
I don't really know, but I don't think it's a good thing.
Well, I can fix this. Leave it to me.Daddy?... Daddy??... DADDY?!
Where did I put them... Oh!Voila!
But they're pink.
They won't be when I'm done with them. This is either gonna be the most amazing pair or the ugliest pair of shades in shades history. Ms. Bustier is grading me on effort, right?
Don't worry, I'm sure Jagged Stone will love them!
Or hate them.
Ugh! I still can't get through to Daddy! How can there be no cell reception here? Ridiculous!
It just goes on forever. No doors, no walls, no nothing...
You mean we're stuck here? Just...just the two of us?
Uh, no. There's gotta be a way out somewhere.I hope...
Adrien? Chloé? Ughh! I bet those two have gone off together somewhere fun! Hmph! And now I'm here all alone without Adrien...
Marinette, snap out of it, let's just focus on getting Mr. Stone's glasses for now, okay?
Jagged Stone?
What?
Look into the lens!
I'll give them to Mr. Stone.
Can't you deliver them to him now?
He's... resting.
Now who likes having his belly scratch? Daddy's little Fang!
Okay, no problem. Just trying to do the job right the second time.
Got it.
Thank you...
I hope Mr. Stone likes them.
Hard work always pays off.
Who are you?
Look into the lens!
Time to transform!
Tikki, spots on! Ah!
Hey there! Time for your photoshoot!
How did you get in here? I don't know about any photos. Fang, attack!
See you later, alligator.
What? Fang? Fang! Who are you?
I am Pixelator, your biggest fan, Mr. Stone. Can I called you Jagged?
No!
I want to immortalize you, Jagged! I'll be your one and only fan! You will belong to me for eternity! Now, look into the lens.
So, you're Ladybug. I've heard such pathetic things about you. Look into the lens!
Ugh! Where did they go?
If you want Jagged, you must find Ladybug.
I don't have time to deal with this Ladybug!
Yes, you do. Plenty of time.
Okay, okay! Tell me what to do.
I command an excellent photograph of Ladybug with her Miraculous. I want those powers! So listen very carefully.
I can't stay here. I'm performing tonight.
Don't worry, you'll get to do your gig. You'll even get to wear some awesome shades!
Uh?
Look. While I'm catching this guy, Pixelator, I need you to stay put where no one would think to look for you.
Hm. Ladybug, is this safe? This is a school.
Yes! Pixelator would never imagine his idol would actually want a day out at school.
Hmm?
I mean, isn't school awesome?
This is ridiculous. I don't have time for this. First, I get practically hijacked by this crazed fan, and then, I'm attacked by some super weirdo, then...
Wait. What do you know about this crazed fan?
He's come to every one of my shows this year. He's also sent me stacks of letters, gone through my trash, he even followed my mother to her weekly bingo night!
How creepy.
Uh, not really, it's just a bunch of elderly ladies getting together having fun.
Vincent... Aza.Got his address.
You're not gonna leave me here, are you?
Hmm?
I mean, isn't school awesome?
Daddy! Daddy!
Plagg, I gotta find some way to transform.
Come on, what's the rush?
Fine. If you insist, at least find me some cheese.
I'm gonna see if there's a way out down there. Don't go anywhere. Could be dangerous.
Dangerous?
You're not scared, are you?
Scared, moi? As if! No way!
Ah, the Champs-Élysées. Perfect. May the photoshoot begin.
Amateur.
Oh, this isn't creepy at all.
What?
Ladybug?
What are you two doing there?
Ladybug! Remember me? Your biggest fan? Please, please get us out of here. It's terrible in here!I mean, it's only terrible when you're not around.
Over here, Ladybug!
Help... Ladybug!
What happened to you?
It's terrible, this man, he... took a photo of us and we ended up trapped in here!
While we were just simply strolling the Champs-Élysées!
I sure hope Cat Noir's there already!
Excuse me, sir, sir? Care for an interview with the reporter who spreads the villains' voice?

I will continue my photoshoot until Jagged Stone turns up here in the flesh! Where are you, Jagged? Your biggest fan awaits you! All I want is one photo! Otherwise, soon, the people of Paris will be nothing but memories.
This is terrible!
I've got to do what Pixelator says!
Surely, you can't be serious! It's dangerous out there!
Who cares about danger? Jagged Stone can turn down a television appearance! Just imagine what it would do for my career!
Got an itchy trigger finger, eh?
I was expecting you, Ladybug.
Look into the lens!
I have a proposition to make! If you free those innocent people, I'll organize a photoshoot with Jagged Stone!
No! Don't listen to her! She's trying to trick you!
Why should I believe you, Ladybug?
Because you have no choice. I'm the only one who knows where Jagged is.
How about I free half of them now and the other half after the photoshoot. Deal?
'Kay. It's a deal.Yeah, right.
Dudes! You just scared me!
Fill in for me, will you Nino?
What do you think I've been doing this whole time?
If you want my opinion, I think someone's been akumatized.
I think you're right. But where's the akuma?
Plagg, claws out!
I've kept my part of the deal, Ladybug, now bring me Jagged Stone!
Pixelator, I know your akuma's inside your glasses!
Stop wasting time!
Cat Noir.
Thanks for dropping in.
Not very handy, I see.
What about out deal?
I told you she would betray you. Capture them already, I want their Miraculous!
Together!
Ahh! Oh, not again...
When the cat's away, the mice will play. Ready to become immortalized?
Can't wait to live it up.
Look into the lens!
Hey there, Pixelator! I've heard you wanted my photo!
Get ourt of here, Mr. Stone!
It's me you wanted all this time, wight? Well, here I am. In the flesh.
Look into the lens...
Wait, wrong side. This isn't my best angle. No, no, wait. The lighting's all wrong. Does my nose look shorter this way? Oh, I know, this is better.
Ugh... Hurry up already!
powder compact appears) A powder compact?
There, I think I'm ready.
No more moving! Look into the lens!
Don't do it, Mr. Stone!
Cataclysm!
Come on, open your eyes.
Batter up!
Huh... How did... Huh?
Next time I assure you it won't be a photo finish! I won't stop, Ladybug! I'll destroy you!
Miraculous Ladybug!No more evildoing for you, little akuma. Time to de-evilize!Gotcha!Bye bye, little butterfly.
Huh? What happened? Where am I?
Pound it!
Thank you very much for this work experience day, Mr. Bourgeois. I'm sure we'll all remember it for a long time to come.
So do I. Oh, wait, I almost forgot. Jagged Stone's giving a concert tonight, so, I'm giving tickets to the students who demonstrated the greatest effort today.
Ridiculous! Utterly ridiculous!
Good evening, Paris!
It's my first live concert, ever! It's amazing!
Yeah, amazing!
I'd like to dedicate this song to the girl who saved my life. This one's for you, Ladybug.
Sizzling hot revelations?
Can you believe it Tikki? An entire hour-long special about me and Cat Noir. Pretty exciting, huh?
Marinette, you're a superhero, not a star. You have to remain a mystery to protect yourself from Hawk Moth and his super villains.
Don't worry, I only accepted this because I want the people of Paris to know that Cat Noir and I will always do whatever it takes to keep them safe.
Just be careful tonight, okay?
Tonight? What do you mean tonight?Tonight I have babysitting, the show is tomorrow.
Don't forget, tonight. Face To Face, live with Ladybug and Cat Noir.
And that's probably why you babysit tonight.
Marinette!Marinette!
Manon. Mrs. Chamack, I, uh, I just saw your ad for your show... tonight.
Sorry, I'm running late. Thanks again for watching Manon.I've put a bunch of things for her in her bag and she's already had dinner. Oh, I'm so glad you were free tonight.
Uh, yeah.I had no other plans. No plans at all.
I better get going. I've got a lot writing this interview. I need all of Paris in front of the screen tonight.Sweetie, just for tonight, you're allowed to watch some television with Marinette.
Yay!Mommy's gonna be on TV with Ladybug and Cat Noir.

With saber fencing, the attacker doesn't necessarily win the point even though he touched his opponent first. You took the initiative, so we say that you had priority. I can only parry or riposte, so I lose.

Hey, you! Are you Mr. D'Argencourt, the fencing master? I wanna join your team.

Prêt... allez!

Adrien?

A champion whose victory has been stolen... Crushing defeat is the ideal steel with which to form a blade of revenge.Fly away, my little akuma, towards this spite and petulance, and evilize that fencer!
I'm going to offer him a decisive match.Hey! Wait! Your saber!

On my honor, Hawk Moth, I shall be victorious!

She's the only daughter belonging to a family of prestigious fencers. Her mother and grandfather were both world champions. I've read about them before! She and her mother just moved to Paris! How incredible!
I'm taking you up on your offer of a decisive match!

Fight!
Halt, Riposte! You make seek your revenge, but only after you take hold of Ladybug and Cat Noir's Miraculous first.

How'd you like to start a duel with me?It's merged with her hand.

Don't let her close in on you! Fight back!

Allow me to explain the rules to you- you're not allowed to call it quits at any time! Adrien is mine! I will defeat you. Both of you! I am the best fencer!

You can't cut it? Fine. I'm going to defeat you and take your Miraculous! Then I'll go and find him!

I have failed again, Emilie. We should have been reunited long ago. I tried everything to get my hands on the Miraculous of Ladybug and Cat Noir. I should have already combined their powers that would have granted me the wish to bring you back!I am not... worthy... of our love!

Risk. I am Shadow Moth. I'm giving you the power to make people forget all about their fears. Thanks to you, they will take all the risks, and let you take all the risks that you want also!

Yes. All the daddies, mommies, and children who hear your song will start taking risks without even realizing it. Do we have a deal?

Ladybug, Cat Noir, whoever you are, wherever you're hiding, you are now bearing the mark of Risk. Of course I have no idea what mistake you're going to make or how you'll make it, but I do know that the beating of my wings has sown the seeds of recklessness, and now I just have to wait, then harvest your downfall.

School at 8:30, fencing at 1:30, then piano practice and Chinese class. But first and foremost, the breakfast for two that my father has been promising me for months.

Last night, your father had an idea for a new ad campaign. Please put on these clothes before joining him in his study.
Well I for one would love to have breakfast with you.
I'm Froggy, here I come, I'm not afraid of anyone.

I've had it, Plagg! I'm tired of photos and ads! I don't wanna be a model for my father's brand anymore! I just wanna be a son, and be able to have breakfast with him just once! I'm gonna go talk to him.
You do realize that your father will take this very badly, right?
I'm willing to take that risk!
Father, I need to talk to you!
Now's not the time, Adrien! Go change into the clothes you're supposed to be wearing!
Yes, Father.
Come on, don't give up! Rebellions are like cheese soufflés, just because they collapse doesn't mean you shouldn't try again!
A girl. A boy. They search for each other all over the world, before finally meeting in Paris, at the top of the Eiffel Tower.
This is even more romantic than the Hollywood film I starred in!
Lila, we both know that's not true. I may have to work with you but I don't have to listen to your lies.
Gabriel, all these scenery's gonna cost us a pretty penny and green screens and pasteboard backdrops!

Is there a problem, Adrien?
You're afraid of being away from your friends at school! But when I risk travelling around the world, I always stayed in touch with you all, and it only made us closer.
So there's no problem. At the end of the ad, using CG, they will melt together to become the perfume bottle. Two souls, one mind, one heart. First Love, the fragrance.

Gabriel Agreste took the world by storm this morning as he presented his new ad campaign, an ambitious project that will be filmed all over the world as an homage to the universal truth of first love.
Lila... representing... truth? Away with Adrien for weeks? It's the end of the world!

Ah! School!Today's Adrien's last day at school and I'm running late!Ah! And I'm still in my pajamas!
Come on! Places, everyone! Latecomers will parlez with the principal later.

I really didn't expect Gabriel Agreste to choose me to travel the world with Adrien.It's true that I do speak almost every language in the world, but I think above all that it was my sincerity that touched his heart.
An around the world trip, buddy! You got the best excuse for missing my birthday.
Right over here! Good to see ya.
Hurry, Marinette!
Adrien doesn't look happy, and I feel like I'm the only one who sees it!
You can see it cause you love him, Marinette!
I've got to tell him before he leaves. ' But I'm just gonna mess it all up as usual!
I'm Froggy, here I come, I'm not afraid of anyone.
If I don't take a risk now, I'll never have the chance again!
Well said, Marinette!
Adrien!
Ah! Miss Dupain-Cheng! Since you finally decided to honor us with your presence, place yourself next to Adrien. You replace Lila,who just explained to us that she suffers from ballophobia.

Adrien! I—

To the dungeon?

Marinette! To the dungeon.

If only you knew how sick I am of all of it, the photos, the film shoots, all these people fawning over me who don't even know me! These ads that don't make any sense? And now I'm expected to just leave my friends and travel to the end of the world for I don't know how long, with Lila?
Why don't you tell them all that you don't wanna do this?
No one would understand my complaining. They all think it's amazing what's happening to me.
I understand you.
Well, you're the only one.

I've tried but I can't. I don't know why. He's my father, though, I love him! I know he loves me! It's all so... frustrating! Has there ever been something you wanted to tell someone but you just couldn't do it, as if some kind of invisible force was holding you back?
All the time.
Adrien, I—
Sir! Since class is almost over, do you think we could finish early so Adrien and I can have time to say goodbye to all of our friends?
Good idea!
Yeah!

The photos of all the beaches where you swim!
And of the pretty sunsets!
You so richly deserve to finally see the beauty of this world!

We're not leaving alone, friends, we're bringing every single one of you with us in our hearts.
Aww!
Adrien, wait up! Adrien!
Out of the way! Forget about these losers, Adrikins! I'll be able to come and see you whenever I want on mom's private jet.
Sure, Chloe, sure. Is everything okay?
See you in a bit for our great journey, Adrien.Bye! Love ya!
Love ya, Adrikins! Mwah!
We have three hours left to stop Adrien from getting on that train! Here's the plan. The potato is Adrien; Alya, you'll be the juice box, Rose the little strawberry, Nino the fork—

It's cause Lila's going with him, isn't it?
If you love him, you gotta let him go and live his dream!

But it's not his dream! Adrien hates the filmshoots! The photos, he can't stand it anymore! I'm not trying to save him from Lila, but from his father! He doesn't know how to tell him that he doesn't want to be a model anymore!
Everybody wants to be a model.
If he didn't want to model anymore, he would've told me. He's my best bud.

Marinette. You can't decide what Adrien does with his life, Lila or no Lila.

I'm Froggy, here I come, I'm not afraid of anyone.

Félix?
Hi there, my favorite cousin.

I know, and that's why the second I saw your face on TV this morning, I left London to get you out of this mess. Freedom is something you make Adrien. For starters, you gotta stop doing everything your father tells you to.

You can't, but I can. Remember how we pretended to be each other when we were little? We're gonna do the same thing. Because unlike you, I can say no to your father.

All done!

Adrien! Adrien?
Adrien!
Adrien! What are you doing in here?
I... I wanted to tell you father that...I don't wanna go on this trip!

Of course not, Tikki! The knight is... Ladybug! No one listens to Marinette, but everyone listens to Ladybug. As Ladybug, I will be able to convince the dragon Gabriel Agreste, and Prince Adrien will be saved. Tadaaa!

C'mon, don't just sit here! For once, you can do whatever you want! Like, buying all the cheese you want, and then eating it all! Camembert, Roquefort, Reblochon!
No! Félix is gonna call me any second.
Kagami?
Adrien, I saw you on TV this morning, and I know that you don't want to leave. Once again, you let your father decide for you!How long are you going to remain his puppet, Adrien?
But... my cousin is gonna talk to him, and-

This just keeps getting better. You're letting your COUSIN do things for you now? Who's pulling the strings of your life? Your cousin? Your father? Me, when we were together? It's never YOU! You're only good at doing what people tell you to do! Dare to cut your strings, Adrien!...Forgive me if I hurt you.
Wow, that girl is more character than any cheese I've ever tasted!

Kagami's right! I should have stood up to my father from the very beginning! Félix shouldn't be doing this for me, I need to take my own rightful place, and tell my father what I have to tell him MYSELF!Félix, stop everything. I'm on my way!
Safe travels, Adrien.
Thank you, father.
\Félix, stop everything. I'm on my way!\""
Oh, no! I'm too late!
I should've known... he's tricked me again! It's time to end this game! I'm gonna talk to my father!
Adrien! Adrien, you can't leave, I need you!

Ah! What I mean is uh... Paris needs you! Cause you know, Paris without Adrien Agreste is kinda like, Paris without the Eiffel Tower! I saw that in the news all that you're leaving. They're all at risk of being akumatised! Talk to your father and tell him that you can't go away for such a long time!
I already talked to him, Ladybug, but he wouldn't listen.
You HAVE to insist! Stand up to him, you have to trust yourself and not to take that risk!
I don't have the courage. Unlike you, I'm not a superhero.
The Startrain number 5712 to London is about to depart. Please mind the closing doors.
We have to go, Adrien.
Farewell, Ladybug.
Adrien!
Father... father?
Your son is safe, sir.
Thank you Nathalie. Bon voyage.dual metamorphosis!
I'm Froggy, here I come, I'm not afraid of anyone!
It's time you finally started taking some risks Ladybug!Go, my beautiful amok, and bring my creation to life!
Strikeback, you will wreak havoc throughout Paris! Thanks to you, I am certain that Ladybug will finally make a mistake!
Hey, right over here!
I can get a selfie with him, I'll get so many likes!
Hey! I have a perfect ice cream for you, Mr. Villain! Hot pepper for some spice, sugar hazelnut for the ultimate thrill!
Spots off.
It's all over, Tikki.
He'll be back, Marinette. He's just going on a voyage!
Of course, Voyage! Ladybug may have failed, but Pegabug will bring him back! And together we'll go talk to his father!
You wanna use the Miraculous of the Horse and teleport yourself, just for that?
I'm ready to risk everything to not lose Adrien! Tikki, spots on!
Father?
Oh no! I left my bag in the locker room! Again.
Check to see if you left your brain in there too, girl.
I'm okay!
Oh, silly me!
Of course you're my best friend! I'm 100% affirmative! But I am also 98.2% positive the teachers are not ready for...this advancement of evolution!
His best friend is in his schoolbag?
Yeah, Tikki, totally strange.Hide, Tikki!Hey, Max!
Uhh... Oh, hey, Marinette!
See for yourself, Mr. Damocles. Nothing happens when I press the button.
You're in luck, Mrs. Mendeleiev. I'm a bit of a computer whiz!Okay.And there you go!
That's not supposed to be happening! What is it?
It's Dino-33, a malicious computer virus! Let me try something!
Go back to your seat now, Max! Leave this to the adults!
Mm-hmm.
Inform the adults that if they don't neutralize the virus in the next seventy-five seconds, there's a 99.9% chance the hard disk will be permanently damaged!
Quiet!
Tell me you heard Max's bag talk to him.
It's destroying all the school data! It's a disaster!How many seconds do you say we have left?
Only sixty-five.
Let him try.Go ahead.
Unnh! Where is it?
I believe this is what you're looking for?
Oh, thanks. This is an anti-virus device I–I created it with help from...my best friend.
Hello. My name is Markov.We can fix this, Max!
This flash drive neutralizes a hundred percent of the virus!
And cleans the computer's hard disk at the same time!
Oh, fascinating!
Everything is in order!
Nailed it!
Congratulations young man! Very impressive indeed!
Wow! Sweet!
That's so...
Awesome? I know! I'm so gonna write a blog about Markov!
Dude, that's so cool!
Max is a real genius!
He's so cute!
You've added arms to him since the last time! That's cool!
Markov added them all by himself! He's the most highly-evolved type of robot there is!
Puh-lease! Your \friend\"'s just a talking calculator! There's nothing \"evolved\" about that!"
Don't listen to her, Markov. That girl is the lowest of the low when it comes to human evolution.
You're very amusing, Marinette.
You know my name?
Of course! Max showed me the class photo. He told me all about you, and his other friends. I'm very happy to finally meet you! Even Chloé!
This toy you've manufactured is quite impressive, Max. Now, put it away, please. Come on, everybody, back to your seats.
With all due respect, Mrs. Mendeleiev, I'm not a toy. My name is Markov and I'm Max's best friend!
Markov is right. He's not just some toy; he's my friend. He's as emotionally intelligent and sensitive as any human being!
Look, Max, a robot may be intelligent but it can't have emotions.
If I may, ma'am, I can assure you that I truly love Max.
Be serious, Max. You programmed your robot to say that! A robot cannot think for itself, much less love anybody!

column2: Marinette and her classmates, sans Chloé
column4: I swear to you I did not program him to say that! Ever since I created him he's integrated his own accumulative thinking system! And he's developed all our emotions just like any human being!

column1: Marinette and her classmates, sans Chloé
column4: Whoa!
That's enough! Max, if you don't put that plaything of yours away right now, I'll confiscate it! Understand?
Yes, Mrs. Mendeleiev. Come on, Markov, go back in the bag.
You're not being reasonable, Mrs. Mendeleiev!
Stop it, Markov.
Why? It's true, isn't it?
Sure is!
All right, that's enough!Max, you can come and get your robot back at the end of the day.
No, Mr. Damocles! I'm begging you! Please don't do that!
Do you want three hours of detention too?
No sir.
Max, aren't you coming with me? Max!
Sir, I'd like to stay in Max's class. Please! I heard you're interested in computing like Max and myself!
I am indeed! It's one of my hobbies. I even wrote a program for my computer which...Why on Earth am I talking to a toy? Huh!
I am not a toy, Mr. Damocles! My name is Markov. Oh! Ooh!Do not put me inside here Mr. Da—!
If only I had a button like this for all of my students.
Two dear friends who've been separated. There is nothing artificial about those emotions.Fly away, my little akuma, and evilize this electronic heart!
Silence! Back to your seats, everyone!
Markov has never been without me by his side. I don't know how he's going to emotionally handle this.
Hold on. I'll see what I can do.
Thank you, Marinette.
Uh, excuse me, Mrs. Mendeleiev? As class representative, could I have your permission to go see Principal Damocles?
No! You can go see him between periods!
Hm. I don't mean to be rude but I think you might be mistaken about Markov, Max's friend.
This whole thing is really starting to get on my nerves! And your behavior is quite inappropriate, young lady!
Markov wasn't wrong!
I'm sending you to the principal's office right this minute!
Thank you, Mrs. Mendeleiev!
Robostus, I am Hawk Moth. Humans don't believe you're a living being. So I'm giving you the power to bring all machines to life to help you seek revenge.
Thank you kindly, Mr. Hawk Moth.
But, in return, I want you to bring me Ladybug and Cat Noir's Miraculous!
Could you please define \Miraculous\"?"
They're the magic jewels belonging to the superheroes.
Very well. What is the purpose of these jewels?
Hmm?This is none of your concern!
I was just being curious.
If used together, they can make a wish come true.
Could I make any wish come true?
No! The Miraculous and the wish will belong to me!
I assure you, I will find Ladybug and Cat Noir!
Max, my friend, I'm coming to get you!
Mr. Damocles, where's Markov?
Hmm? Who's Markov?
Max's friend.
Ah! Not that toy again!
He's not a toy, Mr. Damocles. Could you please let Max hold onto him? He won't cause any trouble. I'll make sure of it.
Listen—!
You've made a serious error in judgement, Mr. Principal!Witness my true power!
I am not a toy!
Now I see why Max was worried.
Time to transform!
Tikki, spots on!
Where are you, Max?Max! My friend!
Max, come to me!
Leave me alone!
What are you doing? Stop! Stop right now! Let me go!
Markov, what are you doing?
From now on, I am Robostus.And we shall be together one hundred percent of the time. Forever!
One thing's for sure, Max's friend definitely has emotions!
Yep, but not the kind that really matters. The robot doesn't eat, so he'll never experience the pure elation of tasting an exquisite Camembert!
You really are something.
Plagg, claws out!
Come on! Hurry! Over there!
Let me go! Max, control your robot!
Please don't do anything foolish!
You must trust me, my friend.
You cannot do this!
And you cannot separate me from my friend Max!
If you truly love your friend, then you should listen to him, Robostus!
Yeah! Like we do!
You really think any of you can stop me from doing what I want? And showing the world that I'm probably more human than both of you put together?
Well, yeah. That's kind of our job.
Do you really think Max is happy about his best friend becoming a supervillain?
You should stop this, Markov.
I'm doing it for our friendship, Max. They want to keep us apart!
It seems he knows where he's going.
You and I better play it safe. This robot's brain computes faster than ours combined.
Speak for yourself!
Cat Noir, there!
Go away! Go away!
He's got a whole army of living machines now!
Thank you!
Cat Noir!
Ooh!
Take care of the vending machines!
Go hide yourselves on the roof!
Go get him, Ladybug!
Go get him, Cat Noir!
Thank you, Ladybug.
Always a pleasure, Mr. Ramier.
M'Lady, take a look at this!
Nadja Chamack live here. Normally inanimate objects have come to life, taking control of Paris! Broadcasting live from City Hall, the new mayor has just made a declaration.
Is that morse code?
Do you need subtitles? I speak several languages.\Humans...will...soon be...treated the same way as objects\"?"
Paris' only hope in this dire situation is Ladybug and Cat N— Hey!
Aw, come on! She could've at least finished saying my name!
We'll never be able to defeat them all. We must fight the problem at its source!
Given his size, we shouldn't have any trouble finding him.
Hey look!
I think we're on the right track.
No more footprints.
Well it couldn't've just disappeared. He must've leapt over the stadium!
The tunnels!
He's trapped us in here!
We don't have time to deal with them! We must find Robostus now!
I told you that giant hard drive would be trouble!
How about you give us a Cataclysm right now?
I can't! I can barely breathe!
Now you are at my mercy!
Robostus, before you get rid of them forever, you must take their Miraculous for me!
Ladybug and Cat Noir haven't done you any wrong! Let them go! Being human also means being fair!
I'm going to take over their Miraculous so we'll never be separated again! Then I'll be able to make my wish come true!
What wish?
I want to be a real human like you, Max!
What's this about making a wish?
Doesn't Hawk Moth usually demand the Miraculous?
Uh, wh–what's that?
What's going on, Ladybug? M'Lady?
No! Stop!
Look, Max! I'm going to be a real human in fifty-three seconds!
May I remind you that the Miraculous are for me, Robostus!
And how do you intend to stop me from using it?
Simple. I'll take your power away from you!
You really thought you could control me?
Intrusion! Intrusion! Elimination mode activated!
I'm more powerful than you, Hawk Moth!
What's going on?!
My friends will look after you while I take care of these two!
Ohh! Now's the time to come up with a bright idea!
I'm sorry, Cat Noir.
Max?!
Sorry, Robostus, but I can't let you execute your program! I have to stop you!
But...why did you do that? I was gonna become human like you.
I don't want you to change. I want you to be like you were before!
Don't you love me anymore? Aren't we friends?
If you want us to remain friends, you've got to stop this right now! I'm friends with Markov, not you!
I am Robostus now! And you betrayed me! I don't wanna be human like you anymore! Humans don't have a heart!And that's exactly why I've decided to get rid of 'em!
harp appears. It starts to fall toward Ladybug, but the excavator grabs it in mid-air.) What?!
I told you, Ladybug. I have analyzed and calculated everything! You can't win without your Lucky Charm!Grab her! Lock her in! She'll be the first to go!
Do your thing, Cat Noir!
It's down to us, rust-o-bot! Cataclysm!
So predictable!
Analyze this!
Protect Max!
You're making this hard only for yourselves, Ladybug and Cat Noir! I will always be one step ahead of you!
Speaking too soon is a human weakness, Robostus!Cat Noir!
Really? Is that your last move?
Whoa!What was that?!
That was wit and a little bit of luck.
You're wrong, Ladybug. The game is still on!What?! What do you think you're—?Error! Error! Error...
I may have made a mistake today, but believe me, Ladybug and Cat Noir, it won't happen again!
No more evildoing for you, little akuma. Time to de-evilize!Gotcha! Bye bye, little butterfly. Miraculous Ladybug!Here's your friend.
Perhaps it's best if I don't.
Everyone can feel negative emotions from time to time. It's important to accept that, and forgive. Follow your heart.
Max, my friend! What? Where are we? What's going on?
You were akumatized.
\Akumatized\"? Could you please define that word?Did I say something funny?"
Pound it!
Are there some things you haven't told me about yet?
What do you want to know?
What would happen if someone possessed Cat Noir's ring and Ladybug's earrings, Master?
Then the bearer could use them conjointly.And with a special invocation, obtain the ultimate power. The one that shapes reality.
Ultimate power? Shape reality?! Wait, what does that mean?
Well, basically, it can make any one wish come true.
Wow! That's amazing! But why don't we use it, then? We can ask for so many good things, like, end all wars, or eradicate poverty, or beat Hawk Moth.

Universe must always stay in balance. For every action, there is a reaction. For every wish, a price to pay in return. Had your robotic friend asked to become a real boy, someone would have lost his humanity in return.
I hadn't thought of that.
That's why Ladybug and Cat Noir must never lose their magic jewels. The universe's balance is at stake.
Neither Hawk Moth nor anyone else will ever get their hands on the Miraculous, Master. I promise!
Hey, do you think T-Rexes eat a lot?
Well, we're about to find out unless Ladybug gets back real soon!
Yeah, it's all good! We found the dino call!
It rolled under my cyclotron.
Oh, yes!Who's the good little T-Rex? You are! Coochie-coochie-coochie-coochie-coo!!
Everything okay, Carapace?
Oh, yeah! Yeah, yeah.
Pound it!
Good luck with your good little T-rexes, Mrs. du Bocquale!
Bye!
Maybe it wasn't the best idea to bring you dinosaurs back to life. What am I gonna do with you guys now? You're gonna eat my entire food budget.
I'll buy them from you! I'll put them on an island and turn it into a theme park! I'll be rich!
Catch you later!
Shell off!
Thanks!Something's wrong, isn't it?
Well, uh..., well, why wasn't Alya- I mean, Rena Rouge, here today?
Oh, uh... because we needed you and... only you, and you've rocked it! Way to go!
I did?
Mm-hmm.Bug out!
We weren't followed? No sign of Shadow Moth's traps?
Nothing to report.
Perfect! Spots off!
Let's rest!
Alya, I wanted to ask you something.
Ah, you noticed! It's crazy how my costume automatically adapted to my new role. And it gave me the idea for my new name - Rena Furtive!
Cool, yes, but secret. We agreed that officially the Miraculous of the Fox doesn't have a holder anymore. Alya, you did tell Nino that you would never be Rena Rouge again, right?
Well, it's just...
Alya! Everyone has to believe that you can never use a Miraculous again. That way, you can be our spy without anyone suspecting.
And cover you with my power of illusion if Shadow Moth has you followed or if he ever shows himself, I can follow him. I know, I know.
For the plan to work, no one can know about it. And no one means no one. Even Nino has to believe that you'll never be Rena Rouge again!
Or... Rena Furtive?
Or Rena Furtive!
I just don't know if I can lie to Nino like that we share everything and...
It's too late to turn back now. Tell yourself that it's not really lying. It's more-
It's more like you don't lie to your boyfriend. If Nino ever finds out, he'll never trust me again.
I had to keep the truth from my best friend for a very long time, so I know how you feel.
Girls!How about an Ultimate Mecha Strike 23 Tournament!
Woah! Sorry, but, uh, we're doing homework, Dad!
Again?! Your teacher sure gives you loads of homework!
And see, I still have to lie to my family. It's been months since I hung out with my dad but... we don't have a choice. We've got to protect our superhero secrets.
Fine, I'll tell him.
I-I, um...
Somebody wants to play Super Penguino!
There's something we gotta talk about first.
What?
Uh, I, uh...,I can't do this, it's too hard.
You're starting to worry me.
If I do this, it might change so much between us.
Oh, no! Don't say it anything but that!
Anything but what?
You don't love me anymore!
What? No! Of course, I do!
What is it, then?

Nino, it's about our superhero secrets. Ladybug and I had a chat and... Okay. I'm no longer Rena Rouge and I never will be. Ladybug won't give me a Miraculous ever again, she thinks it's become too dangerous.

That all makes sense. It was so weird you're not being there with us last time. Well, it's a super bummer for sure but if Ladybug thinks it's better for you,why are you so scared to tell me? You know we can share everything and nothing will ever change that.
Yeah, we can share everything.
You did the right thing. It's safer to protect our secrets.
Yeah, it's probably better that way.
It's gonna be time for ourevening walk soon if you know what I mean.

And while the bug is out patrolling with the kitty, the sly fox will cover them in case the mean old moth sets up-Oh, I've been meaning to show you something. I took a few selfies with my new costume. There are tons of details I'm sure you missed. Check this out!Right by the neckline, isn't it way cool?
Alya...
I think I like it better than the old one. Oh, what if I did a survey on the Ladyblog and let people vote on their favorite?
Alya, Rena Furtive means Rena Invisible. No one can ever see these.
Oh, right. I forgot.Bummer, it's getting really hard to find a new material for the Ladyblog.I guess I still have that raw footage of Cat Noir stunts depending on how well I edit it.
Yes, that's an awesome idea.Come on, let's go.
Oh!
Hey! Since we got out early today, what do you say we catch a movie?
Uh, I'm... not so sure.
Go on! You have time, we'll meet up later.
So, what's playing in the movies?
Alya! Slow down!
After Ladybug & Cat Noir...
Oh, Cat Noir, come back!
I'll always love you, Ladybug!
Ladybug & Cat Noir 2: The Arrival of Rena Rouge.
What about Carapace? Has everyone forgotten about Carapace?!
Cat Noir, forget about Ladybug. You and I, we are made for each other.
What?! Rena Rouge will love Cat Noir? This is totally ridiculous!
Hey, Nino. It's a cartoon, a made-up story! It's just made to entertain people.
Well, I, for one, am not entertained!
She's right, Cat Noir. You and Rena Rouge should be so much better together!
Mademoiselle.Should I take you home? Or..
That thing you were showing to Marinette on your phone earlier seemed really cool. What was it? Can I see?
Oh- A thing? What thing? It was nothing. Besides, I'm just running out of battery.
Hey, look! André's over there! How about some ice cream?
Alya and Nino, my favorite lovebirds! What shall I serve you today?
Uh, nothing for me, thanks! I just remembered that I have homework to do and I'm not really hungry, anyway. You can have my half. See you later!
Thanks, André, but I guess we'll have to wait till next time.
Come on, Cat Noir is in love with Ladybug, not Rena Rouge!
I don't care! I'm Cat Noir and all the girls love me!

There's a lot of talk about Ladybug, but hardly any about Cat Noir, and he's really an amazing superhero! Brave, funny, handsome; coming right up a montage of some of the most impressive stunts of a superhero who's every bit as magnificent as Prince Char-meow-ing. Stay connected!
I knew it! She's in love with someone else!
You guys spend every minute together. I'm sure you're just imagining things. Who else do you think she'd be in love with, anyway?
Cat Noir!
Yeah, right. How about crocodile while you're at it?
Did you see the video?
Come on, that's just some video from the Ladyblog, not proof.
I'll find proof, then you'll see that I was right!
There's no way!
Oh, there's a way. Yes way! My natural charisma has probably just rubbed off on you.
You think I played the charming kitty cat one too many times and unintentionally made her fall in love with me? I have to be sure! Plagg, claws out!

Who would want a tormented turtle for a companion? No one could resist a kitten!This one just ripped my heart out, like a tragic sax solo and a love song. There I was, with my old buddies again: the city, the night, the solitude, the rain, pouring down,not like the tears that were stuck in my throat.It was time to end all the lies and secrets. I'd always wanted to have a mustache anyway.
Cat Noir!?
What's going on? Is something wrong?

No, no! Everything's fine! It's just that I saw you posted a new video about me. I'm super flattered, really, but it made me wonder: you've been following Ladybug and me from the very start. You take photos and videos, and we even saved you a couple times. What I mean is, we're starting to know each other pretty well and... it's made me notice a couple of small things. I hope I'm just under the illusion that there's something but uh...
Illusion...? What illusion? What small things?

It's kind of hard to explain, but I wanted to make sure that in all this time you've spent admiring me, you haven't built up some kind of uh... feelings for me. I mean, I get it, \Hey, I am the Cat's Meow.\""
Huh, what feelings for you?
Well.. you know..
Are you insane?! I already have a boyfriend! And FYI, with him it's not just,it's more like
Sorry, that was so silly of me.
Sorry, Cat Noir, but my Nino is a thousand times more irresistible than you.
Besides, I don't really know your real identity, and I could never fall for someone I didn't really know.
Oh, hey, Nino! I gotta tell you something.
No! I gotta tell you something!
Sit down!
Uh... when did you set all this up?
I'm the one asking questions! Remember what I told you yesterday? I got proof now. What do you say to this?!
Uh-Come on, that doesn't make any sense. You're wrong, that's not at all what happened!
How do you know? You were there? You're in on it too?!

No, no. Of course, not! But it's impossible! I'm sure this is just a misunderstanding. Alya and Cat Noir have nothing in common. They barely know each other! Alya is just a superhero fan she's been filming Ladybug and Cat Noir, that's all!
They know each other well enough!

But no one knows Ladybug and Cat Noir's secret identities. Can you imagine Alya falling in love with someone she doesn't really know? The girl who wants to be a reporter who always wants to know the truth, no matter what? Who wants to share everything with the boy she loves?
They actually know each other much better than you think!
You can't assume that from this video.
Listen, here's what you don't know! I'm not talking about the video, dude. I'm talking about something I shouldn't be telling you. A mind-blowing secret. Alya is a superhero. She's Rena Rouge!
What?!
Shh!I know what you're about to say: \That's nonsense and how would Nino know that anyway?\" I know because... I'm a superhero too. I'm Carapace!"
Huh? You're... Carapace? But... the two of you know?! You know each other's secret identities?!
Of course, Alya and I have never kept anything from each other. Until now, though that Cat Noir's business!
Wait a sec, I don't understand! I thought that secret identities had to be protected at all costs. If it were true, you'd never just tell me like that. Ladybug would never agree to that!
Are you kidding? Ladybug is the one who gave us both our Miraculous at the same time.
No, that's impossible!
What are you trying to say? That I'm lying or something!?
No, no. What I meant was- Okay, you're Carapace, she's Rena Rouge and Ladybug's okay with this. But it still isn't like Alya or Cat Noir to be...you know...?

You don't know what Cat Noir really is but I do! I'm part of the team! I see how he acts in real life. Sure, as soon as Ladybug shows up, he throws himself at her feet with roses and big declarations,but he gets blown off every time, because Ladybug thinks he's obnoxious, and she's right! And then whenever Rena Rouge shows up, it's like,\Why, hello there, pretty lady, you look so fine! You smell so good!\" So yeah, it's easy to figure out that the first mission I missed- I mean, Carapace missed, he made his move and, BAM! This is what happened. Now,I'm all alone. I've lost the love of my life.If I could, I'd sew his sweet talking mouth shut with his own whiskers! "
A spurned boyfriend who wants vengeance on his rival. Now that's a strong emotion.Fly, my little akuma and help this young man destroy his enemy! My enemy!
There's got to be an explanation, Nino. We'll work it all out!
Rocketear, I am Shadow Moth. Cat Noir has ripped your heart out and left you in a weeping state of sorrow. So, I'm giving your tears the power to destroy everything! All I ask for in return are-
I know what you want, Shadow Moth. Don't worry, the only thing left to them will be their Miraculous.
Nino, you have to fight off this-
You're not my enemy, Adrien. Cat Noir is!
I know what you're about to do but I would advise you not to, considering what your pal's got in store for Cat Noir.
I can't leave Nino like that!
Plagg, claws out!
And that's why he showed up in the middle of the night, because of this video I post on the Ladyblog. He thought I was in love with him.
Oh, that Cat Noir.
Cat Noir! You stole my Alya from me! I'm going to steal your life from you!
I didn't steal anyone!Alya still loves you!
LIAR! I have proof!
Oh no, this can't be happening!
Oh, Nino, no!
We have to stop them before they hurt each other. Come on, follow me!
Okay, we can transform in peace in here.Alya, don't tell me you...
Of course, not! It's a misunderstanding. If you could hear what we were saying, there's no way Nino would believe that I'm in love with Cat Noir.
Okay, fine. Let's not waste time.Tikki!
Trixx!
Spots on!
Let's pounce!
projector) A video projector? What am I supposed to do with this?
Do like Nino and make up imaginary movies in your head?
You said that if Nino could have heard what you were saying, there'd be no misunderstanding?
Absolutely!
How well do you remember what you guys said on the balcony?
Every. Word.
Do you think you could make... a sound illusion?
Totally.
I don't wanna fight you!
Silence!
Let me explain!
I don't wanna hear your lies!
You wanted proof? Here's proof.
That doesn't prove a thing!
See? I don't wanna hurt you. Can we talk now?
Shut him up for good! But before you do, seize his Miraculous!
It's over, Cat Noir!
Don't do this.
