MERRY CHRISTMAS CHLOÉ!
Chloé, it's Christmas.
MERRY CHRISTMAS MARINETTE!But I hate your guts, don't you forget!
Merry Christmas to all!
Adrien's bodyguard. The present! I'll be right back!
I don't believe this! Where's the gift? Where did I put it? I'm so lame!
It's right here, Marinette. See?
Ah! Thanks, Tikki.
Huh?
Excuse me? Wait! If you don't mind, this is.. this is for Adrien.
Can you wish him a Merry Christmas from me, that is.. I mean it could be from you too, in fact Merry Christmas to you from.. um, ah.. me, of course.. ahI hope Adrien has a good Christmas.
Check it out, Nathalie. Do you think he will like all the decorations?
He should be down here already. Did you call him?
Perhaps we should give him... a few more minutes.
What's the point? He's not coming.Thank you.Merry Christmas both of you.
Yes?
I can imagine how difficult it must be for you, sir. But it's also Adrien's first Christmas without his mother. I really think, sir...
I know, you're right. I'll go see him. I just need a little more time.
Of course.
He's still only thinking of himself! I just want this terrible day to be over and done with! I hate Christmas!
Plagg, claws out!

It's Christmas in Paris, all is cheery and bright! But I'm all alone tonight.Families are together, with their gifts by their side. Only Cat Noir's alone tonight.There's no warmth for me, no tenderness for me. I'm alone like a cat in the night! I'm a sad lonely kitty! won't anyone take pity? Cat Noir is alone tonight! Cat Noir is alone tonight!

No cares about me, if I'm lost or I'm found and I'm just a cat in the night! I'll take your symbol of joy and burn it to the ground. I'm the vengeful cat of the night! I'm the vengeful cat of the night! Ca-ta-cly-sm!I can't do it! I can't do it!I'm cold and alone, I don't want to be in pain. All that anger was all in vain. I need to go back home to try and find a way. Tomorrow will be a brand new day.Let's go home now. Plagg, claws out.
Plagg? Plagg!?
I wish that I can help you, to assist with your transformation. But I can't Adrien, don't you see? I'm tired and distress, I got nothing to digest, I'm weak and I'm running on empty.

Plagg? Plagg, what have I done? Wait, I'll help you!\Merry Christmas\". Signed Marinette. She's so awesome! We're going to fix you right up, Plagg!Do you hear that? It's Christmas!Merry Christmas, Plagg."
Merry Christmas, Adrien.
Adrien. Adrien?Adrien!!Go and find him immediately! Immediately!
Hello? Yes, Merry Christmas.
No Ma'am, he's not at my house.
Adrien? Isn't he at home?
He's been kidnapped? No joke.
Don't worry, Sabrina. We'll find your friend wherever he is.
Kidnapped? I'm sure there's another explanation.
Let's take a look around the neighborhood, just in case. The presents can wait. You wanna come, Marinette?
I'm not feeling so great, I'll just wait here at home and if I hear anything, I'll call you right away. 'kay? Quick, we've gotta find Adrien.
Tikki, spots on!
Don't worry, Plagg, I'll find you something to eat. I can't promise it'll be Camembert.
Ho, ho, ho! No need to grab now, children. Good old Santa Claus has a gift for everyone.
These gifts are so lame, and I bet this is totally fake!
Hey! Easy on the beard!
Yeah! Totally. No way you're the real Santa Claus!
Hey! What's wrong with you? Even if he's not the real one, what would Santa think of your behavior?
The young man's absolutely right. Kids, say sorry right now.
Sorry, Santa Claus.
It's no big deal, children. Merry Christmas anyway.
Same to you.
I'm sorry, Sir, are you okay?

Fine. Don't worry, I'm a tough old Santa. But, what are you doing out at this time of night? Are you lost? You're not exactly dressed for the cold weather. Maybe you'd like some hot chocolate, I've got some left.
Yeah, I'd love some, Sir, doesn't get much better than that.
Ahem!
Except maybe a slice of Camembert?
Oh you're in luck! I've still got some sandwich leftover. This is some of the smelliest cheese I've ever come across.
Hmm, that smells… perfect.
To each it's own. So you're not lost then, I hope.
It's my first Christmas without my mom, sir. And my father…

Doesn't know how to move on? I understand. But your dad must be wondering where you are, you know. He must be very worried about you. Now that you've gotten out of the house and cleared your thoughts a bit, don't you think it'd be a good idea to go home?
Yeah, you're right.
Atta boy, that's what Christmas is all about. Families together. I'll take you there on my sleigh .
C'mon, Plagg. Alright, but you put this on.
Hmm?
The friend who gave it to me would want you to have it.
A present, for me?
Everyone deserves a Christmas present.
Thanks a lot, son.

There is only one thing this kind of damage can bring, Cat Noir's Cataclysm, am I right? And look this gift wrap too, it's an important clue, it's from my present to Adrien tonight. Adrien disappears, and Cat Noir steps in, he must be working to protect him. My only explanation, my speculation, is that some supervillain is after Adrien. It's a good thing I'm here, I'll protect him without fear, this boy that I secretly love. Now with all of my might, I'll save you tonight, you're the boy that I secretly love. If you'll never know it's true, I'll be there for you, you're the boy that I secretly love. But what would you do if you knew what's true, that's why I so secretly love you.
Who could possibly been akumatized on Christmas Eve? Footsteps.
How about you, sir? Where will you be celebrating Christmas?
Me? I have all of Paris. The whole world even! Ho, ho, ho!
All by yourself, huh? Okay, here's what we're gonna do. Take me back home and have Christmas with us! I need you to bring the Christmas spirit back into our home.
All right then. But I can't stay for too long, you do know that Santa's very busy at Christmas time.
Thank you!
Adrien, is that you? Who are you?
Isn't it obvious? I'm Santa Claus!
Really now? That would make me the Easter Bunny. You're here for money, I suppose? I'll get my bodyguard to deal with you.
No, you're wrong, father!
No, he's not. Your father's got the right idea. He's a supervillain under Hawk Moth's control.
What?
You're all totally crazy!
What? No, Ladybug stop! That man hasn't been akumatized!
I know when I'm looking at an akuma victim, trust me.
C'mon!
You're safe now. Go on home.
No wait! Plagg
Adrien.
C'mon ponies, giddy up!Hey! Are you out of your mind?
This hurts really bad!

Ahh. Without even knowing it, you're giving me the best Christmas gift ever, Ladybug. An innocent man wrongly accused, and the spirit of Christmas is broken!Fly away, my little akuma. You have all that you need to evilize this Santa.
Where are you going, Adrien?
To my room, of course, since my father isn't celebrating Christmas.
Of course he is Adrien. Your father came to see earlier, but you'd gone out. I'll tell him that you're waiting for him. Just making sure you'll stay in your room this time.
Yeah, okay.
You… So you're not a supervillain?
Of course I'm not! I think you've been reading too many comic books, young lady.
I'm so sorry, um, let me help you-
No thank you! I think you've helped me enough.
Nobody around here respects the spirit of Christmas anymore.

Well, I believe in you. Santa Claws, I am Hawk Moth. They wrongly accused you of being a supervillain, so that's what you'll get to be from now on. In exchange, since I've been good enough all year round, I'm going to ask you for two gifts. Ladybug and Cat Noir's Miraculous.
I shall deliver. Merry Christmas, Hawk Moth!

Ladybug!You think you can get away with making fun of me? You think you can get away with accusing me? I am Santa Claws! I'm a rebel with a cause! I'll punish and give you a fright! Have a horrible Christmas night.
Santa Claws?
Not exactly!I am Santa Claws! I'm a rebel with a cause! I'll punish and give you a fright! Have a horrible Christmas night.I'll do you no harm, Adrien. I'm in your debt!
No, wait!
This will be the Christmas of revenge!
Plagg, claws out!
Santa Claus has come this year, my sweet Chloé!
Aaah!
Horrible Christmas, everyone!I am Santa Claws! I'm a rebelwith a cause! I'll punish and give you a fright! Have a horrible Christmas night.Horrible Christmas, everyone!
It's just the two of us, Santa Claws!
The three of us, m'Lady.
Cat Noir? Where were you? What happened to Adrien?
It's a-, long story. Cats have their little secrets too, y'know?Who's going to deliver presents to the children now, Santa Claws?
There are no more presents, no more spirit of Christmas! You should've been good.
I've been good all year round!
Not enough, apparently.Hang on!
How 'bout a nice sleigh ride, my little, wretched elves! Ho, ho, ho, ho! Hold on!
Don't you have to have a license to drive one of these things?
It's time to open your gifts, kiddies!
I'm gonna try to stop the sleigh. You deal with Santa Claws!Woah, slow down!
Thank you.
Woah, Ladybug!
Not again!
Ladybug? Cat Noir? Now that's a Christmas scoop! Anything you'd like to say for the Ladyblog?
Uh, it's not at all what it looks like.No, wait. This isn't gonna work. box)
I hope it's not trying to tell us to move to another city.
I need packing tape, scissors and office supplies. Do you guys have those things here?
In there.
Right here.
And here!
My Christmas list. Go to the Dupain-Cheng's bakery and grab these items. Then meet me back at the Eiffel Tower, I'll explain everything once we're there.
I've always dreamed of being your Santa Claus, M'Lady.
Don't worry, Christmas will be back to normal soon enough.
Go get 'em. Lady-Claus.
It's me.

Santa, you're the winner. We stand down and surrender. We fear you have defeated us, so we give you our Miraculous. But beforehand, here is a gift for you. 'Cause on Christmas Eve, even you have a right to that too.
A present? For me?
Don't listen to him, it has to be a trap!
Rebel with the cause, you give us so much fright. We all have the right to a present on Christmas night.
Merry Christmas!
Cataclysm!Merry Christmas, milady.
Thanks, kitty. No more evil doing for you, little akuma. Time to de-evilize! Gotcha! Bye bye, little butterfly. Miraculous Ladybug!
Pound it!
Ladybug, Cat Noir. Go ahead and enjoy your Christmas this time, but we'll see who gets the best presents next Christmas.
Adrien. You understand I can't have you disappearing like that. I couldn't bare the thought of losing you.
I think it's for you.I informed everyone that Adrien was home, safe and sound, sir. They were all worried about their friend.
Oh please, father. It's Christmas!
Of course. Come on in.
Aww, brother!
Merry Christmas, Adrien.
Merry Christmas to all!
Merry Christmas, mom.
Yes, Mrs. Césaire. The girls are ready for bed! Uh... technically speaking...Yeah, we're good. Enjoy the movie!
Come on, bedtime, you little monsters! That's enough mischief for one day!
It's not us! It's the Sapotis!
Off to bed, little Sapotis. You need to rest if you wanna be fighting fit for tomorrow.
It's not fair! We don't wanna go to bed! We wanna stay up with you!
Yeah! We wanna watch the movie and tell each other lots of secrets!
And what kind of zombies will you be at the amusement park tomorrow if you go to bed late? Show 'em, Marinette!
So what's it gonna be? Boring sit-down pajama party with the big kids, or... the super fun cool amusement park tomorrow?
The amusement park!
That's what I thought. So, goodnight, Sapotis.
Wait! Can we keep 'em on? Please?
All right. But go to sleep now.
You seriously have a technique down with your little sisters. But... uh, who are the Sapa... Sapo...?

The Sapotis? They're little monsters from a créole fable... who are always pulling pranks and making all sorts of mischief.Now that we're all alone I can finally tell you.Apparently Ladybug has been around at least since the pharaohs. But no way can the Ladybug we know can be five thousand years old! So, I downloaded a great app that analyzed some recordings I had of her talking. Based on the frequencies of her voice, it turns out she's a girl our age!
Euhh..Uh...Alya? The orange juice?
It's not us! It's the Sapotis!
What were we saying again?
Uhh...We were about to watch a movie!
Oh, yeah! Ladybug! She's like a high school girl. So to figure out who she really is, all we need to do is to find a girl our age who's always late—
Don't you think there's a reason why she keeps her identity a secret?
All right, that's enough! Get out of bed one more time, and no one'll be going to the amusement park tomorrow!
It's not us! It's the Sa—
This is your last warning! No! Joke!
What were you saying about her secret identity?
Ladybug needs it to protect her family and friends. Otherwise the villains could use them to get to her.
It's not us! It's the—!
That's it!
Come on, Alya! We won't do it again!
Yeah? Well, it's too late!We'll all go to the park when you can behave, some other day! Now go to sleep!

\I don't want another peep out of you!\", \"Wash your hands!\", \"Clean your room!\". Kids should be able to do whatever they want to do, however they want to do it.Fly, my little evil one and akumatize them! "

Well, if I knew who Ladybug really was, I'd keep it a secret. I would even help her! Like say, if you were Ladybug, I'd cover for you — when you needed to transform in school, go fight the \baddies\", you know?"
Oh yeah? Well, if I was Ladybug I wouldn't even tell you, to protect you from the \baddies\", you know?"
You serious? If I was Ladybug, I'd totally tell you! Because I tell my best friend everything.
You're right, Alya. You should always tell your best friend everything. So come on. Spill the beans. Are you actually Ladybug?
Right. Like I'm telling you. Nuh-uh.
It's mine!
No, this one's mine!
No, it's mine!
Sapotis, I am Hawk Moth. Your big sister's telling you what to do? Well, I'll let you be asmischievousas you want!
'And do whatever we want? Like, stay up all night! And go to the movies? And eat lots of desserts? And drink orange juice?! And still go to the amusement park?!

Yes, yes, but calm down! From now on, no one will ever be able to punish you, because it will always be another Sapoti's fault. All you have to do is to take Ladybug and Cat Noir's Miraculous, and give them to your good friend, Hawk Moth. Okay?
Okay!
That's it! I've totally had it with these kids!Don't even try to blame this on the—Sapotis?
Maybe you were a little too strict with them.
Normally when you're firm with kids they don't turn into monsters!
They're multiplying after they eat!AAH!
Window!
Marinette, the window! We can't let them out!
Marinette, take care of these two! We've gotta bring them back!
Time to transform!
Tikki, spots on! Ha!
To the airport.
Rock n' roll!
Hey, what's going on?
Left and right! Right!
Whoa!
On your left, La Académie des Beaux-Arts. And on your right, the Louvre museum.
On the right...
La, la, la, la.
Wow!
TRAFFIC!
These miniature monsters seem to be attacking more and more people throughout Paris!And... Oh!
I think we better take care of this, Plagg. Plagg?
These food thieves are real dangers!What are you waiting for?!
Plagg, claws out!
It's forbidden...
...to play around with traffic lights!
You're just in time, kitty!
MINE!
How'd you know to destroy the monster's hat?
I...uh... Trial and error.
But no akuma's been released!
No, 'cause that monster was a clone!These Sapotis multiply every time they eat. To get to the akuma, we'll have to destroy the original one — the very first one Hawk Moth akumatized.
So you mean we'vegotta catch 'em all.
Come on! I thought you liked a good challenge!
Hey, don't eat that ice cream or things'll get catastrophic!
Seize their Miraculous!
We won't be able to destroy all their hats! There's too many of them!
Miraculous!
teapot appears.)
A teapot?
It's strangely familiar.
It's weird. I can't find anything!
Hurry up! My kung-fu's not enough!
Of course! I know someone who can help! Gotta go!
Right now? Can't it wait?
No, it can't. You've gotta trust me on this one.
Miraculous!
Go on, M'Lady!
Mmm. It's open.
Hello, Master Fu.
Hello, Marinette.
Marinette? But you're not supposed to come to Master Fu's place!
Let her talk, Wayzz.
Master, I used my Lucky Charm, but strangely, I think it was a hint which was telling me to come here in a way.
I see.
Hmm?

Marinette, I taught you all about the Miraculous and their powers. You know that yours works in a very mysterious way. I think it's trying to tell us that you need help this time.I don't know if it's safe. I already took an enormous risk by putting two Miraculous into circulation.
And you were right to do it. Cat Noir and I are very careful.
Hmmm.Marinette, pick an ally you can trust to fight alongside you in this mission.
Wow!
Choose wisely. Such powers are meant to serve the greater good. They must never get into the wrong hands.
Like Hawk Moth's.

Yes. Once the mission is over, you must retrieve the Miraculous from them and bring it back to me. Until we've unlocked all the secrets of the spellbook, it's too dangerous to allow any more Miraculous to be out in the open for very long.
Mmm.
Is there anyone you can think of, Marinette?
Yes, Master. I know just the right person!
Mmm.
Listen! We can renegotiate the amusement park idea if you want, 'kay? But first, I need you to chill out and come back home with me.
Ladybug! My sisters have been akumatized! I need to find them and bring them back home!
There's a way for you to find your sisters. But we're gonna need your help! You interested?
Me? Help you superheroes? You bet I am! Just wait till I tell Marinette about this!
Hold on now. This has to be a secret. Not a word to your friends or on the Ladyblog.
Oh, right.Understood.
Alya Césaire, here is the Miraculous of the fox, which grants the power of illusion. You will use it for the greater good.Once the job is done, you will return the Miraculous to me. Can I trust you?
Totally, Ladybug.
Wha? What is that thing?
I am not a thing. My name is Trixx, and I'm your kwami!
My kwami? I know! You're what gives superheroes their superpowers, right?
Not bad.
She's an expert.
Mind blown!By the way, how old are you? Do you have any idea of Cat Noir's true identity? There's no way—
Stay focused, Alya.
Sorry, Ladybug.
Ready to become a superhero?
You just need to say one thing: \Trixx, let's pounce!\""
Trixx, let's pounce!
This is so awesome! But I look like Lila when she was akumatized in this suit.
Yes, but the superhero version! Come on, I'll explain the rest to you on the way!
Wow! This is so cool!
Mission first!
Huh?What's taking so long, Ladybug?
There, my Sapotis! Take his Miraculous from him!
This is so insane! I've got powers and I'm fighting super-villains!
Whoa! Who's this superhero friend of yours? No offense, but I thought I was the only one!
Cat Noir, I like to meet...uh...
Uh... Rena Rouge! Yeah, my name is Rena Rouge!
Well, sneaky fox, think you'll be as sneaky as a cat?
Um...
I don't know. Should we take bets?
Your friend seems pretty good.
I surround myself with only the best!
Welcome to our team! If you need any cool superhero tips, you know where to come!
Really? You're gonna give me Ladybug's phone number?
I have a feeling working with you is gonna be a lot of fun!

A new hero. So I was right! There are indeed other Miraculous in the city! Sapotis, listen to me! Three superheroes are nothing against you! There are still enough of you to destroy everything! So band together and take their Miraculous, or I'll remove your powers and there'll be no more mischief!
We're surrounded!
We're retreating!
There must be thousands of them!
Lucky Charm!
A unicycle?
Miraculous!
Whenever you're ready, M'Lady!
Hello!
Traffic!
Rakes? Unicycle wheel? Traffic cone? Tape? Trash can! Do you always make it this complicated when you're saving Paris?
Trust me, Rena Rouge.Here we go!
Cheese!

Hear ye, hear ye! Sapoti-Land, the amusement park of the future, is about to open! Mischief of all types are permitted in Sapoti-land! All-you-can-eat desserts! Fountains of orange juice! Big-kid movies and video games!
All right, Rena Rouge! Time to use your power!
I've never tried it. I hope it works.
Just think of the illusion you want to create. Stay focused!
Mirage!
Awesome!My necklace is flashing. Um, that means I'm gonna change back soon, right?
Yeah. But it's okay if I see who you are. I can keep a secret.
Naughty kitty! You know very well that our identities must remain secret.
Good job. You're a fast learner.
If you need any superhero tips, you know where to come.
Mm-hmm.
Follow me, and I'll take you to Sapoti-Land! Where there's no bedtime! Where everything goes!
Sapoti-Land!
No, wait! Don't go there! Ladybug's trying to trap you!
Sapoti-Land!
Phase two, Cat Noir! Now!Step right up! Step right up! The Sapotis get in for free!
All the Sapotis are in the alley! Phase three!
Is this really gonna work?
Oh, don't worry. Sometimes it's even more absurd than this!Your turn, Ladybug!
We've got all the hats, Ladybug!
Cataclysm!
Huh?

column2: Ladybug, Cat Noir, and Rena Rouge
column4: No more evil-doing for you, little akuma. Time to de-evilize!Gotcha!Bye bye, little butterfly. Miraculous Ladybug!

column1: Ladybug, Cat Noir, and Rena Rouge
column4: Pound it!
Etta—!Uh...gotta get going! Uh...before I transform back!
Looking forward to fighting villains with you again, Rena Rouge!
I'll join you.
Bye, kitty!
Meow!
Cat Noir, can you make sure the two girls get back home safely?
Okay, who's gonna tell me where you live?
I will!
You and your friends have defeated me this time, Ladybug! But thanks to you, now I know there are other Miraculous in Paris! And most likely, a guardian!'
That was unreal!
You've really helped us a lot. Thank you, Alya.
Uh... You know, if I held onto it, I could help you again.
You made a promise.
Oh please, Ladybug! We'd make a great team! I could help Cat Noir and you every day!
I'm about to transform back! Hurry!
Please?
I have to go! I'm trusting you!
You're absolutely right, Alya. I'm sure the three of you would make quite the team! You have all the makings of a true superhero. You're strong, brave; but most of all, you're trustworthy.
You made the right choice, Marinette. Thanks to you, Paris has been saved from evil yet again.
Marinette! Are you okay?
I tried calling you tons of times! Why weren't you answering?
Wait till you hear! Something crazy happened to me!
Really? What happened?
I...well...my battery died.Can you believe it? My brand new phone. Super letdown, huh?
I'm just glad you're safe.
Ditto.
Keep the noise down. My sisters are asleep at last.
Phew!All's well that ends well.
Thanks to Ladybug and Cat Noir.
I heard they had another superhero with them tonight! A girl!
Huh? No! Seriously? I...had no idea! Who was it?
Aren't we gonna watch a movie?
Oh come on! Please! Did you see her? Did you at least know what her name was? Or what did she look like? Come on, girl, tell me everything!
Mmm. Everything smells delicious, Mrs. Césaire!
Marinette, call me Marlena.You'll let me know how you like my Colombo, okay?
Hide, Trixx!Alya, no one can know about Trixx! He's a secret!
Really? Exactly why is he such a secret, Ladybug?
U-uh, Ladybug? W-Why are you calling me Ladybug? I'm not Ladybug. I'm Marinette! Just a normal girl with a normal life.
Marinette, everyone knows that you're Ladybug!

To think that you've been lecturing us about blah, blah, blah, \you must keep your identity a secret,\" blah, blah, blah, \"otherwise I can't give you your Miraculous.\" I would have made a much better Ladybug. Talk about a ridiculous Guardian, utterly ridiculous!"
Alya, what is she doing here at your house?
Ahh, thanks for showing up, Shadow Moth!
I'm the one grateful to you, for revealing Ladybug's identity, Alya. Thanks to you, the Miracle Box is finally mine.
Alya?! This is impossible! Tikki, Spots On!Tikki?
You should have never trusted Alya, Marinette.
Look on the bright side, m'lady. Now that we're done with secrets, we can tie the knot.
This... is... a nightmare...!
If you want this to stop, all you have to do is give me your Miraculous.
This is what you get for leaving me with Alya.
AHHHHHH! Tikki, I should have never left the Fox Miraculous with Alya!
What are you talking about, Marinette?
I had a nightmare. It was horrible! Alya told everyone, everything and Shadow Moth had hold of the Miracle Box.
Whew.
It was just a bad dream, that wouldn't really happen. Alya is a loyal friend.
Alya is. But her kwami, Trixx, can't help making mischief whenever is facing to whom.
Well the Loch Ness monster illusion was kind of fun, wasn't it?
Shhh.
That was a prophetic nightmare, I can't leave the Miraculous with Alya!
Marinette, wait!
Marinette, it's almost lunchtime and you're still...
In my pajamas,I know, I, I just need to drop by Alya's, and there's this thing I need back.
Where did that thing go? Come on, Nora.
If I find him, he better be ready for a good old roundhouse kick!
First one who finds the furry squishy gets to keep it.
Yeah!
I can't believe this, it's like the little monster can go through walls or something.
Everyone knows? You-you told them?!
Well, I had to since I lost him. Imagine what happened if someone could cross him or worse if he escaped.
You lost him?
Yeah, so? Everybody loses things from time to time. Help me look instead of lecturing me.
Stay for lunch, Marinette. You let me know, how you like my Colombo, okay?
A T-T-T-Tarantula! .
Everyone can stop looking. Marinette found Hannibal!
Phew! .
Seems like he got his legs working again. Tomorrow, it's back to the zoo, buddy.
Is it okay to come out now?
Ha! You flyweights, Cappy was scared of the itsy-bitsy spider, just like you, baguette!
Nah, I wasn't scared, I just went into the bathroom to make sure that Hannibal had not fallen into the toilet.But why are you in your pajamas?
Cute look, Marinette. So, are you here for anything... specific?
Oh! No, it's cool! Nothing specific, especially now I've seen you found the tarantula, I'm so relieved it wasn't something else that you'd lost.
Ah, I know what thing you're talking about, FYI, when someone trusts me with a \thing,\" I don't lose it."
Look who's talking! You're the one who just lost Hannibal.
Huh. Can we chat for a sec?
Sorry, Nino. This is between Marinette and me.
Ahh! Haha, haha .
I swear, it was so... lifelike!
It was just a nightmare, Marinette.
Everyone knew that I was...you-know-who, you know?AAAAHHH!
Chill out, everything's cool!
Okay. We know that Shadow Moth has identified some of the holders. He knows you've been Rena Rouge! What if he found out I left the Miraculous with you? He could steal it from you!
Shadow Moth or anybody else will never know!
Not even Cat Noir can!
No one's gonna find this!And thanks to this very hip bag my BFF gave me,Trixx is always with me, out of sight.
Trixx! Promise you're not gonna... make any mischief like popping up at the table during lunch, for example?
As silent as a phoenix and as wily as foxes.
I told you everything is alright!
I was silly to worry. You're right.
Trust me, and trust yourself! You were right to give me a Mirac-Ugh, seriously? Hello?? Why isn't anybody getting that?
